Description: Raf Simons Animal Fabric Gloves in Abstract,White Self: 100% viscoseLining: 100% acetate. Made in Italy. Leather trim. RSIM-MA36. 192-961. About the designer: Born and raised in Belgium, Raf Simons graduated from college in 1991 with a degree in industrial design and furniture design. After interning at the studio of fellow Belgian designer Walter Van Beirendonck, in 1995 Simons trained himself as a menswear designer and launched his eponymous label later that year. In 2000, Simons shut down his studio to consider new ideas, re-opening it a year later in conjunction with a smaller crew of collaborators. In 2003, he won first prize at the Swiss Textile Awards and from 2000 to 2005 was appointed head professor of the Fashion Department at the University of Applied Arts in Vienna, Austria. 2005 marked the launch of Raf by Raf Simons and later that year the designer was named creative director of Jil Sander. Simons' collection of menswear integrates ideas of music and art, blending classic and traditional elements with inspiration from the rebellious youth of past and present. Simons is known for a radical voice against the rigid rules of mainstream fashion and designs for confident outsiders.

ProductName: Men's Ted Baker London Verre Slim Fit Floral Short Sleeve Button-Up Shirt

ProductName: Sekford Watches - Type 1a Stainless-steel And Saffiano-leather Watch - Mens - Red Multi
Description: Sekford Watches - Sekford is named after a street in Clerkenwell, London - an area with a heritage in watchmaking. This red Type 1A design is inspired by the fine lettering found on English pocket watches. The bespoke gold-plated typography, which is encased in stainless-steel domed crystal mineral glass, has been custom made for clarity, and the quartz movement ensures the highest level of Swiss expertise. The piece is finished with a classic red leather strap sourced from one of Derbyshire's oldest tanneries.

ProductName: Sekford Watches - Type 1a Stainless-steel And Saffiano-leather Watch - Mens - Blue
Description: Sekford Watches - Sekford Watches' Type 1A watch fuses sleek British style with expert Swiss engineering. This iteration has a polished stainless-steel case, with a navy dial and typography inspired by 18th and 19th-century hand lettering that's set in a domed mineral crystal glass. It is completed with a black saffiano-leather strap sourced from one of England's oldest tanneries.

ProductName: Versace Gold and Black V-Chrono Watch

Sculptural rubber strap in black featuring logo-engraved pin-buckle fastening. Three-hand quartz movement. 50m water resistance. Swiss-made. Carved bezel featuring logo pattern. Signature Medusa head engraved at back face. Approx. 44mm case diameter x 11mm case width; 0.75 strap width. Supplier color: Black/Gold

ProductName: Larsson \u0026 Jennings - Lugano Stainless-steel Watch - Mens - Silver Multi

It's complete with a white brass dial, and is water resistant to 50 metres. Wear it to enliven on and off-duty looks.

ProductName: Salvatore Ferragamo Silver Ferragamo Slim Watch

The Burberry London collection consists of elegant and tailored collection featuring iconic garments

ProductName: Slip On loafer
Description: These masculine shoes are Loewe's reinterpretation of the traditional loafers. The Slip On loafers will reveal your modern, masculine elegance. The original design and refined print make these loafers outstanding. Wear with a dinner jacket and straight cut trousers.

ProductName: Gomma loafers
Description: Tod's has reinvented a classic design and brought it up to date with an oversized sole. This attention to detail ensures that these Gomma loafers add a daring touch to a formal outfit.

ProductName: Classic 20° espadrilles
Description: The Classic 20° espadrilles by Rivieras are one of the brand's iconic styles. This model has an eye-catching sole and a comfortable design.

ProductName: Gommini Nuovo loafers
Description: These comfortable and elegant Gommini Nuovo loafers feature the signature characteristics of designs by Tod's. This is a model with subtle finishes and a soft and attractive sole.

ProductName: Off-White - Slim-leg Split Hem Jeans - Mens - Grey
Description: Off-White - Off-White's grey jeans are shaped to a slim fit for a neat profile, then end in split hems to elongate the leg. They're crafted from mid-weight denim that's washed for a lived-in, vintage look and printed at the back in white with the label's signature diagonal lines and has a paperclip zip nodding to Virgil Albloh's product design references.

ProductName: RRL - Straight-leg Jeans - Mens - Cream

They're constructed to a classic five-pocket layout with copper-tone rivets that are engraved with the label's monogram and provide a vintage feel.

ProductName: Jacob Cohën - Slim-leg Fade Wash Jeans - Mens - Indigo
Description: Jacob Cohën - Jacob Cohen has built a legion of followers by fusing Japanese Kurabo denim with sharp tailoring techniques, a concept which shapes the rakish appeal of these indigo slim-leg jeans. Crafted from a cotton-rich blend that's faded for an authentic feel, they come with a spare roll of colour-matched thread for topstitching repairs.

ProductName: Amiri - Slash Skinny-leg Jeans - Mens - White
Description: Amiri - Shaded in white, Amiri's jeans tap the loudness of the label's rock 'n' roll Los Angeles roots. They're crafted from denim in the USA, fused with stretch to aid the narrow profile of each leg, and slits across the knees. The tobacco-brown top-stitching outlines the five-pocket layout and the seams down the inside leg.

ProductName: Tropical Flowers shirt
Description: Hartford presents an iconic floral touch that reflects its creator's talent. This Tropical Flowers shirt is a refreshing piece with subtle tones. A creation that boosts a look.

ProductName: Raymouth shirt
Description: The vintage tartan look from the English label features on this highly distinguished shirt. The Raymouth was designed by Burberry to seduce all generations of men.

ProductName: Boy Fit Shirt
Description: Ami presents the Boy Fit shirt. This fitted piece is made of a striped cotton fabric. It is boosted by a discreet embroidery that is emblematic of the brand.

ProductName: Silky V shirt
Description: This delicate silk shirt exudes the characteristic romanticism of the Italian brand. Valentino boldy presents unique, dreamlike design which elegantly fits the female figure.

ProductName: Hontario shirt
Description: The Hontario shirt by French designer Isabel Marant catches the eye with its chest pockets that blend into the pattern of the garment.

ProductName: Tie and dye shirt
Description: A psychedelic touch lends personality to this tie and dye shirt. Marni has the audacity to create an explosion of vibrant shades, ideal to wake up a dressy look.

ProductName: Barocco printed jacket
Description: Versace combines baroque art and streetwear style, with the Barocco printed jacket. Tightened by an elastic band at the sleeves and waist, it has an urban look, but its golden arabesque motifs are a nod to the luxurious world the famous Italian brand epitomises. Dare to wear it fastened up to the neck, with sweatpants from the same collection and a pair of sneakers for a bold, total look.

ProductName: Zipped jacket
Description: Stone Island has produced and signed a high-performance creation. This zipped jacket has a texture resulting from the latest technologies, making it particularly resistant to the natural elements. The stretchy coating makes it particularly comfortable. A unique new treatment gives it an exceptional color. It is equipped with a removable hood and has discreet zip pockets. This is a model with subtle finishes that is easy to store in a bag.

ProductName: Jacket
Description: With its straight cut and its chic, understated look, this Rains jacket will become the essential item in any man's wardrobe. Hurray for the rain!

ProductName: Peacot leather jacket
Description: Versace offers the Peacot jacket. Crafted in black leather and decorated with fringes on the front and the sleeves, it sports a resolutely rock look. The golden buttons add an audacious touch, so typical of the Italian fashion house. Wear this catwalk show piece with a printed t-shirt, bleach jeans and a pair of buckled boots.

ProductName: Ami de Coeur sweatshirt
Description: The Ami de Coeur sweatshirt is designed by Ami, the rising young Parisian brand. This round-neck sweatshirt features a logo on the chest and a second discreet logo on the neck.

ProductName: Logo sweatshirt

ProductName: Ami de Coeur technical sweatshirt

ProductName: Monogram Motif Cotton Hoodie

ProductName: 1\ Cuff Cavalry Twill chinos
Description: The classic cut of Thom Browne's 1\ Cuff Cavalry Twill chinos contrasts with the brand's signature details on the hem and belt. Their go-anywhere colour will make them a wardrobe staple. Wear Thom Browne's piece with a slim fit cotton shirt and leather brogues.

ProductName: Sock Boot leather ankle boots

ProductName: Givenchy - Logo-print Technical Swim Shorts - Mens - Blue
Description: Givenchy - Givenchy was founded in 1952, garnering a reputation for blending architectural lines and simplicity, exemplified through these royal-blue swim shorts featuring the label's signature logo print in white. ProductName: Thorsun - Mermaid-print Swim Shorts - Mens - Multi

ProductName: Thorsun - Pescado-print Swim Shorts - Mens - Pink
Description: Thorsun - Printed with an illustrated shoal of fish graphic, Thorsun's pink swim shorts are a fitting accent to your next beach getaway. They're crafted from lustrous quick-drying technical twill with an elasticated mid-rise waist, slanted front pockets and a white mesh lining for comfort. Fits true to size.

ProductName: Orlebar Brown - Bulldog Swim Shorts - Mens - Grey
Description: Orlebar Brown - Orlebar Brown's grey Bulldog swim shorts fuse high-performance functionality with tailoring tropes for transitional styling on vacation. Description: Versace - Versace's leopard-print swim shorts are overlayered with the house's hallmark Baroque motifs inspired by the extravagant details of Mediterranean architecture. ProductName: Gucci - GG Bee-appliqué Swim Shorts - Mens - Red Multi
Description: Gucci - Gucci employs two key house codes to design these red swim shorts. They're crafted for a relaxed fit with a mid-rise waist that is shaped with an internal drawstring, and feature the house's coveted GG pattern reimagined as a jacquard, alongside a gold embroidered bee motif - a logo reintroduced by Alessandro Michele.

ProductName: Onia - Charles Striped Swim Shorts - Mens - Navy
Description: Onia - Onia's navy Charles shorts are crafted from lustrous technical poplin that imbues the classic mid-length silhouette with a retro-inspired aesthetic. They're crafted with an elasticated drawstring waist for comfort and feature inseam pockets accented with a logo tab, a zipped back pocket and a breathable mesh-brief lining. Fits true to size.

ProductName: Frescobol Carioca - Sports Swim Shorts - Mens - Navy
Description: Frescobol Carioca - Frescobol Carioca's navy-blue Sports swim shorts draw influence from its Brazilian beach sports. They're crafted from a lightweight quick-drying fabric, and are cut to slim-fitting silhouette that sits comfortably on the hips with an adjustable drawstring waistband for a personalised fit. ProductName: Vilebrequin Logo-Embroidered Swim Shorts
Description: Vilebrequin's slim swim shorts are dyed a vibrant aqua blue with contrasting logo embroidery down the left leg. The front is designed with an adjustable drawstring fastening while the back has a flap pocket to stash your wallet and phone when relaxing at the beach.

Description: Orlebar Brown - Orlebar Brown's Setter swim shorts are inspired by the lines of classic tailored trousers and this black pair is an update of a style worn by Daniel Craig's James Bond. They're meticulously crafted to a slim profile from lightweight, quick-drying technical shell and feature the label's signature red hem stitching, mesh briefs and logo-engraved silver-tone metal side adjusters.

ProductName: Frescobol Carioca - Pepe Zigzag-print Technical Swim Shorts - Mens - Black
Description: Frescobol Carioca - The striking zigzag print on Frescobol Carioca's black and white Pepe swim shorts is inspired by the work of Lygia Clark, a Brazilian artist and sculptor known for her angular designs and her prominence in the Constructivist Movement of the 1950s and 1960s. The technical material is lined with mesh briefs and cut to a tailored silhouette complete with discreet side and back pockets. Fits true to size.

ProductName: Thorsun - Tie-dye Swim Shorts - Mens - Blue
Description: Thorsun - Thorsun's penchant for kaleidoscopic prints is reflected with these navy, red and white tie-dye swim shorts. The relaxed silhouette is crafted from quick-drying technical fabric with a drawstring waistband and white internal mesh briefs for a comfortable fit. They run true to size.

ProductName: Valentino - Camouflage-print Swim Shorts - Mens - Pink Multi
Description: Valentino - Valentino's swim shorts are rendered in a bold pink and navy iteration of the house's signature camouflage print, continuing the confident mood of the 1970s psychedelic-inspired SS20 runway show. They're made in Italy from lightweight quick-drying shell to a relaxed fit and punctuated with a signature gold-tone metal Rockstud. They run true to size.

ProductName: Thorsun - Mata Graphic-print Swim Shorts - Mens - Blue Multi
Description: Thorsun - Thorsun draws inspiration from the bold patterns of Modernist art when designing these blue Mata swim shorts. They're crafted from lightweight technical twill that's printed with abstract motifs, shaped to a mid-rise waist that secures via drawstring ties and finished with relaxed-fitting legs. ProductName: Orlebar Brown - Bulldog Sport Swim Shorts - Mens - Grey
Description: Orlebar Brown - Orlebar Brown's dark grey Bulldog Sport shorts are designed for versatility: you can easily wear them during a gym work out or to swim in during a coastal vacation. They're made from a lightweight, elasticated shell that feels soft against the skin, and are fitted with waistband tabs for a personalised fit. Multiple pockets and internal mesh briefs complete the slim-fitting style.

ProductName: Vilebrequin Moorea Fortune Teller Printed Swim Shorts
Description: Vilebrequin's 'Moorea Fortune Teller' swim shorts are a variation of the style the brand first created in 1971. Made from quick-drying navy fabric, this style is printed with calligraphic animal and plant motifs in contrasting white and cut with a moderate length. Combine yours with a relaxed button-up and casual sandals.

ProductName: Fendi - Pequin-stripe Swim Shorts - Mens - Black Brown
Description: Fendi - These swim shorts display Fendi's Pequin house code, alternating from brown to black - note the discreet logo lettering. Made in Italy to a lightweight technical shell with black brief-shaped lining, they have drawstring cords at the front of the comfortable elasticated waistband and are equipped with side-seam slip pockets.

ProductName: Orlebar Brown - Standard Swim Shorts - Mens - Pink
Description: Orlebar Brown - Orlebar Brown champions a tailored approach to men's beachwear as illustrated by these pink Standard swim shorts, which feature a slim fit and a partially elasticated waistband. Abloh says, âItâs not so much about brand-new. Itâs about the washed nature of clothes, the relaxedness. Thatâs what I love, to bring a Ralph [Lauren] take back into streetwear. Streetwear is generally brand-new. Itâs fresh out of the box, you wear it once, it becomes trendy, then you get rid of it.â

ProductName: contrast piping gloves
Description: All the drama of a chalk outline, without the unfortunate cause - these black leather contrast piping gloves from KAGAWA GLOVES are here to make your AW19 stylish, chic, a la mode, fashionable, trendy ... oh, and warm. Warm too. Featuring a pull-on style and contrast piping.

ProductName: contrast lettering logo gloves
Description: Break out the winter gear! Made from camel brown cotton, these contrast lettering logo gloves from Raf Simons will maybe not make you love the cold, but they will definitely make you love the cosiness. Give them to me! Featuring ribbed details and black embroidered lettering logos.

ProductName: logo print padded gloves
Description: Looking for the perfect match? These black logo print padded gloves from Off-White will fit you like a glove. Quite literally. Featuring a printed logo, an elasticated wrist, a padded detail and a contrasting front and back. This item comes with a protective case.

ProductName: square frame sunglasses
Description: Go green with these bold sunglasses from Gucci. Gold-tone and clear arms bring a modern edge to this pair. Make an impact. Featuring a brand logo on frames, gold-tone arms, tinted lenses, square frames and clear arms. This item comes with a protective case.

ProductName: Signature zip-around wallet
Description: In a flat and classic shape, the Signature clutch displays an all-over embossed pattern of Gucci's iconic logo. Crafted in Italy from smooth leather, it features a silver-tone logo plaque, an all around zip fastening, silver-tone hardware, multiple card slots and an all-over embossed Signature pattern.

ProductName: logo plaque bi-fold wallet
Description: Why carry all your cards and cash in your pockets if you could just get a wallet? Crafted from textured calf leather, this black bi-fold wallet from Salvatore Ferragamo is detailed with a silver-tone logo plaque to the front. Now you can keep everything organised in style. Featuring a textured style, multiple interior card slots, a billfold compartment, internal slip pockets, a transparent id window and an embossed internal logo stamp.

ProductName: Gancini bi-fold wallet
Description: Subtlety is key. Crafted from black calf leather, this bi-fold wallet from Salvatore Ferragamo is detailed with a matte-finish Gancini logo to the front. The perfect choice for men who value discreet designs and high-end quality. Featuring a billfold compartment, multiple interior card slots and an embossed internal logo stamp.

ProductName: Oakley Eye Jacket Redux Sunglasses
Description: Contrast maximizing lens Visibility enhancing Dust bag included Oval frame Non-polarized lenses Made in the USA Measurements Width: 5.5in / 14cm Height: 1.5in / 4cm Lens Width: 58mm Bridge: 19mm Arms: 137mm

Description: RAF SIMONS 192201 00099 BLACK Polyester

ProductName: Norrona - Lyngen Zipped Technical Hooded Gilet - Mens - Navy
Description: NORRONA - Over half of the synthetic fibres used to create Norrøna's navy Lyngen gilet are from a recycled source, demonstrating the label's dedication to sustainability. The slim-fit silhouette is cut with a high neck and drawstring hood - allowing for optimum insulation - then finished with a plush fleece lining, a front zip and an elasticated hem. Runs true to size.

ProductName: Snow Peak - Takibi Utility Vest - Mens - Khaki
Description: Snow Peak - Snow Peak's Takibi green utility vest has been carefully crafted in Japan from Teijinconex fabric, which is engineered to be heat and flame resistant, as well as remaining lightweight and tough. The vest is held in place by two shoulder straps that can be released via buckles. Fits true to size.

ProductName: Calvin Klein Performance - Quilted Technical Gilet - Mens - Orange
Description: Calvin Klein Performance - Calvin Klein Performance's orange gilet is crafted from water-repellent technical shell that's lightly quilted, making it ideal for outdoor activities. The panelled construction is conceived with stretch-jersey underarm inserts, alongside a high-neck and reflective logo print. Fits true to size.

ProductName: padded gilet
Description: Save The Duck mean business. And you can ensure you will stay warm this winter without sacrificing on sustainability and social consciousness with this navy blue padded gilet. Quack quack. Featuring a stand up collar, a front zip fastening, a sleeveless design and front zipped pockets. POSITIVELY CONSCIOUS: We’ve joined forces with ethical agency Good On You to give you the power to choose positively. This piece is from a brand that scores well on their key criteria.

ProductName: Men's Calvin Klein 3-Pack Comfort Microfiber Boxer Briefs
Description: Soft, stretchy microfiber fabric means performance comfort in smart boxer briefs topped with a branded waistband. Style Name: Calvin Klein 3-Pack Comfort Microfiber Boxer Briefs. Style Number: 5438619 8. Available in stores.

ProductName: Men's Brooks Brothers Milano Trim Fit Non-Iron Check Dress Shirt (Any 3 For $207)
Description: Non-iron Supima cotton ensures a fresh look in this handsome dress shirt patterned in dobby checks and topped with a smart spread collar. Style Name: Brooks Brothers Milano Trim Fit Non-Iron Check Dress Shirt (Any 3 For $207). Style Number: 5900567. Available in stores.

ProductName: Men's Vince Long Sleeve Linen T-Shirt
Description: Lightweight slubbed linen brings distinctive softness and texture to a T-shirt with a slightly larger crewneck and roomy raglan sleeves. Style Name: Vince Long Sleeve Linen T-Shirt. Style Number: 5936252. Available in stores.

ProductName: Men's Goodlife Triblend Scallop Crewneck T-Shirt
Description: Soft, overdyed yarns add textural appeal to a versatile, American-made T-shirt finished with a curved hem. Style Name: Goodlife Triblend Scallop Crewneck T-Shirt. Style Number: 5174729. Available in stores.

ProductName: Men's Bonobos Coimbra Floral Cotton Blend Socks
Description: Slender flowers bloom in cool pastels allover socks made for comfort from a stretchy pima-cotton blend. Style Name: Bonobos Coimbra Floral Cotton Blend Socks. Style Number: 5974409. Available in stores.

ProductName: STANCE OG SW Socks
Description: Ribbed cuff Contrast toe and heel Striped pattern and logo lettering Signature embroidered logo emblem Shell: 71% cotton/19% polyester/8% nylon/2% elastane Wash warm Imported, China Measurements Sizing conversion: M=US 6-8.5 L=US 9-12 XL=US 13-16

ProductName: Tiger sandals
Description: So comfortable that you'll never want to take them off, these Tiger sandals created by Kenzo will walk you wherever you go in style.

ProductName: Lekson sandals
Description: These Lekson sandals reflect the subtle expertise of the Isabel Marant label, with a leather coating brightened up with elegant patterns.

ProductName: Leather sandals
Description: These leather sandals are a must-have piece: reworked to reflect the latest trends, they are designed by Gucci. With these mules for men, the great Italian company is making a bold commitment to combining comfort and elegance, with thick, toothed rubber soles topped with gold buckle straps. The black leather makes these sandals a resolutely trendy and contemporary design, for a deliciously streetwise look.

ProductName: Logo sandals
Description: These contemporary logo sandals have two crossed straps. Sophisticated but comfortable shoes by Jimmy Choo.

ProductName: Patterson nylon sandals
Description: Burberry stripes is the strength of a quartet of colours that goes perfectly with the Patterson nylon sandals. A Spartian allure with unbridled comfort.

ProductName: Quentin sandals
Description: These Quentin sandals are an elegant way for men to show off their feet. This runway piece with Gucci's signature horsebit chain is ideal for every day.

ProductName: Buckled sandals
Description: With a very subtle play of interlaced straps, these buckled sandals demonstrate Dries Van Noten's bold style. An elegant, on-trend leather piece.

ProductName: x Random Identities Arizona sandals
Description: The German company Birkenstock has joined forces with the prestigious Random Identities label to develop this incredible variation on their Arizona sandals in a contemporary graphic design with a dreamlike feel.

ProductName: Gel-cumulus 21 Running Sneakers
Description: Weight 295g. Jacquard mesh upper,Front lace-up closure. Reflective details. Logo details. FlyteFoam™ Propel technology. Rear and forefoot GEL™ technology. Guidance Line™ technology. I.G.S™ (Impact Guidance System) technology. FuidRide™ cushioning. EVA sock liner. AHAR™ rubber sole

ProductName: Men's Johnston \u0026 Murphy Wagner Plain Toe Oxford
Description: Brogued contrast panels touch up a handsome oxford built from supple tumbled nubuck leather with memory foam cushioning for superior ease. Style Name: Johnston \u0026 Murphy Wagner Plain Toe Oxford (Men). Style Number: 6048342. Available in stores.

ProductName: Men's Red Wing Wacouta Moc Toe Derby
Description: Handcrafted construction and lightweight comfort define a rustic American derby built from full-grain leather and set on a tough Vibram sole. Style Name: Red Wing Wacouta Moc Toe Derby (Men). Style Number: 6019142. Available in stores.

ProductName: Greg Lauren Navy Paul and Shark Edition Officer Coat
Description: Long sleeve panelled cable knit and rib knit cotton coat in navy. Raw edges throughout. Tonal poplin lining at shawl collar. Open front featuring button detailing. Welt pockets at waist. Textile patches in grey and navy at sleeve. Button fastening at vented back hem. Logo-engraved gold-tone hardware. Part of the Greg Lauren x Paul and Shark collaboration. Supplier color: Navy

ProductName: Oliver Peoples Indio Rectangle-Frame Metal Sunglasses
Description: Oliver Peoples' 'Indio' sunglasses are crafted from gold-tone titanium with an intricate filigree motif hand-engraved into the frames. They're fitted with rectangular lenses centered by an aviator-style saddle bridge. They're tinted to completely conceal your eyes.

ProductName: Lunetterie Generale - Architect Square Acetate Sunglasses - Mens - Crystal
Description: Lunetterie Generale - Lunetterie Générale's Architect sunglasses are made from beige-tinted acetate from which an 18kt gold-plated titanium structure can be appreciated. They're sculpted in Japan with a squared silhouette that is fitted with green-tinted lenses, providing UV protection as well as an anti-reflection finish.

ProductName: Cartier Eyewear - C De Cartier Aviator Titanium Sunglasses - Mens - Black
Description: Cartier Eyewear - These black C de Cartier aviator sunglasses are a smart example of Cartier's elevated aesthetic - the result of over 170 years of history. They're impeccably crafted in Japan from matte titanium to form an ultra-lightweight frame fitted with matching lenses, then are finished with a subtle C-shaped bridge above logo-engraved nose pads.

ProductName: Thom Browne Gold and Black TB-101 Sunglasses
Description: Round sunglasses in 12k gold-plated and black titanium. Blue lenses with 100% UV protection. Double bridge. Metal nose pads. Signature tricolor enamel detailing at temple tips. Size: 42.22 150.Hardside leather case featuring signature tricolor grosgrain pull-tab and magnetic fastening included. Supplier color: Black iron/12k gold/Blue lens

ProductName: BARTON PERREIRA Doyen Titanium Sunglasses
Description: Designed with a modified aviator style, BARTON PERREIRA's 'Doyen' sunglasses are made from lightweight titanium. Its gold-tone frames support gradient blue lenses that look stylish while protecting your eyes from the sun.

ProductName: Dior Homme Sunglasses - Half-rim Round Metal Sunglasses - Mens - Silver
Description: Dior Homme Sunglasses - Give your everyday edits a vintage-inspired perspective with Dior Homme's black sunglasses. They're crafted in Italy with a round silver-tone half-rim metal frame, then set with black-tinted lenses and optyl-laquered temples, detailed with the label's logo.

ProductName: Matsuda Eyewear Gold-Tone Metal Round-Frame Sunglasses
Description: Matsuda Eyewear relies on a shrinking pool of master craftsman to intricately filigree its premium metal frames, including this titanium variety. Completed with an antique gold finish, this pair has UV protective lenses but comes built with small side shields to decrease sun exposure even further.

ProductName: Alexander Mcqueen - Aviator Metal Sunglasses - Mens - Silver
Description: Alexander McQueen - The angular black-lacquered inserts on Alexander McQueen's silver-tone metal sunglasses lend a contemporary slant to the 1970s and 80s-inspired aviator frame. They're crafted in Italy with light-grey tinted lenses that offer good sun protection and rest on logo-debossed arms set with coordinating lacquered ear cuffs.

ProductName: BARTON PERREIRA Doyen Aviator-Style Titanium Sunglasses
Description: This season, Barton Perreira's signature 'Doyen' sunglasses are updated in a luxe rose gold tone. They're crafted from durable titanium into a timeless aviator-style silhouette with tinted lenses to protect your eyes from sunrays. They're really lightweight, making them comfortable enough for all-day wear.

ProductName: Cazal Men's 62MM Oversized Bar-Top Sunglasses - Silver
Description: Stunning statement glasses with gold details 62mm lens width; 15mm bridge width; 140mm temple length 100% UV protection Case and cleaning cloth included Acetate Imported. Men Accessories - Men Sunglasses \u003e Saks Fifth Avenue \u003e Barneys. Cazal. Color: Silver.

ProductName: Acne Studios - Aviator Metal Sunglasses - Mens - Silver
Description: Acne Studios - These silver-tone aviator sunglasses from Acne Studios are set with grey-tinted lenses and reflect the brand's signature 'Scandi-cool' aesthetic. Handcrafted in Italy, they feature ultra-slim metal arms and a sleek double bridge, and are finished with a tortoiseshell acetate accent across the temple tips.

ProductName: Mr. Leight Marmont Round Rose Gold And Acetate Sunglasses
Description: Mr. Leight named its round 'Marmont' sunglasses after famed hotel Chateau Marmont. This style has transparent pink acetate frames with genuine 18K rose gold tracing the perimeter of their mirror lenses.

ProductName: Matsuda Eyewear Round-Frame Acetate and Gold-Tone Sunglasses
Description: Each pair of Matsuda's sunglasses have a classic, retro feel because they're modeled after archival styles. This round-frame style is handcrafted in Japan from gold-tone titanium and matte-black acetate. They're really lightweight and have thin, flexible arms to ensure a comfortable fit.

ProductName: Jacques Marie Mage - Jagger Aviator Titanium Sunglasses - Mens - Silver
Description: Jacques Marie Mage - LA-based label Jacques Marie Mage muses on 1970s styles to conceive these striking titanium Jagger sunglasses. They're crafted in Japan by over 100 artisans with angular aviator frames set with brown gradient lenses and finished with gold-tone metal and red enamel tips.

ProductName: Matsuda Eyewear Gold-Tone Metal Round-Frame Sunglasses
Description: Made from the lightest titanium, this pair of Matsuda Eyewear's sunglasses demonstrates the brand's commitment to quality through its beautifully filigreed top bar and bridge. Designed with an antique gold-tone finish, this style is also engineered with tinted lenses that can flip up or down.

ProductName: Celine Eyewear - Half-shield Acetate Sunglasses - Mens - Tortoiseshell
Description: Celine Eyewear - Celine's brown sunglasses feature green-tinted rectangular lenses set into a half-shield frame that's rendered in glossy tortoiseshell acetate for a sophisticated nuance. They're crafted in Italy with gold-tone metal half rims and are accented on the tapered temples with the label's logo.

ProductName: Alexander Mcqueen - Skull-embellished Navigator Sunglasses - Mens - Gold
Description: Alexander McQueen - Alexander McQueen's signature skulls hallmark these gold-tone metal sunglasses from the SS19 collection. They're shaped to a squared navigator frame, with brown acetate inlays echoed in the tinted lenses that are 100% UV protected.

ProductName: Balenciaga - Logo-hardware Square Acetate Sunglasses - Mens - Black
Description: Balenciaga - Balenciaga's black sunglasses evoke a brooding, sophisticated look. The glossy acetate is shaped to a square silhouette with dark-tinted lenses and gold-tone metal BB hardware on the side for a striking accent.

ProductName: Celine Eyewear - Aviator Gold-tone Metal Sunglasses - Mens - Gold
Description: Celine Eyewear - Celine's gold sunglasses present an angular take on the timeless aviator silhouette. They're made in Italy with gold-tone metal frames, brown-tinted lenses and a double-bridged frame - ideal for bringing a retro twist to your vacation edit.

ProductName: Illesteva - Murdoch Round Acetate Sunglasses - Mens - Black
Description: Illesteva - Illesteva's matte acetate frame lends a contemporary twist to these black Murdoch sunglasses. Expertly handcrafted in Italy, they're shaped to a classic round style that's accented with brushed silver-tone metal hardware and pins, while the grey-tinted lenses offer high UV protection.

ProductName: Cartier Eyewear - C De Cartier Aviator Titanium Sunglasses - Mens - Gold
Description: Cartier Eyewear - These pale gold C de Cartier sunglasses are a statement of the French label's reputation for elevated craftsmanship, which dates back to 1847. They're made in Japan from polished titanium with an aviator-style double bridge and green-tinted lenses. Note how the nose bridge is sculpted into a C, a discreet feature for which the style is named.

ProductName: Dita Eyewear - Mach Seven Titanium And Acetate Sunglasses - Mens - Black
Description: Dita Eyewear - These black Mach Seven sunglasses are part of Dita's Mach series, which draws inspiration from the world of automotive racing. They're crafted in Japan from gold-tone titanium and black acetate, resulting in an aviator-style silhouette that feels refined and versatile.

ProductName: Lunetterie Generale - Café Racer Round Gold-plated Sunglasses - Mens - Gold
Description: Lunetterie Generale - Lunetterie Générale's round Café Racer sunglasses are a limited-edition offering and this pair is equipped with a 14kt gold-plated titanium frame. Tonally crafted with yellow lenses, they're protected from UV rays and offer an anti-reflective coating to minimise glare, while a hairline-engraved bridge and signature engraved-stripe tips showcase the label's refined approach to design.

ProductName: Jacques Marie Mage - Zephirin Square Acetate Sunglasses - Mens - Clear
Description: Jacques Marie Mage - Jacques Marie Mage's Zephirin sunglasses are pictured here with green-tinted lenses set within a squared clear-acetate frame. They take their inspiration from pre-WWII styles, big thinkers and ambitious outcasts, and are finished with silver-tone metal arms encased in acetate frames.

ProductName: Oliver Peoples - X The Row Hightree Round Metal Sunglasses - Mens - Gold
Description: Oliver Peoples - The linear engraving etched into Oliver Peoples' gold Hightree sunglasses reflects The Row's affinity for clear and simple silhouettes. They're crafted from titanium to a round frame with an extended top bar, and set with green-tinted lenses that lend a vintage feel.

ProductName: Cartier Eyewear - Santos-de Cartier Aviator Brushed-metal Sunglasses - Mens - Gold
Description: Cartier Eyewear - Cartier's gold-tone Santos de Cartier sunglasses are accented with rivets around the blue-tinted lenses that references the label's iconic watch of the same name. They're fashioned in Japan from brushed metal to a classic aviator silhouette and are detailed with engraved-logo temples and glossy black acetate tips.

ProductName: Cartier Eyewear - Havana Round Tortoiseshell-acetate Glasses - Mens - Clear
Description: Cartier Eyewear - Cartier Eyewear updates its Havana glasses in a lively colour palette of tan brown and orange that can be appreciated in the tortoiseshell-effect frame. They're made in Italy with clear lenses that can be replaced with your own prescription and feature gold-tone metal C-hinges and accents that are house emblems.

ProductName: Men's Christian Louboutin Dandelion Loafer
Description: An elaborate laser-cut rococo design defines a head-turning Italian loafer built from rich calfskin and set on a bold red sole. Style Name: Christian Louboutin Dandelion Loafer (Men). Style Number: 5933212. Available in stores.

ProductName: Men's Allen Edmonds Wooster Street Penny Loafer
Description: Lustrous leather elevates a clean, American-made penny loafer featuring a shock-absorbing footbed and speed welt for resoling. Allen Edmonds has been making shoes in America for nearly 100 years using fine leathers, a 212-stepcrafting process and 360 degree Goodyear welt construction to ensure a high-quality product, every time. Style Name: Allen Edmonds Wooster Street Penny Loafer (Men). Style Number: 5801380. Available in stores.

ProductName: Grenson - Hamilton Horsebit Suede Loafers - Mens - Brown
Description: Grenson - Grenson's brown Hamilton loafers are an exquisite example of the Northampton-based label's 150-year tenure in shoe craftsmanship. They're made in the UK from suede with a stitched almond toe, a hand-sewn apron accented by a silver horsebit and rest on a stacked brown-leather heel.

ProductName: Rivieras - Classic 20° Canvas Loafers - Mens - Grey
Description: Rivieras - Rivieras' grey Classic 20° loafers are shaped with the effortless air of the Mediterranean coasts, captured through its mesh vamp, offering enhanced breathability. They're crafted to a round-toe shape, sat atop a white midsole that's offset with a jute-inspired pattern, then finished with a low heel.

ProductName: Church's Dawley Suede Penny Loafers
Description: Despite Church's refined appearance, their footwear options have an off-duty tone. Modern in craftsmanship defined by old English roots, each loafer, boot, and derby shoe highlights the brand's patriotism. These timeless 'Dawley' penny loafers have been faultlessly crafted in Italy from buttery suede set on Goodyear-welted soles for optimal durability. The neutral hue will work with nearly everything already in your wardrobe.

ProductName: Burberry Black TB Emile Loafers
Description: Panelled buffed calfskin loafers in black. Round moc toe. Logo hardware at vamp. Tonal topstitched detailing at heel. Tonal buffed leather lining. Tonal stacked leather midsole. Tonal leather outsole. Gold-tone hardware. Supplier color: Black

ProductName: Brixxen Prada shoes
Description: These Prada Brixxen lace-up boots stand out with their comfort. Perfect for bad weather, they can be worn together with an oversized raincoat.

ProductName: Patch jacket
Description: The Parisian designer Ami combines vintage style with classic details. The bold patterns, elegant collar and big front pockets of this lined patch jacket reveal their skill. Wear with leather trousers and ankle boots for a relaxed look.

ProductName: Men's Dr. Martens 2976 Chelsea Boot
Description: A durable Chelsea boot with wide elastic insets and a branded pull-tab is grounded by a chunky, translucent sole and built with a contrast-stitch Goodyear welt. Style Name: Dr. Martens 2976 Chelsea Boot (Women). Style Number: 5924337. Available in stores.

ProductName: Dr. Martens Black 1460 Contrast Stitch Boots
Description: Ankle-high buffed leather boots in black. Round toe. Tonal eight-eye lace-up closure. Logo-woven webbing pull-loop in black at heel collar. Signature topstitching in white at welt. Tonal signature treaded Air Cushion rubber sole. Black hardware. Supplier color: Black

ProductName: Eye/loewe/nature - Logo-patch Suede Hiking Boots - Mens - Navy/black
Description: Eye/LOEWE/Nature - These navy hiking boots are crafted as part of Eye/LOEWE/Nature's latest collection which offers durable outerwear inspired by Japan's picturesque Mount Fuji. They're made from soft suede that's layered with black technical canvas and leather panels that are debossed with a discreet logo, then secure with laces that loop through grosgrain hooks at the round toe.

ProductName: Amiri Men's Jodphur Conch Suede Ankle Boots - Fango Beige
Description: Suede ankle boots with stud buckle detail add a touch of Western style to your wardrobe. Suede upper Point toe Side buckle straps Silvertone stud detail Leather lining Leather sole Made in Italy SIZE Shaft, 19\ Leg opening, 9.75\. Men's Shoes - Designer Shoes \u003e Saks Fifth Avenue \u003e Barneys. Amiri. Color: Fango Beige. Size: 41 (8).

ProductName: Versace - Medusa-plaque Leather Chelsea Boots - Mens - Black Gold
Description: Versace - Versace's black leather boots are a polished iteration of the classic Chelsea style, first designed in the Victorian era after the queen requested a pair of boots without laces. They're made in Italy in a panelled construction with elasticated inserts and a stacked heel, then adorned with the iconic gold Medusa plaque.

ProductName: Maison Margiela White Advocate Tabi Boots
Description: Ankle-high painted suede boots in shades of white and black. Cleft square toe. Elasticized gusset at sides. Leather lining in beige. Signature white stitch at heel collar. Stacked leather heel. Leather sole in beige. Supplier color: White
