ProductName: Men's Micro-Weave Dinner Jacket w/ Satin Lapel, Navy
Description: Giorgio Armani dinner jacket in micro weave. Satin peak lapel; one-button front. Basted sleeves. Front besom pockets; chest welt pocket. Double-vented back. Slim fit. Virgin wool/cashmere. Polyester/mulberry silk trim. Viscose lining. Made in Italy.

ProductName: Balenciaga Satin-Lapel Gabardine Tuxedo Jacket
Description: This seamless tuxedo jacket by Balenciaga is the pinnacle of uncompromised modern style with its padded shoulders, satin-trimmed lapel, and structured silhouette. Dress this look down with a white T-shirt and classic jeans for an everyday look.

ProductName: Super 130s Wool Two-Piece Tuxedo
Description: Emporio Armani formal two-piece tuxedo suit. Notched lapel; single-button front. Finished sleeves; four-button detail at cuffs. Welt pockets at chest and hips. Double-vented back. Includes matching flat-front trousers with tapered leg. Unfinished hem to be tailored to desired length. Super 130s wool. Made in USA.

ProductName: Burberry - Mohair-blend Tuxedo - Mens - Black
Description: Burberry - Burberry's signature tuxedo is reworked in mohair and wool for Pre-AW19. Crafted in Italy to a slim-fitting silhouette, it has lightly padded shoulders, flapped pockets, and is finished with smooth satin trims at the lapels and down the legs. Runs true to size.

ProductName: Givenchy - Satin-trimmed Wool-blend Tuxedo - Mens - Black
Description: Givenchy - The classic look of Givenchy's black single-breasted tuxedo echoes the sophisticated mood of the house's SS20 menswear collection. It's made from a blend of wool and mohair and is accented with satin lapels and side stripes, then complete with a logo-jacquard lining.

ProductName: Men's David Donahue Russell Classic Fit Loro Piana Wool Peaked Lapel Tuxedo
Description: Sharp satin trim distinguishes a classic tuxedo featuring a single-button jacket with bold peak lapels. Style Name: David Donahue Russell Classic Fit Loro Piana Wool Peaked Lapel Tuxedo. Style Number: 660138. Available in stores.

ProductName: Grosgrain Peak-Lapel Tuxedo
Description: Tom Ford two-piece tuxedo. Black grosgrain peak lapel. Grosgrain-covered single-button front. Front besom pockets with grosgrain detail; hand-stitched chest welt pocket. Double vented back. Signature Tom Ford details like hand-rolled three-fold hand cord and exclusive blend lining. Flat-front trousers. 21cm width leg opening. Grosgrain taping down sides of trousers. Side adjusters for perfect fit. Internal pleated skirt lining in pants to keep shirt in place for smooth finish. Belt loops incl.

ProductName: Dolce \u0026 Gabbana - Martini-fit Wool-blend Three-piece Suit - Mens - Black
Description: Dolce \u0026 Gabbana - Fashioned in Italy with formal peak lapels and lustrous silk-satin trims, Dolce \u0026 Gabbana's black three-piece suit is the epitome of graceful modernity. It's cut to the label's slim Martini fit and comprises a single-breasted suit jacket with a low button stance that's ideal for lean silhouettes, and features a slim-fitting waistcoat and narrow-leg trousers with overlocked cuffs that can be altered for the perfect break. Fits true to size.

ProductName: Raised Geo Tuxedo Jacket
Description: Giorgio Armani tuxedo jacket in raised geometric pattern. Satin peaked lapels; one-button front. Left chest barchetta pocket; besom pockets at hip. Double vent. Main fabric: virgin wool/spandex. Second fabric: polyester/silk. Lining: viscose. Made in Italy.

ProductName: Men's Formal Douglas Tuxedo
Description: Tom Ford Douglas two-piece formal tuxedo. Peak lapel; one-button front. Basted sleeves. Side welt pockets; chest welt pocket. Flat-front trousers. Side adjusters for perfect fit. Belt loops included. Super 130's Barathea wool. Made in Italy.

ProductName: Prada Satin-Trimmed Wool-Blend Tuxedo
Description: Prada's Italian-made tuxedo is tailored from wool and mohair blend trimmed with lustrous satin for a sophisticated contrast. It's lined entirely to ensure it comfortably slips on over a button-up shirt before your next formal occasion.

ProductName: Givenchy - Single-button Satin Tuxedo Coat - Mens - Black
Description: Givenchy - Givenchy's black satin tuxedo coat offers up a revisited take on the traditional tailored silhouette. Exquisitely constructed in Italy from heavyweight satin, it features five pockets, adjustable cuffs and a sharp single button fastening. Fits true to size.

ProductName: Men's Wool Tuxedo Trousers w/ Contrast Side Stripes
Description: Men's formal tuxedo trousers by Burberry. Features contrast side stripes and buttons. Regular fit through straight leg. Regular rise. Side slip pockets. Back button-welt pockets. Concealed hook-and-bar/zip fly. Dry clean. Made in Italy.

ProductName: Thom Browne Men's Wool Regular Fit Tuxedo - Black
Description: Solid tuxedo impeccably tailored from a rich blend of wool and mohair imparts a debonair look. Wool/mohair. Dry clean. Made in Italy. Jacket Notch lapels Front two-button closure Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs Chest welt pocket Waist flap pockets Dual back vents Pants Zip fly with hook-and-bar closure Slash pockets Back buttoned welt pockets. Men Advcd Dsgnr - Advanced Designer Collec \u003e Saks Fifth Avenue \u003e Barneys. Thom Browne. Color: Black. Size: 1/S.

ProductName: side stripe track pants
Description: Blue and black side stripe track pants from Off Duty featuring a high rise, an elasticated waistband, side pockets, a back pocket, an embroidered logo to the front, a straight leg and a regular length.

ProductName: Balenciaga - Logo-print Cotton Track Pants - Mens - Cream
Description: Balenciaga - Demna Gvasalia's penchant for elevated streetwear is mirrored by Balenciaga's laid-back camel track pants. Ideal for carefree days, they're crafted from comfortable cotton jersey to a relaxed silhouette and accented by a small black lowercase logo on one side. Runs true to size.

ProductName: Blackbarrett By Neil Barrett - Knee-panel Jersey Track Pants - Mens - Black
Description: Blackbarrett by Neil Barrett - Blackbarrett by Neil Barrett's black track pants incorporate motocross inspiration to clear-cut lines with knee panelling and a mesh crotch. They're cut from a lightweight jersey to a tailored shape with an elasticated waistband, zip pockets and turn-up ankle cuffs for a sophisticated finish.

ProductName: Amiri - Tie-dye Cotton-jersey Track Pants - Mens - Multi
Description: Amiri - Amiri's multicoloured tie-dye track pants are part of the label's SS20 collection that pays homage to the Psychedelic era in the 1970s. They're crafted in the USA from soft cotton-jersey and feature an elasticated waistband, side-zip pockets and drawstring cuffs to taper the silhouette.

ProductName: Haider Ackermann - Tapered Cotton-blend Velvet Track Pants - Mens - Khaki
Description: Haider Ackermann - Haider Ackermann's green cotton-blend velvet track pants appeared in the SS20 runway show, which saw rich jewel tones balanced with muted colours. They're trimmed with brown grosgrain around the relaxed shape and have ribbed stitching at the back of the knees, before falling to tapered cuffs.

ProductName: Palm Angels - Logo-print Striped Track Pants - Mens - Purple White
Description: Palm Angels - Palm Angels's skate culture roots inspire the laid-back LA perspective of these purple track pants. They're made in Italy from lustrous jersey to a relaxed fit with a printed white logo and monochrome side trims which lead to zipped cuffs.

ProductName: Gucci - GG-logo Daisy Chevron-print Velvet Track Pants - Mens - Brown Multi
Description: Gucci - Gucci's brown track pants feature a chevron daisy print which captures Alessandro Michele's flair for reworking athleisure codes with the house's retro sensibility. They're made in Italy from smooth velvet with a touch of silk and hallmarked with a GG-jacquard logo down the relaxed legs, before gathering at the striped cuffs.

ProductName: Amiri - Panelled Technical-fleece Track Pants - Mens - Green
Description: Amiri - These khaki-green track pants are part of Amiri's AW19 collection, which continues to take cues from founder Mike Amiri's Californian youth with a modern perspective. They're made in the USA from fleece that's layered with technical twill panels and patch pockets, alongside a drawstring waist and cuffs. Fits true to size.

ProductName: Gucci - Side-stripe Jersey Track Pants - Mens - Brown
Description: Gucci - Alessandro Michele considers laid-back, sporty codes to create Gucci's brown track pants. They're crafted in Italy from thick jersey with a comfortable elasticated drawstring waist and yellow and green side stripes running down to the cropped, zipped cuffs.

ProductName: Y-3 Black Shell Track Pants
Description: Relaxed-fit panelled nylon-blend satin track pants in black. Mid-rise. Five-pocket styling. Drawstring at elasticized waistband. Tonal topstitched detailing at front and back. Elasticized cuffs. Zip-fly. Unlined. Tonal and silver-tone hardware. Supplier color: Black

ProductName: adidas Originals Black Vocal Lounge Pants
Description: Slim-fit French terry lounge pants in black. Mid-rise. Two-pocket styling. Drawstring at elasticized waistband. Logo embroidered in white at front leg. Signature webbing stripes in white at rib knit cuffs. Supplier color: Black

ProductName: Marcelo Burlon - Eye-appliqué Technical-fabric Track Pants - Mens - Black
Description: Marcelo Burlon - Marcelo Burlon's laid-back black track pants are accented by a red embroidered-eye appliqué patch on the back for a typically graphic edge. They're crafted in Italy from water-resistant technical fabric to a relaxed silhouette with a comfortable elasticated waist and are finished with a white embroidered logo on one side. Runs true to size.

ProductName: 2 Moncler 1952 - Drawstring-cuff Track Pants - Mens - White
Description: 2 Moncler 1952 - 2 Moncler 1952's white nylon-blend track pants are inspired by 1990s streetwear and youth culture, which taps the collection's archive theme. They're made to a relaxed fit subtly hallmarked with an appliqué logo at the back waist and have drawstring toggles at the cuffs.

ProductName: Off-White - Incompiuto-print Cotton-blend Track Pants - Mens - Black Beige
Description: Off-White - Off-White's beige cotton-blend jersey track pants are printed with the word 'Incompiuto' - the Italian word for 'unfinished' - a key theme for Pre-AW19 which references incomplete works of art. Made in Italy, they're hallmarked with black and grey logo tape down the sides and shaped for a relaxed fit with straight legs and zipped cuffs. They run true to size.

ProductName: Acne Studios Prescot Appliquéd Jersey Track Pants
Description: Acne Studios' 'Prescot' track pants are streamlined in design and appliquéd with the label's signature emoji face at the front. Its drawstring waist and striped detail at the side make these pants a staple athleisure piece in your wardrobe. Wear yours loose around the hips with an oversized hoodie and chunky sneakers for a comfortably chic everyday look.

ProductName: Y-3 - Logo-print Cotton Track Pants - Mens - Navy
Description: Y-3 - Ideal for relaxed days, Y-3's navy track pants are printed with a subtle logo at the side, maintaining the understated mood. They're crafted from soft cotton jersey with a comfortable elasticated drawstring waist and finished with a single back patch pocket.

ProductName: Burberry - Marshall Logo-embroidered Cotton Track Pants - Mens - Navy
Description: Burberry - The red and white hybrid logo embroidery on these navy Marshall track pants represents the new direction for Burberry as creative lead Riccardo Tisci continues to breathe new life into time-honoured codes. They're made from weighty loopback cotton that feels soft to the touch with an elasticated drawstring waistband and loose-fitting legs equipped with side slip pockets. Fits true to size.

ProductName: Brunello Cucinelli - Contrast-cuff Cotton-blend Track Pants - Mens - Charcoal
Description: Brunello Cucinelli - Brunello Cucinelli's grey track pants are crafted in Solomeo where the label is based, a small medieval hamlet based on the top of a romantic hill in Italy. They're made from soft cotton-blend jersey with light grey rib-knitted sections at the drawstring waist and cuffs. Runs true to size.

ProductName: Versace - Logo-embroidered Cotton Track Pants - Mens - Navy
Description: Versace - Give off-duty edit a subtle Baroque air with Versace's navy track pants, which are embroidered in white with the label's signature Greek-key bounded Medusa roundel. They're crafted in Italy from soft cotton jersey and have an elasticated waistband and tapered legs with ribbed cuffs. Fits true to size.

ProductName: Men's Nordstrom Men's Shop Brockton Dot Silk \u0026 Cotton Tie
Description: A clean-cut microdot grid defines a smart tie cut from a textured silk-cotton blend. Style Name: Nordstrom Men's Shop Brockton Dot Silk \u0026 Cotton Tie. Style Number: 5531549 1. Available in stores.

ProductName: jacquard bow tie
Description: Domenico Dolce and Stefano Gabbana are at the height of Italian luxury. Along with iconic prints and signature floral blooms, the notorious Italian designer duo are experts at fashioning timeless classics for the debonair uomo. This black, grey and white jacquard bow tie  is crafted from silk and features an all over print, an adjustable strap and hook fastening and a branded label at the back.

ProductName: Brioni 8cm Herringbone Silk Tie
Description: This Brioni tie has been expertly handcrafted in Italy from soft yet pliable silk that will perfectly hold its shape. The herringbone pattern is just understated enough to pass as a solid, so it'll go with everything. Shown here with Charvet shirt. - - Navy silk - 100% silk - Dry clean - Made in Italy

ProductName: Gucci 7cm Logo-Jacquard Silk Tie
Description: Mr Alessandro Michele has a real knack for reinterpreting Gucci 's house codes in a way that feels fresh and modern. For instance, the GG and diamond pattern on this tie is an adaptation of the iconic rhombi design from the '30s. It's been woven in Italy from silk-jacquard and has a structured black lining. Shown here with Charvet shirt. - - Navy, burgundy and white silk-jacquard - 100% silk - Dry clean - Made in Italy

ProductName: TOM FORD 8cm Prince Of Wales Checked Silk Tie
Description: TOM FORD 's tie is one you can wear often as it'll go with so many different colour suits, though we like it best paired with blue or grey. It's made from tonal-navy silk in a Prince of Wales check with slightly metallic threads that catch the light. - - Tonal-navy silk - 100% silk - Dry clean - Made in Italy

ProductName: Prada 7cm Printed Silk-Faille Tie
Description: Prada has been having a bit of fun with its logo of late, branding whales and fish with the house name. This tie has been crafted in Italy from silk-faille and printed all over with the sea creatures. Wear with a plain shirt to put it centre stage. - - Blue and white silk-faille - 100% silk - Dry clean - Made in Italy

ProductName: Charvet 8.5cm Silk-Jacquard Tie
Description: Charvet 's silk tie has a classically cut 8.5cm blade and jacquard-woven pattern that gives it a rich sheen similar to crushed-velvet from afar. It's been made in France, and has a substantial handle that will hold a crisp knot. Shown here with Charvet shirt. - - Sky-blue and white silk-jacquard - 100% silk - Dry clean - Made in France

ProductName: check tie
Description: Combining expert Italian craftsmanship with their penchant for menswear tailoring, DSQUARED2 provides a collection of wardrobe essentials for the modern gentleman. Crafted from silk, this black tie features a subtle check pattern.

ProductName: Canali 8cm Striped Silk Tie
Description: Canali has decades of history making refined formalwear and its ties are consistently of the highest quality. This one is woven from lustrous silk with white stripes angled traditionally from heart to sword. Shown here with Charvet shirt. - - Navy and white silk - 100% silk - Dry clean - Made in Italy

ProductName: Turnbull \u0026 Asser 8cm Polka-Dot Silk-Jacquard Tie
Description: Turnbull \u0026 Asser cleverly constructed this tie with a hidden loop which allows it to ruche and fall back into place after you wear it. It's considered details like this which prove that the tailor is deserving of its Royal Warrant. Made from silk-jacquard, it has a charming polka-dot pattern in red and blue shades that will really offset a white or navy shirt. Shown here with Charvet shirt. - - Red and tonal-blue silk-jacquard - 100% silk - Dry clean - Made in England

ProductName: Turnbull \u0026 Asser 8cm Ribbed Silk Tie
Description: Designed exclusively for MR PORTER. Each Turnbull \u0026 Asser silk tie is individually handmade in London, England to ensure high quality and an impeccable finish. Its ribbed appearance will add subtle flair to your most formal looks. Shown here with a Charvet shirt. The slimmer width of this tie is exclusively for MR PORTER. - - Black silk - 100% silk - Dry clean - Made in England

ProductName: Givenchy 6.5cm Logo-Jacquard Webbing-Trimmed Silk-Faille Tie
Description: When your jacket is closed, Givenchy 's black silk-faille tie looks pretty standard - it's when you undo a button and reveal the logo-jacquard webbing-trimmed tip that it becomes something really cool. In fact, we like it teamed with a crisp white shirt and leather biker jacket. - - Black and white silk-faille - 100% silk - Dry clean - Made in Italy

ProductName: De Bonne Facture 7cm Prince Of Wales Checked Linen Tie
Description: De Bonne Facture 's linen tie has been made in France by specialists using a century's worth of knowledge and time-tested techniques. It's woven with a classic Prince of Wales check and unlined for a lightweight hang. Shown here with Charvet shirt. - - Multicoloured linen - 100% linen - Dry clean - Made in France

ProductName: Canali 8cm Striped Mélange Silk And Cotton-Blend Tie
Description: Canali 's textured silk and cotton-blend tie is woven with shimmery gold stripes. Match the thicker diagonal lines to a crisp white shirt. Shown here with Charvet shirt. - - Tonal-blue, gold and white mélange silk and cotton-blend - 60% silk, 40% cotton - Dry clean - Made in Italy

ProductName: Brioni 7cm Mélange Silk And Linen-Blend Tie
Description: Brioni 's tie has been handmade in Italy from soft and pliable silk and linen-blend that'll spring back to its original shape after every wear. The light-blue yarns create a textural mélange finish that looks so smart against a white shirt. - - Light-blue mélange silk and linen-blend - 83% silk, 17% linen - Dry clean - Made in Italy

ProductName: Charvet 7.5cm Silk-Jacquard Tie
Description: It takes impeccable concentration and attention to detail to create a Charvet tie, which is why the brand's Parisian workshop is known for its silence. This cobalt version is cut and stitched by hand from silk-jacquard designed with a plum leaf pattern. Shown here with Charvet shirt. - - Cobalt and plum silk-jacquard - 100% silk - Dry clean - Made in France

ProductName: Charvet 7.5cm Silk-Jacquard Tie
Description: French shirtmaker Charvet has outfitted royalty, politicians and artists, so wearing one of its ties puts you in good company. This one is made from silk-jacquard woven in an irregular grid pattern that adds depth to the striking cobalt shade. The 7.5cm blade goes well with most lapel widths. Shown here with Charvet shirt. - - Cobalt silk-jacquard - 100% silk - Dry clean - Made in France

ProductName: TOM FORD Pre-Tied Velvet Bow Tie
Description: TOM FORD 's pre-tied bow is a real lifesaver if you struggle to achieve the perfect knot. It's been made in Italy from plush velvet and has an adjustable hook-fastening strap. The deep shade of indigo makes a nice subtle contrast to a classic black tuxedo. Shown here with TOM FORD shirt. - - Indigo velvet - Pre-tied - Hook fastening - 69% viscose, 31% cupro - Dry clean - Made in Italy

ProductName: Canali 8cm Silk Tie
Description: A tie that's as well-made as this Canali one will see you through everything from client meetings to wedding receptions. It's been woven in Italy from smooth silk and is a light-blue shade that'll sit nicely alongside crisp white shirts and grey tailoring. Shown here with Charvet shirt. - - Blue silk - 100% silk - Dry clean - Made in Italy

ProductName: stud detail bow tie
Description: Try a quirky piece. Raw edges give this bow tie an effortless feel. Add in some silver-tone studs and you have the perfect accessory. Featuring silver-tone stud detailing, an adjustable fit and raw edges.

ProductName: printed tie
Description: The reigning king of clash and chaos, Etro's dramatic prints are like no other. The brand is synonymous with Italian craftsmanship and eccentricity. This red printed tie features a paisley print.

ProductName: GG chains silk tie
Description: GG chains silk tie

ProductName: Saint Laurent 5cm Embroidered Pin-Dot Silk-Jacquard Tie
Description: Saint Laurent 's skinny tie is the perfect accompaniment to the house's slim suits – the narrow blades keep everything in proportion. Woven in Italy from black silk-jacquard, it's patterned with tonal stars and embroidered with small white pin-dots that look like a night sky. The chainmail keeper tab ensures it hangs neatly. - - Black silk-jacquard - White embroidery - 100% silk - Dry clean - Made in Italy

ProductName: Charvet 8.5cm Checked Silk-Jacquard Tie
Description: Whether dressing for a business meeting or a date, you really can't go wrong with a blue tie like Charvet 's. It's been impeccably made in France from silk and jacquard-woven in a classic check pattern. Team it with a white shirt and wide-lapel jacket to complement the 8.5cm blade. Shown here with Charvet shirt. - - Navy and sky-blue silk-jacquard - 100% silk - Dry clean - Made in France

ProductName: Favourbrook Pre-Tied Silk-Twill Bow Tie
Description: Favourbrook 's bow tie has been made by hand in England from lustrous black silk-twill. Inspired by '20s styles, this dapper piece will instantly spruce up your favourite suit or tuxedo. - - Black silk-twill - Hook fastening - 100% silk - Dry clean - Made in England

ProductName: Drake's 8cm Checked Silk-Grenadine Tie
Description: Drake's tie is made from lustrous silk-grenadine woven on old wooden looms and stitched by hand at the label's East London workshop. The traditional Blackwatch check is one of the best-known heritage tartans, which makes it a truly timeless choice. Shown here with Charvet shirt. - - Tonal-blue and green silk-grenadine - 100% silk - Dry clean - Made in England

ProductName: Classic Cut Micro Dot Silk Jacquard Tie
Description: A quintessentially British brand, Burberry creates iconic designs that seamlessly infuse their rich heritage with a contemporary aesthetic, as showcased by this hand-finished garnet pink silk tie. Featuring a pointed tip and an adjustable fit.

ProductName: Thom Sweeney Pre-Tied Velvet Bow Tie
Description: Perfect for the holiday season (and any time in between, really) Thom Sweeney 's bow tie is made from plush velvet in a deep green that's just as easy to wear as your go-to black version. Plus, it can be carried off at more casual events without looking too dressy. Shown here with TOM FORD shirt. - - Dark-green velvet - Pre-tied, hook fastening - 100% silk - Made in Italy

ProductName: Prada Pre-Tied Silk-Faille Bow Tie
Description: When the invitation says black tie optional , choose your favourite tux and finish it off with this Prada bow tie. It's been made in Italy from black silk-faille and comes pre-tied, so you don't have to stress about getting the knot just right.

ProductName: Sulka 8cm Paisley-Print Mulberry Silk-Twill Tie
Description: Shirtmaker and haberdasher Sulka opened its doors in 1893, and soon became famous for making quality ties from the best fabrics. Crafted from fine mulberry silk-twill, this tie is printed with a traditional paisley pattern – select one of the colours and match it to your pocket square. Shown here with Charvet shirt. - - Multicoloured mulberry silk-twill - 100% mulberry silk - Dry clean - Made in Italy

ProductName: Turnbull \u0026 Asser 8cm Embroidered Silk Tie
Description: The trick to nailing formalwear is in the details, and this includes a tie that knots and falls nicely. Turnbull \u0026 Asser 's has been made by hand in the brand's English workshop from lustrous silk, and is embroidered with small dots that won't feel too loud, even if you're wearing them with another pattern. - - Navy silk - Blue and white embroidery - 100% silk - Made in England

ProductName: classic bow tie
Description: The Caten twin designers behind luxury Canadian brand DSQUARED2 are renowned for their idiosyncratic take on classic tailoring. A perfect addition to the modern man’s accessory collection, this classic bow-tie has been expertly crafted in Italy from sleek black silk. The piece features a fixed bow, an adjustable fit, a clasp fastening at the back and a versatile tone that will complement a variety of suit styles.

ProductName: floral embroidered tie
Description: A perfect addition to the modern man’s accessories collection, this floral embroidered tie will give your formal wear the idiosyncratic DSQUARED2 uplift. It has been crafted in Italy from patterned silk and guarantees to offer a luxurious alternative to traditional neckwear. Accented with a blue and orange floral design, it also features a pointed tip and an adjustable fit.

ProductName: patterned tie
Description: When it comes to formal occasions, nothing quite beats Italian tailoring and this (insert item) from Dolce \u0026 Gabbana ticks all the style boxes. Exquisitely crafted in Italy from the finest silk, this black tie features a pointed tip and a spotted pattern.

ProductName: Modern Cut Oversized Check Silk Tie
Description: Updating classic styles with design flair and exquisite attention to detail is a hallmark of the Burberry brand. Crafted from charcoal grey silk, the Burberry Modern Cut tie is the must have fall accessory for casual day or evening wear featuring iconic Burberry house check.

ProductName: Shinola Men's Runwell 47MM Stainless Steel \u0026 Leather Watch - Burgundy Gold
Description: A classic timepiece boasting high-functionality and impeccable style is finished with a midnight blue dial and oxblood leather strap. Quartz movement Water resistant to 5ATM Round stainless steel case: 47mm (1.85\) Smooth bezel Midnight blue dial Numeral hour markers Second hand Leather strap bracelet, 22mm (.87\) Assembled in USA of Swiss and imported parts. Men Accessories - Watches And Gifts \u003e Saks Fifth Avenue \u003e Barneys. Shinola. Color: Burgundy Gold.

ProductName: Bremont Alt1-Classic/gn Automatic Chronograph 43mm Stainless Steel And Leather Watch
Description: This ALT1-Classic Bremont automatic chronograph is stylish enough to wear to formal occasions but is built to withstand extreme conditions. Made from hardened steel with a scratch-resistant sapphire crystal, it has undergone a testing that takes no less than 15 days, and the result is an impressively accurate timepiece that will last for generations. We offer a two-year warranty for all working parts and manufacturing faults for luxury watches. Call our Customer Care team for more information. Need more advice? ProductName: Breitling Chronomat B01 Chronograph 44mm Stainless Steel And Gold Watch
Description: Breitling calls this 'Chronomat' watch the ultimate pilot's chronograph, re-imagined for land, air and sea. Manufactured in Switzerland, this stainless steel and gold reference is engineered with the label's COSC-certified '01' self-winding mechanical movement that has a 70-hour power reserve. It's equipped with a rotating bezel, three sub-dials and tachymeter scale for accurate readings and utilises Super-LumiNova® coating for visibility in the dark. We offer a two-year warranty for all working parts and manufacturing faults for luxury watches. Call our Customer Care team for more information. Need more advice? Read the Luxury Watch Guide. - tMovement - Breitling 01 self-winding mechanical movement with a 70-hour power reserve - 47 jewels, 28, 800 vph tFunctions - Hour, minute and second hands - Date window - Chronograph: 1/4th second, 30-minute and 12-hour sub-dials tDial - Storm-blue and gold dial - Super-LumiNova®-coated gold-tone hands and indices, white markers - Tachymeter scale tCase - Stainless steel and gold case - Gold unidirectional bezel - Screw-in crown for date and time adjustments and manual winding, two gaskets - Domed anti-reflective sapphire crystal lens - Screw-down case back - Clasp-fastening stainless steel and gold bracelet strap tSpecifications - Case diameter: 44mm; case thickness: 16.95mm; strap width: 22mm - COSC-certified chronometer - Water resistance: 50 bar - Comes in a presentation case - Reference number: CB0110121B1C1 - Manufactured in Switzerland

ProductName: ARRAW Marine Ceramic 45mm
Description: RJ Watches designs, produces and assembles high-end Swiss timepieces. The iconic core collection, RJ ARRAW, is distinguished by highly-recognisable rubber RJ Bumpers. The ARRAW Marine Ceramic 45mm embodies the brand’s passion and commitment to true sophistication and distinctiveness. Crafted in Switzerland from satin-brushed black ceramic, the timepiece boasts an RJ2040 self-winding chronograph bi-directional movement, a sapphire crystal face and case back, a 100m water resistance, a 42-hour power reserve, Rhodium-plated and satin-brushed indexes with white SuperLuminova, a galvanic black gradient dial and a rubber strap with a titanium deployant buckle clasp. Functions include central hours and minutes, small seconds at 3 o'clock, central chronograph hand, 30 minutes counter at 9 o'clock, 12 hours counter and date window.

ProductName: Bremont U-2/51-Jet Automatic 43mm Stainless Steel And Leather Watch
Description: Bremont 's 'U-2/51-JET' watch was designed in commemoration of the RAF's 100 Squadron centenary, with a sleek look inspired by the stealthy 'Hawk T1' aircraft. It's expertly manufactured from hardened stainless steel and has an exhibition case back that lets you see the inner workings of the reliable BE-36AE automatic movement. The hands and numerals are coated with Super-LumiNova® for visibility in low light, and it comes with both a textured-leather and rubber strap for styling options. Description: Bell \u0026 Ross started out working with aeronautical control panel specialists, and has continued to employ the wisdom of industry experts to make sure all its watches have superior technical capabilities. This 'BR03-92 Nightlum' reference is designed to be readable even in the dead of night - set against a matte-black dial, each hand, index and numeral is coated with Super-LumiNova® C3. It's powered by a BR-CAL.302-calibre self-winding movement with a substantial 40-hour power reserve so leaving it off for a day or two isn't a problem, while the tough ceramic case and sapphire glass will resist scuffs and glare. We offer a five-year warranty for all working parts and manufacturing faults for luxury watches. Call our Customer Care team for more information. Need more advice? Description: In celebration of Bremont 's 10th anniversary (mind you, that's after its first collection went through five years of rigorous research and development), this 'ALT1-P2' watch is updated with a new dial, hands and case to increase accuracy and clarity - details that are imperative to a pilot's watch. Made in the UK from hardened stainless steel, this automatic chronometer is designed with a transparent case back to showcase the precision movement. The anti-reflective, scratch-resistant sapphire crystal lens is the finishing touch to this timeless piece, which has become a favourite of civilians and professional aviators alike. ProductName: Uniform Wares M40 Precidrive Rose Gold-Tone And Leather Watch
Description: While most labels are known for their logos and signatures, Uniform Wares ' lack of branding has become synonymous with its designs. This 'M40 PreciDrive' style is fitted with a sleek Italian leather buckled strap and has a polished rose gold-tone stainless steel case. The Swiss-made quartz movement inside is ten times more accurate than its standard offering - we're sold. - - Rose gold PVD-coated stainless steel case, light-brown leather strap (cow) - White dial with stainless steel indexing and hands, second, minute and hour hands and date window - Scratch-resistant, anti-reflective sapphire crystal lens, precision Swiss-made ETA F05.411 PRECIDRIVE movement - Rose gold PVD-coated stainless steel buckle fastening - Water resistance 5 bar - Two-year warranty - Comes in a presentation box - Made in Switzerland

ProductName: Moon Invader Space Invaders Pop 46mm
Description: RJ Watches designs, produces and assembles high-end Swiss timepieces with a twist. The brand is known for collaborations with iconic comic superheroes and gaming characters, which add a touch of intrigue to their sophisticated styles. The Moon Invader Space Invaders 46mm from RJ Watches showcases a multicoloured pixelated 3D dial with bead-blasted and satin-brushed levels depicting the famous gaming motifs. Crafted from black PVD polished titanium with steel bumpers, the timepiece features an RJ001-A self-winding movement, a Space Invaders patterned case back, an anti-reflective sapphire crystal face, a 30m water resistance, a 42-hour power reserve, Superluminova-filed hands and a black rubber strap with a steel deployant buckle clasp.

ProductName: IWC SCHAFFHAUSEN Tribute To Pallweber Edition 150 Years 45mm Stainless Steel And Croc-Effect Leather Watch
Description: IWC SCHAFFHAUSEN celebrates its 150th jubilee by recreating one of the most iconic designs from its archives. Inspired by the 'Pallweber' pocket watch that launched in 1884, this Swiss-made stainless steel model features the first-ever jumping-numeral display with hour and minute windows modelled after the original. The 94200 mechanical calibre - comprised of 290 individual parts - has been specifically engineered to maintain precision and a reliable 60-hour power reserve. We offer a two year warranty for all working parts and any manufacturing faults. - tMovement - Swiss-made 94200 hand-wound mechanical movement with 60-hour power reserve - 54 jewels, 4 Hz/ 28, 800 Vph tFunctions - Hour and minute windows - Second sub dial tDial - Lacquered blue and white dial tCase - Stainless steel case - Crown for date and time adjustments and manual winding - Anti-reflective sapphire glass - See-through case back - Buckle-fastening black Santoni croc-effect leather strap tSpecifications - Case diameter: 45mm; case thickness: 12mm - Water resistance: 3 bar - Comes in a presentation box - Reference number: IW505003 - Manufactured in Switzerland

ProductName: Sailor watch
Description: Brown leather Sailor watch from PAUL HEWITT.

Description: Founded in 1755, Vacheron Constantin crafts classic watches that will one day turn into precious heirlooms. This 'Patrimony' model has a perfectly round 18-karat rose gold case inspired by styles from the 1950s found in the storied watchmaker's archive. It's powered by a flawless calibre 1400 hand-wound movement that's engineered to meet the standard of excellency associated with the hallmark of Geneva - an exclusive certification of quality awarded to this 40mm style. A modern take on the label's most iconic design, the 'El Primero Sport' functions at an impressive 36, 000 vibrations per hour (Vph) and is accurate to within a tenth of a second. This sleek Swiss-made piece has a stainless steel case and a smoky slate-grey face for a decidedly masculine feel. Description: Limited to 250 pieces, IWC SCHAFFHAUSEN 's 18-karat red gold 'Big Pilot's' watch pays homage to journalist and aviator Mr Antoine de Saint-Exupéry - the tobacco-brown leather strap is inspired by his flight suit, while the tonal dial is etched with his initial. Description: This brushed stainless steel version of Uniform Wares ' 'M40' watch strikes the perfect balance between timeless style and modern minimalism. Description: Junghans ' handsome watch is a tribute to the work of architect, painter, sculptor and designer Mr Max Bill. ProductName: Gucci Dive 45mm Stainless Steel Watch
Description: This Gucci 'Dive' watch has a black dial embellished with a signature kingsnake – an animal believed to symbolise wisdom and power. It's been assembled in Switzerland from stainless steel, has a rotating bezel ticked in the house's green and red and is powered by a reliable quartz movement. Though it's a touch more rebellious than the standard timepiece, it's suitable for everyday wear. - - Stainless steel case and bracelet strap - Black and white dial, date window, luminous metal hands - ETA quartz movement - Clasp fastening - Water resistance 20 bar - Two-year warranty - Comes in a presentation box - Made in Switzerland

Description: Produced in a limited run of 500 pieces, Bell \u0026 Ross ' racing-inspired 'BR 03-94' watch is made with a resilient ceramic case that resembles the steering wheel of the Renault F1 car. The checked carbon fibre dial is offset by start/stop buttons and a speed-calculating tachymetre scale rendered in the same iconic yellow that has been used by Renault for decades. ProductName: GG2570 watch, 41mm
Description: First developed by Gucci in the 1950's, the Web continues to pay homage to the House's roots. The stripe motif adorns the strap giving the watch a sporty feel. Steel case with black sun-brushed dial, green and red Web nylon strap. ETA quartz movement. Water resistance: 10 ATM (330 feet/100 meters). Wrist size adjustable from 190mm to 232mm. YA142305. Swiss Made and two year international warranty.

ProductName: Sport-Tech watch
Description: It's always the right time to update your watch rotation. Versace's Sport-Tech watch offers a bold yet sophisticated take on wrist-wear. Finished with three chronograph counters as well as the brand's signature Medusa head logo embellishment, Versace knows the meaning of balance. Featuring a stainless steel 45mm round case, a tachymeter scale on the bezel, a sapphire crystal face, a white dial with a gold-tone Medusa head logo embellishment, three chronograph counters, a link strap with a folding buckle, a 3H Quartz movement, a date indication at 6 o'clock and a 10 ATM water resistance.

ProductName: Visvim High-Water Cropped Cotton-Twill Chinos
Description: Growing up in Tokyo, designer Hiroki Nakamura began collecting rare denim pieces since he was 14 years old. Inspired by his passion for artisanal, Visvim's cropped 'High-Water' chinos are cut from mid-weight cotton-twill and finished with vintage aged brass buttons and coin pockets that pay homage to classic trouser styles.

ProductName: Unconstructed 4-Bar chinos
Description: To pull off a classic yet daring look, Thom Browne presents a city trouser with avant-garde lines. The Unconstructed 4-Bar chinos hug the figure and show it at its best. Thom Browne features their signature touches on the side and back of this creation - four lines and a crest featuring a vintage design.

ProductName: Patch trousers
Description: Koché's patch trousers have a hybrid style, one side chinos and the other jeans, highlighted by the coloured turn ups.

ProductName: Balmain Black Chino Trousers
Description: Tapered stretch cotton twill chinos in black. Mid-rise. Four-pocket styling. Belt loops at waistband. Tonal textile logo patch featuring logo printed in white at back waistband. Zip-fly. Logo-engraved antiqued silver-tone hardware. Supplier color: Opa noir

ProductName: Givenchy Black Bootcut Chino Trousers
Description: Bootcut cotton-blend twill trousers in black. Mid-rise. Four-pocket styling. Belt loops at waistband. Logo printed in white at back pocket. Pleats at front and back. Unfinished hem. Button-fly. Tonal hardware. Supplier color: Black

ProductName: Noah NYC Beige Single-Pleat Chino Trousers
Description: Straight-leg cotton twill trousers in beige. Mid-rise. Four-pocket styling. Belt loops at waistband. Twin pleats at front. Embroidered logo in white at back waist. Zip-fly. Antiqued bronze-tone hardware. Supplier color: Khaki

ProductName: Thom Browne Navy Unconstructed Chino Trousers
Description: Relaxed-fit cotton twill trousers in navy. Mid-rise. Four-pocket styling. Belt loops at waistband. Logo patch in white at front leg. Signature tricolor grosgrain pull-loop at back waistband. Zip-fly. Supplier color: Navy

ProductName: Fendi Tan Stretch Chino Trousers
Description: Sim-fit stretch cotton twill trousers in tan. High-rise. Five-pocket styling. Belt loops at waistband. Central creases at front and back. Zip-fly. Logo-engraved black hardware. Supplier color: Sponge khaki

ProductName: Thom Browne Khaki Unconstructed Chino Trousers
Description: Straight-leg cotton twill trousers in khaki. High-rise. Cropped leg. Four-pocket styling. Belt loops and signature grosgrain tricolor flag at waistband. Signature stripes in white and graphic logo patch bonded in white at leg. Button-fly. Supper color: CamelSupplier textile: Cotton twill

ProductName: Men's Washed Flat-Front Chino Pants
Description: Incotex chino pants in washed stretch-twill. Quarter-top pockets; watch pocket; back button-welt pockets. Standard fit features flat front, normal rise, and straight leg; 20cm hem (15.6\ leg opening). Flattering, comfortable shape. Button/zip front; belt loops. Notched waist at back. Cotton/spandex. Made in Romania.

ProductName: Diesel Black P-Josh-L Chino Trousers
Description: Tapered cotton twill trousers in black. Mid-rise. Four-pocket styling. Belt loops at waistband. Patch pocket at outseam. Pleated detailing at front and back. Welt pocket featuring rubberized logo patch at back. Zip-fly. Unlined. Tonal hardware. Supplier color: Black

ProductName: RRL Officer Cotton-Twill Straight-Leg Pants
Description: RRL's classic 'Officer' chinos are the pair you'll wear again and again during the workweek. Cut from neutral cotton twill, the pants are designed with a straight leg and trim fit above the knee. Style yours with an element of texture, such as a rib-knit sweater.

ProductName: leather gloves
Description: Paul Smith mixes British eccentricity with a sense of refinement, quality and sophistication. These black leather gloves are crafted from lambskin and wool and feature a two tone design, a side embossed logo stamp, tonal stitching and a slit hem detail.

ProductName: top stitch detail gloves
Description: Since its creation in 1913, Milanese fashion house Prada has been rooted in the uncompromising pursuit of quality, style, class and innovation. These black leather gloves from Prada feature top stitch detailing, gathered wrists, a strap detail with snap closure engraved with logo and a cashmere lining.

ProductName: William Lockie Cashmere Gloves
Description: Scottish knitwear brand William Lockie has been employing members of the same families at its Hawick factory for generations – a group fondly known in the local community as 'Lockies'. These gloves are knitted from fine cashmere gently combed from the underfleece of Mongolian goats – prized not only for its softness but for its warmth and durability, too. - - Midnight-blue cashmere - Ribbed cuffs - 100% cashmere - Specialist clean - Made in the UK

ProductName: stitch detail gloves
Description: With eclectic inspiration and quirky designs combined with a passion for tailoring and real quality, Paul Smith creates pieces that are classic and wearable, with an essential element of British style. These black sheepskin stitch detail gloves from Paul Smith feature a side logo label.

ProductName: Dents Shaftesbury Touchscreen Cashmere-Lined Leather Gloves
Description: Dents ' 'Shaftesbury' gloves have been specially engineered for use with touch-screen devices, so there's no need to remove them when taking calls. Hand-sewn from soft leather and lined with knitted cashmere for a luxurious feel, they'll keep the cold at bay on chilly days. - - Black leather - Stitched top, vented cuffs, fully lined - 100% leather (sheep), lining: 100% cashmere - Specialist clean - Imported

ProductName: ribbed gloves
Description: N.Peal supplies some of the highest quality cashmere in experimental silhouettes and poppy colours. These blue cashmere ribbed gloves from N.Peal feature a slim fit.

ProductName: embroidered logo gloves
Description: Versace continues to remember its founder, Gianni Versace. And the label gives you the chance to do so as well, offering these black lambskin embroidered logo gloves. Feeling nostalgic yet? Featuring an embroidered logo to the front.

ProductName: GG knit fingerless gloves
Description: The Gucci collection is the pinnacle of Italian craftsmanship and attention to detail as seen in this dark blue wool gloves, featuring a ribbed hem, a fingerless design and an intarsia knit GG detail.

ProductName: x FUTUR Wind Guard gloves
Description: Designed in collaboration with FUTUR, MIZUNO's gloves are guaranteed to block out the chill and keep your hands nice and warm when cold temperatures roll round. They're made from black shell and minimally detailed with the brand's logo. Wrap up. Featuring a logo stamp and velcro-fastening cuffs.

ProductName: Maison Margiela - Split Wool-blend Mittens - Mens - Dark Grey
Description: Maison Margiela - Maison Margiela riffs on its signature Tabi silhouette with these grey Split mittens. They're crafted in Italy from a wool-blend thread with sumptuously soft cashmere, shaped with a split between the fingers and finish with a waved and ribbed-knit cuff.

ProductName: Givenchy Red and White Mezzi Moto Gloves
Description: Panelled buffed lambskin fingerless gloves in red and white. Leather logo patch in black and logo embroidered in white at face. Padded detailing at knuckles. Adjustable Velcro strap in black at palm. Leather logo patch at interior. Supplier color: Red/White

ProductName: logo plaque gloves
Description: German fashion designer Philipp Plein is renowned for his dark aesthetic and love of skull prints. These black leather logo plaque gloves from Philipp Plein feature a smooth surface with a matte finish.

ProductName: floral-knit vest
Description: Etro's unmistakable bohemian roots result in the beautifully made and tradition-infused products that the labels puts out season after season. Crafted from wool-blend, this knitted vest features a v-neck, a sleeveless design, a relaxed fit, ribbed trimming and a floral pattern.

ProductName: Atom LT vest
Description: Forget about making an excuse to not go on the hiking trip you agreed to with your friends this weekend. Simply gear yourself up into this black Atom LT vest from Arc'teryx that has a padded interior which will keep you warm whilst you head up the hills. Featuring a high standing collar, a front zip fastening, an embroidered logo to the front, stitched panels and a padded interior.

ProductName: Down Sweater Vest
Description: Green feather down Down Sweater Vest from PATAGONIA featuring a front zip fastening, a sleeveless design, a logo to the outside, a padded interior and side pockets.  POSITIVELY CONSCIOUS: We’ve joined forces with ethical agency Good On You to give you the power to choose positively. This piece is from a brand that scores well on their key criteria.
