ProductName: misaligned striped gilet
Description: For those who live life a little misaligned and like it that way, Jil Sander presents this white silk blend misaligned striped gilet. Featuring a round neck, a sleeveless design, a striped pattern and a front zip fastening.

ProductName: Men's Canada Goose Freestyle Trim Fit Down Vest
Description: A slightly trimmer, updated version of Canada Goose's 4150 Freestyle down-insulated vest offers the same water-resistant finish to keep the core warm and dry. An explorer-inspired logo patch brands the chest. Style Name: Canada Goose Freestyle Trim Fit Down Vest. Style Number: 5894619 1. Available in stores.

ProductName: Dennis waistcoat
Description: A brand with tradition and family at its core, Tagliatore presents elegant tailoring and flattering silhouettes through their ever-evolving collections. This multicoloured virgin wool Dennis waistcoat from Tagliatore features classic lapels, a front button fastening, a sleeveless design and a fitted silhouette.

ProductName: colour block down gilet
Description: Orange cotton colour block down gilet from Brunello Cucinelli featuring a high standing collar, a sleeveless design, a front button fastening, a broad welt chest pocket, front welt pockets, welt details and a curved hem.

ProductName: embroidered logo hooded gilet
Description: Keep it simple but never boring. This navy blue gilet from Moncler is detailed with an embroidered logo to the hood and a front logo patch, making it the perfect go-to for a relaxed look that doesn't compromise on style. Don't let it get away. Featuring a hood with drawstring tie fastenings, a two-way zip fastening, a sleeveless design, front zipped pockets and a short length.

ProductName: Velvet Trim Down-filled Nylon Puffer Gilet
Description: A nylon gilet quilted in goose down and feathers. The exaggerated funnel neck is lined in velvet and finished with a back zip detail.

ProductName: Dries Van Noten 4cm Black Suede-Trimmed Webbing Belt
Description: Wear Dries Van Noten 's black webbing belt with tailored trousers for a cool textural contrast. This Italian-made accessory is trimmed with smooth royal-blue suede and fastens with a Velcro® strap that can be easily adjusted. Please note, shipping restrictions apply This item is small to size. See Size \u0026 Fit notes. - - Black webbing, royal-blue suede (calf) - Velcro® and silver buckle fastenings - Made in Italy

ProductName: Astor belt
Description: Exquisite craftsmanship and unfailing attention to detail continue to define Bally’s celebrated style and this Astor belt is no exception. Constructed in Italy to the brand’s exacting standards, it has a rectangle silver-tone buckle fastening and a two-tone stripe detail, this supremely versatile piece makes everyday dressing a breeze.

ProductName: classic buckle belt
Description: Prada is famous for classical Italian leather goods and ready to wear with a creative edge. Miuccia produces designs inspired by society for the sartorially selective. Brown calf leather classic buckle belt from Prada with silver-tone hardware.

ProductName: buckel belt
Description: Navy blue suede buckel belt from Orciani.

ProductName: Giuseppe logo belt
Description: Known for his perfectly-crafted urban cool sneakers, Giuseppe Zanotti creates streetwear pieces that are at the height of sports luxury.  Case in point: this brown leather Giuseppe logo belt.  Featuring a front logo plaque, silver-tone hardware and a textured design.

ProductName: Maison Margiela 3cm Papaya Webbing Belt
Description: Maison Margiela is anything but conformist – that's why the brand's 'Stereotype' motif is a bit of an inside joke. This leather-trimmed belt has been made in Italy from durable papaya webbing and has a substantial metal buckle embossed with the design. If you want something on the quieter side, check out the all-black version. - - Papaya webbing - Black leather trim - Black buckle fastening - Comes with dust bag - Made in Italy

ProductName: ornate buckle belt
Description: Originally launched in 1961, French fashion house Saint Laurent continues to tap into its polished French aesthetic with every season. This black leather ornate buckle belt from Saint Laurent features antique effect silver-tone hardware.

ProductName: Dunhill 3cm Blue And Black Reversible Leather Belt
Description: Streamline your belt selection with this reversible style by Dunhill . Choose between a tactile Saffiano leather surface and a smooth black finish. The polished-silver buckle is set on a twist mechanism for easy reversal.

ProductName: DG buckle belt
Description: In case you didn't know, DG stands for Dolce \u0026 Gabbana. Because let's face it, the whole thing is way too long to put on the buckle of this dark brown calf leather belt. If you know, you know. Featuring a silver-tone buckle, punch hole detailing and a square tip.

ProductName: Reversible belt
Description: Designed with a reversible construction, this versatile style features a double loop detail to highlight both colours. Black leather reverses to brown leather. Palladium toned hardware. Square buckle. Gucci trademark print. 1.2\ width. Made in Italy. Gucci belts are in Italian sizes, please refer to the belt size guide before placing an order.

ProductName: logo buckle belt
Description: Tired of losing your trousers? Is your biggest fear standing in front of a meeting and your jeans fall to your ankles? Fix that problem easily with this black leather logo buckle belt from Salvatore Ferragamo. Nothing to fear here. Featuring an adjustable fastening, a buckle fastening and a front logo plaque.

ProductName: E buckle belt
Description: Etro draws on their traditional Italian roots when designing their collections - from shaping to prints, the bohemian-inspired brand continues to create retro-influenced pieces with a modern twist. This brown leather E buckle belt from Etro features an adjustable fit, punch hole detailing and a pointed tip.

ProductName: Haymarket check belt
Description: Check yourself. Are you wearing Burberry? If not, here is a good place to start. Made from leather, this belt features the brand's allover Haymarket check and is secured at the front via a silver-tone buckle fastening.

ProductName: logo engraved belt
Description: SANTONI 290003 BURDEOS HEB SIMPLE Leather

ProductName: Givenchy 3cm Black Leather Belt
Description: Givenchy 's 3cm belt is great for going unnoticed and keeping the lines of your suit or jeans streamlined. It's been crafted in Italy from smooth leather and finished with a small logo-engraved silver buckle. - - Black leather (calf) - Silver buckle fastening - Comes with dust bag and presentation box - Made in Italy

ProductName: Jean Shop 4cm Brown Distressed Leather Belt
Description: Rich brown leather and inky blue denim make a fail-safe combination, so opt for Jean Shop 's handsome belt the next time you reach for your favourite jeans. Rendered in a deep hue and lightly distressed, this piece exudes hardy appeal. Shown here with an Aspesi gilet, Several sweater, Jean Shop jeans, Red Wing Shoes boots and a J.Crew laptop bag. - - Brown leather (cow) - Distressed - Burnished gold buckle fastening

ProductName: Logo utility belt
Description: Heron Preston approaches streetwear with a conceptual view. Known as a cultural icon and a ‘hype innovator’, the designer is clearly more than just a designer. This black logo utility belt features an adjustable fit and a front logo patch.

ProductName: Loro Piana 3.5cm Midnight-Blue Suede Belt
Description: Loro Piana 's impeccable craftsmanship is evident in all of its designs, from knitwear to smaller pieces like this belt. It's been made in Italy from suede in a midnight-blue hue that will complement brown or grey tailoring. - - Midnight-blue suede (calf) - Silver buckle fastening - Comes with dust bag - Made in Italy

ProductName: adjustable industrial logo belt
Description: In life you need to take the bull by the horns (figuratively speaking, of course). When it comes to trousers, this red and black adjustable industrial logo belt from Off-White will help you in that department too. Nothing will come down with this baby! Featuring a buckle fastening and a lettering logo.

ProductName: interlocking ring belt
Description: Rick Owens specialises in avant-garde silhouettes in muted colour palettes this season. This black interlocking ring belt is crafted from buffalo leather and features silver-tone hardware, an adjustable fit, a skinny silhouette and a slide fastening.

ProductName: DG bicolour belt
Description: Dolce \u0026 Gabbana's textile accessories are expertly crafted for the man who likes to stand out with eye attention to detail. Red and blue leather DG bicolour belt from Dolce \u0026 Gabbana.

ProductName: reversible Bag Bugs belt
Description: Fendi's iconic Bag Bugs plaque embellished this grey and yellow calf leather belt's buckle for a quirky addition to your looks. And it is reversible for you to switch things up according to your mood. What else do you need? Featuring an adjustable fit.

ProductName: Leather belt with double G buckle
Description: Calfskin leather   belt heat-stamped to achieve a boar effect, giving it a textured appearance.   Finished with our signature double G buckle. Brown leather. Brass   hardware. Double G buckle. 4cm width. Made in Italy. Gucci belts are in Italian   sizes, please refer to the belt size guide before placing an order.

ProductName: Pantherella - Portobello Contrast-colour Socks - Mens - Black
Description: Pantherella - Following generations of quality craftsmanship, Pantherella remains a coveted choice for its classic yet comfortable designs, such as these black Portobello socks. They're made in the UK using cotton with a touch of stretch to lend the perfect fit, as pink and orange accents add a playful twist to the traditional style.

ProductName: Nike Squad Crew Socks
Description: Ribbed cuff. Logo details. Jacquard design. Size S= 34-38 EU / 2-5UK. Size M= 38/42 EU / 5-8Uk. Size L= 42/46 EU / 8-11 UK. Size XL= 46/50 EU / 11-14.5 UK

ProductName: Thom Browne Mid-Calf Striped Cotton Socks
Description: Knitted with the crisp look of the brand's tailored white shirts, these socks from Thom Brown are cleverly branded with his signature grosgrain detail. Four white stripes encircle one part of this lightweight cotton pair. Cropped trousers are perfect for showing them off, especially to other fans of the label.

ProductName: John Elliott - University Cotton T-shirt - Mens - Dark Grey
Description: John Elliott - John Elliott's grey University T-shirt is presented with a comfortable, oversized silhouette and relaxed crew neckline, showcasing the label's ability to imbue its distinct minimalist aesthetic through meticulous craftsmanship. It's made in the USA from recycled cotton, which features vintage-inspired blind stitching at the neck, sleeves and hem.

ProductName: Café Du Cycliste - Striped Cycling Socks - Mens - White Multi
Description: Café Du Cycliste - Café du Cycliste pays homage to its French roots with the red and blue stripes on these white cycling socks. True to the label's innovative design eye, they're crafted from a technical fabric that is breathable, moisture-wicking and fast-drying, then finished with a ribbed ankle cuff and a logo on the sole. They stretch to fit.

ProductName: Phipps - Moon-print Jersey Running Top - Mens - Black
Description: Phipps - This collaborative running top by Phipps and Millets debuted at the SS20 runway show and features a celestial print, which aims to create global awareness on climate change. It's crafted from moisture-wicking Polartec® jersey to a streamlined fit, then finished with a high neck, dual-branded logo and quarter-zip fastening.

ProductName: Falke - Lhasa Wool And Cashmere-blend Socks - Mens - Navy
Description: Falke - Casual yet luxurious, Falke's dark navy Lhasa socks are woven from a mid-weight wool and cashmere-blend that's naturally insulating. They have a soft rib for comfort and reinforced stress zones for durability. Wear them to round off endless looks.

ProductName: Officine Générale - Striped Cotton-blend Jersey T-shirt - Mens - Blue White
Description: Officine Générale - This relaxed blue and white T-shirt reflects Officine Générale's founding ethos of crafting pieces that will slot seamlessly into your everyday apparel. Cut from cotton-blend jersey infused with elements of linen, it has stripes across the relaxed silhouette and is finished with a ribbed crew neckline, a classic trope of staple tees. Fits true to size.

ProductName: Pantherella - Pembrey Cotton-blend Socks - Mens - Charcoal
Description: Pantherella - Pantherella's luxury craftsmanship is seen with these charcoal-grey Pembrey socks. They are constructed in the UK from Sea Island cotton that is cultivated in the British West Indies and has silky, durable, and soft characteristics. The ribbed-knit is finished with a seamless toe and heel panel and a smooth hand-linked toe.

ProductName: Gucci - Web-striped Cable-knit Wool-blend Socks - Mens - White
Description: Gucci - Gucci's multicoloured socks are perfect for drawing attention to cropped hems. They're spun in Italy from a soft wool-blend with a cable-knit pattern for subtle texture, and offset at the cuffs with the label's signature red and navy web-striped panel.

ProductName: Paco Rabanne - Velvet-devoré Dots Cotton-blend T-shirt - Mens - Black
Description: Paco Rabanne - Colourful dots like the velvet fil coupé accents on this black high-neck T-shirt were a key theme across Paco Rabanne's co-ed SS20 runway. It's made from stretch jersey to a second-skin silhouette and has satin inserts at the shoulders for a textural twist.

ProductName: Gucci - Bee-embroidered Chunky Ribbed-knit Socks - Mens - Black
Description: Gucci - Make a subtle nod to Gucci's eclectic aesthetic with these black ribbed-knit socks. They're spun from a heavyweight blend with a touch of wool for softness, and embroidered with a gleaming bee at the side - a nod to Alessandro Michele's love of nature.

ProductName: Falke - Cool 24/7 Invisible Cotton-blend Liner Socks - Mens - Black
Description: Falke - Falke's black Cool 24/7 Invisible liner socks are designed to be undetected beneath an array of shoe styles. They're crafted from a lightweight cotton-blend with moisture-managing technology to maintain a cool and comfortable fit throughout the day, and have an elasticated back edge and non-slip silicone heel grip.

ProductName: Falke - Cool 24/7 Invisible Cotton-blend Liner Socks - Mens - Blue
Description: Falke - Falke's blue Cool 24/7 Invisible liner socks are cut low on the foot in order to slip discreetly into an array of shoe styles. They're crafted from a moisture-managing cotton blend designed to maintain a cool and comfortable wear throughout the day, while an elasticated back edge and non-slip silicone heel provide extra grip.

ProductName: Falke - Tiago Cotton-blend Socks - Mens - Camel
Description: Falke - Falke's beige Tiago socks are crafted from a specialised mercerised cotton which imbues the yarn with a brilliant lustre and enhanced durability. Adorned with a tonal intarsia logo at the non-slip soles, the style features a calf-length ribbed cuff, reinforced stress zones and a flat toe seam for enhanced comfort.

ProductName: Gucci - GG-heart Silk-faille Pocket Square - Mens - Blue
Description: Gucci - Give your formal ensembles a playful final flourish with Gucci's blue pocket square. Crafted in Italy from lustrous silk faille, it's jacquard woven with red heart-bound GG motifs and completed with delicate rolled hems. Wear it with a block-coloured tie in a complementary hue for a sophisticated aesthetic.

ProductName: YUKETEN Zuricher Suede Sandals
Description: Yuki Matsuda of Yuketen collects high-quality materials from around the world in order to curate his collections of unique footwear. For fashion-forward nomads seeking adventure and hand-crafted pieces, opt for his loafers, small leather goods, and boots. The 'Zuricher' suede slides shouldn't be exclusive for the beach; they work well for any warm-weather plans.

ProductName: Givenchy Jaw Logo-Jacquard Leather Sandals
Description: Givenchy's 'Jaw' sandals are stacked on chunky rubber soles that are shaped to resemble teeth-so they'll give you a few extra inches in height. They're crafted from perforated leather and have overlapping webbing straps that are woven with the label's logo and signature 4G emblems. Use the velcro-fastening straps to adjust the fit.

ProductName: Orlebar Brown - Haston Cork Flip Flops - Mens - Blue Multi
Description: Orlebar Brown - Orlebar Brown's blue Haston flip flops are crafted with soft rubber straps that are finished with a discreet logo debossing. They're made with textured cork insoles and foam midsoles, then sit on rubber tread soles. Fits true to size.

ProductName: Ancient Greek Sandals - Hero Leather Flip Flops - Mens - Brown
Description: Ancient Greek Sandals - The simple construction of Ancient Greek Sandals' brown Hero flip flops conjures a warm-weather mood. They're handcrafted from leather in the label's Greek atelier and rest on a slight stacked sole that's topped with soft beige leather, embossed with the label's logo. They run true to size.

ProductName: Ancient Greek Sandals - Hero Leather Flip Flops - Mens - Black
Description: Ancient Greek Sandals - Ancient Greek Sandals' black Hero flip flops are crafted by skilled artisans using traditional time-honoured techniques. They're made from smooth, supple leather and shaped to a simple toe bar construction for ultimate ease of wear on warm days.

ProductName: Vetements - Anatomic Logo-embossed Flip Flops - Mens - Black
Description: Vetements - Seen throughout the SS20 runway show, Vetements' black Anatomic flip flops bear a shape that mimics the foot, which embodies the label's experimental approach to design. They're crafted in Italy with a white embossed logo at the strap and set on a monogram-debossed foam insole and rubber sole.

ProductName: Vetements - Anatomic Logo-embossed Flip Flops - Mens - Yellow
Description: Vetements - Appearing on the SS20 runway, Vetements' neon-yellow Anatomic flip flops are designed in the shape of a foot, reflecting the label's subversive twist on a classic poolside style. They're made in Italy from rubber with an embossed black logo across the strap and set on a branded foam and rubber sole.

ProductName: Gucci - Pursuit Quilted Leather Slides - Mens - Black
Description: Gucci - Gucci's black padded chevron-quilted iteration of their coveted Pursuit slides exude laid-back opulence. They're crafted in Italy from smooth leather with antiqued gold-tone logo plaques and grained leather-covered foam soles.

ProductName: Maison Margiela - Tabi Split-toe Leather Flip Flops - Mens - Black
Description: Maison Margiela - Inspired by traditional Japanese socks, Maison Margiela's split-toe code characterises the Tabi line and is channelled in these eponymous black flip flops. They're made in Italy from leather with high-shine front straps and a sturdy cut-out sole which is hallmarked at the insole and sole with the house's numbers motif. Fit runs true to size.

ProductName: John Lobb - Stratton Leather Sandals - Mens - Black
Description: John Lobb - John Lobb's prowess in creating leather footwear of exceptional quality is realised in these black Stratton sandals. Expertly crafted in Italy, they have a wide strap across the front and arch, the latter securing with a buckle, and have thick welt stitching. Fit runs true to size.

ProductName: Church's - Fisherman Suede Sandals - Mens - Brown
Description: Church's - Church's offers a khaki-brown iteration of the traditional Fisherman sandal -distinguished by a caged construction that's designed to prevent water from pooling inside. They're expertly made in Italy from supple suede that's shaped to a round toe atop small stacked heels, with a silver-tone metal buckle fastening.

ProductName: Suicoke - Moto-veu3 Two-strap Technical Slides - Mens - Yellow
Description: Suicoke - Founded in 2006, Tokyo-based label Suicoke began as a niche accessories label before branching out into performance footwear in 2014 and these grey Moto-VEU3 slides are a testament to the label's off-beat aesthetic. They're crafted with a reflective technical upper that's secured with dual yellow straps on wide overlapping panels, then set atop a durable Vibram sole for everyday outdoor wear.

ProductName: Suicoke - Zip Multi-strap Technical-canvas Sandals - Mens - Navy Multi
Description: Suicoke - Suicoke's navy Zip sandals are crafted with a moulded EVA footbed which allows natural movement that helps improve posture. They're made with panels of technical canvas and ripstop with slender straps which fasten with fuchsia-pink Velcro and rest on a serrated rubber sole.

ProductName: Grenson - Lorenzo Buckled Leather Sandals - Mens - Dark Brown
Description: Grenson - Grenson's dark brown Lorenzo sandals are characterised with an equally classic and artisanal appearance owed to the skilled Indian craftsmanship behind them. They're made from smooth leather partnered with pale gold buckles and are discreetly logo-debossed at the insole as well as fitted with an antislip rubber inset at the heel.

ProductName: Rick Owens Drkshdw - Pentagram-print Rubber Slides - Mens - Black White
Description: Rick Owens DRKSHDW - Rick Owens DRKSHDW's black rubber slides are printed with a signature white pentagram logo. They're made in Italy with antlers subtly embossed across the side and have a molded insole for everyday comfort.

ProductName: Givenchy - Jaw Contrast-panel Leather Sandals - Mens - Black
Description: Givenchy - Givenchy's black Jaw sandals are aptly named after the chunky white rubber sole, which resembles the shark's sharp teeth. They're crafted with perforated leather panels trimmed with black grosgrain and a braided grosgrain Velcro strap, while logo prints hallmark the side and heel. Fits true to size.

ProductName: Bottega Veneta - Logo-jacquard Buckled Canvas And Leather Slides - Mens - Black
Description: Bottega Veneta - Bottega Veneta's black canvas slides feature buckled straps that underpin Daniel Lee's contemporary vision for the house. Crafted in Italy, they're hallmarked with a subtle jacquard logo and rest on a comfortable moulded leather footbed that's set on a durable rubber tread sole. They run true to size.

ProductName: Lemaire - Square-toe Leather Sandals - Mens - Black
Description: Lemaire - The 1970s mood of Lemaire's SS20 lookbook is informed by Rüdiger Vogler in Wim Wenders's film Alice in the Cities and these caged-style leather sandals offer an elegant interpretation. They're made from vegetable-tanned leather with a square toe, T-bar and buckled ankle strap, then set on a beige grained-rubber sole.

ProductName: satin lapel tuxedo jacket
Description: Sartorial excellence and an eclectic vision combine for an exclusive assortment of tailored pieces presented for the recent Gucci collection. Crafted from Italian twill, this single-breasted jacket is defined by a wool blend construction, ensuring an ideal fit and drape. The front of the jacket finished with luxuriously smooth silk shawl lapels for a formal contrast to the classic tuxedo silhouette.

ProductName: DNA Sicily tuxedo blazer
Description: Fashion is in your DNA. Crafted from a virgin wool blend and cut in a tailored design, this black tuxedo blazer from Dolce \u0026 Gabbana is detailed with jacquard-effect peaked lapels and an embroidered logo patch to the front for an extra refined touch. The perfect pick for a bold formal look. Featuring a front button fastening, long sleeves, button cuffs, a chest pocket, front flap pockets and a rear central vent.

ProductName: Extreme tuxedo jacket
Description: Brutally fashionable, the new edit from Rick Owens is dark, rebellious and entirely wearable. This black wool Extreme tuxedo jacket from Rick Owens features a contrasting lapel, a front button fastening, two front pockets, button cuffs, a curved hem and a textured style.

ProductName: jacquard casino-fit tuxedo jacket
Description: Whether you're into gambling or not, this casino-fit tuxedo jacket from Dolce \u0026 Gabbana will suit any black-tie event. In silk, this fitted blazer is beautifully constructed from a silver-tone patterned jacquard. Crafted in Italy, this luxurious jacket is exquisite. Featuring peaked lapels, long sleeves, button cuffs, front flap pockets and a rear central vent.

ProductName: Men's Diamond Tuxedo Jacket
Description: Emporio Armani dinner jacket in diamond design. Satin peak lapel; hand-stitched silk button hole. Side besom pockets; chest welt pocket. Cuffs with four-button detail. Double-vented back. Virgin wool. Viscose lining. Dry clean. Imported.

ProductName: Alexander Mcqueen - Silk-trimmed Wool And Mohair-blend Tuxedo Jacket - Mens - Navy
Description: Alexander McQueen - Alexander McQueen's infuses its flamboyant house codes to the traditional tone of this navy tuxedo jacket, trimmed with large black silk peak lapels embroidered with intricate florals. It's tailored in Italy from a rich blend of wool and mohair to a slim fit that accentuates the frame.

ProductName: Men's Tuxedo with Contrast Satin Trim
Description: Valentino two-piece tuxedo with contrast satin lapels and trouser outseams. Peaked lapel; two-button front. Chest welt pocket; side flap pockets. Tonal embroidery at right sleeve cuff. Double-vented back. Matching flat-front trousers. Unfinished hem to be tailored to desired length. Wool/silk/nylon/spandex/polyester. Made in Italy.

ProductName: Men's Satin-Trim Formal Tuxedo
Description: Giorgio Armani two-piece tuxedo suit. Satin peak lapel; one-button front. Basted sleeves. Front besom pockets; chest welt pocket. Double-vented back. Slim fit. Flat-front trousers. Unfinished hem to be tailored to desired length. Virgin wool. Made in Italy.

ProductName: Men's Peak-Lapel Two-Piece Tuxedo Suit
Description: Brunello Cucinelli tuxedo in solid wool-silk blend. Peaked satin lapel; two-button front. Basted sleeves. Three front welt pockets. Double vent. Includes matching flat-front trousers. Virgin wool/silk. Made in Italy.

ProductName: Saks Fifth Avenue Men's COLLECTION BY SAMUELSOHN Classic-Fit Notched Lapel Wool Tuxedo - Black
Description: ONLY AT SAKS. From the Samuelsohn Collection. Luxuriously crafted in super 120 wool from the world-renowned Biella region, this refined design features full canvas construction for a remarkable fit. Wool. Dry clean. Imported of Italian fabric. JACKET One-piece notched collar One-button front Chest welt pocket Waist flap pockets Hand-sewn arm holes Long sleeves Buttoned cuffs About 31.5\ from shoulder to hem PANTS Banded waist with belt loops Zip fly Side slash pockets Inseam, about 32.5\ Unfinished hem. Mens Pvt Brands - Sfamc Clothing \u003e Saks Fifth Avenue \u003e Barneys. Saks Fifth Avenue. Color: Black. Size: 48 R.

ProductName: grain de poudre tube tuxedo jacket
Description: Established in 1961 by Yves Saint Laurent, French fashion house Saint Laurent is coveted for its quintessential Parisian aesthetic. Showcasing adept craftsmanship alongside luxury fabrics and expert design; the beloved label remains a cult classic with every season. A perfect example of that sartorial tradition is this black wool grain de poudre tube tuxedo jacket. Featuring peaked lapels, a front button fastening, front welt pockets, a back slit at hem and button cuffs.

ProductName: Men's Shawl-Collar Tuxedo Jacket
Description: Neil Barrett tuxedo jacket in solid weave. Shawl lapel; single-button front. Four-button cuffs. Barchetta pocket at chest. Front flap pockets. Double-vented back. Polyester/virgin wool/spandex. Made in Italy.

ProductName: Wool Two-Piece Tuxedo Suit
Description: Canali classic two-piece tuxedo suit. Peak lapel; single-button front. Welt pocket at chest. Besom pockets at hips. Double-vented back. Includes matching flat-front trousers with straight leg. Unfinished hem to be tailored to desired length. Wool. Made in Italy.

ProductName: Men's Houndstooth Grosgrain-Lapel Dinner Jacket
Description: Isaia tuxedo jacket in houndstooth. Single breasted, one-button front with peak lapel. Grosgrain collar and buttons. Double besom pockets. Welted barchetta [little boat] pocket at left chest. Patterned cloth cut by hand to ensure that all elements align perfectly. Yarn-dyed Bemburg linings for greater breathability. Collar cut at 60 degrees to ensure comfort and reduce gaps. Natural horse canvassing for a fit that gets better over time. Basted sleeves. Darted front for slim fit. Fully lined. .

ProductName: Balenciaga Black Seamless Tuxedo Blazer
Description: Long sleeve wool gabardine blazer in black. Tonal satin trim at shawl collar. Single-button closure at front. Flap pockets at waist. Padded shoulders. Welt pocket at interior. Full cupro satin lining. Supplier color: Black

ProductName: Thom Sweeney - Shawl-lapel Wool Tuxedo Jacket - Mens - Dark Navy
Description: Thom Sweeney - Thom Sweeney's dark navy tuxedo jacket features lustrous satin shawl lapels which heighten the formal mood. It's crafted in Italy with defined padded shoulders and neat side welt pockets, then accented by working satin-covered cuff buttons and lined with black satin for a clean drape.

ProductName: Givenchy - Tuxedo Double-breasted Wool Overcoat - Mens - Black
Description: Givenchy - First seen in the AW19 lookbook, Givenchy's black double-breasted overcoat features bonded silk-blend peak lapels that are reminiscent of tuxedo jackets. It's tailored in Italy for a loose fit with structured shoulders and chest-defining stitched-front darts, before ending in a sharp back vent. Black satin lining ensures it hangs perfectly. Runs true to size.

ProductName: Balmain - Double-breasted Satin-lapel Jacket - Mens - Black
Description: Balmain - The tailored jacket has become an iconic piece for Balmain and this black double-breasted style continues the sophisticated mood. The smooth twill is accented with lustrous satin lapels in a nod to classic tuxedos and fastens via signature crest-engraved buttons, while the asymmetric front lends a modern edge. Fits true to size.

ProductName: Holiday Boileau - Jagger Logo-embroidered Cotton-blend Polo Shirt - Mens - Light Green
Description: Holiday Boileau - The soft green hue of Holiday Boileau's Jagger polo shirt captures the penchant for pastels in the 1950s - a key decade of inspiration for the Parisian label. It's knitted from a soft cotton blend with a tactile waffled finish and is hallmarked on the chest with a white logo embroidery.

ProductName: Polo Ralph Lauren - Logo-embroidered Cotton-jersey Polo Shirt - Mens - Blue
Description: Polo Ralph Lauren - This vibrant blue iteration of Polo Ralph Lauren's signature polo shirt is crafted from naturally stretchy cotton jersey that allows for a trim fit. It's embroidered with the label's distinctive pony emblem on the chest and has a point collar, triple-buttoned placket and side-hem slits.

ProductName: Polo Ralph Lauren - Earth Logo-embroidered Piqué Polo Shirt - Mens - Black
Description: Polo Ralph Lauren - Polo Ralph Lauren's black Earth polo shirt is crafted from piqué made from 12 recycled plastic bottles and coloured using a unique carbon dyeing process that uses no water in the application of the dye. It's meticulously stitched around the sleeve cuffs for reinforced shape retention and features the house equestrian logo in green embroidery at the chest.

ProductName: Balmain - Logo-print Cotton-jersey Polo Shirt - Mens - Black
Description: Balmain - A white logo print across the chest lends Balmain's black polo shirt a graphic verve. It's crafted in Italy from lightweight and breathable cotton jersey and features a ribbed point collar and a notched neckline.

ProductName: Sunspel - Cotton-piqué Polo Shirt - Mens - White
Description: Sunspel - Sunspel specialises in well-made wardrobe essentials, and few items are more foundational than a white polo shirt. Crafted from breathable cotton-piqué, this slim-fitting iteration has a classic half-button placket.

ProductName: Burberry - Eddie Tb-logo Cotton-piqué Polo Shirt - Mens - Navy
Description: Burberry - This navy Eddie polo shirt cites Burberry's recently unveiled TB motif, - designed by Riccardo Tisci in collaboration with English art director Peter Saville. It's constructed from cotton piqué - synonymous with the time-honoured silhouette - and has a rib-knitted collar and front half placket - leave the buttons undone to show glimpses of the renowned House check.

ProductName: Giorgio Armani - Long-sleeve Knitted-wool Polo Shirt - Mens - Grey
Description: Giorgio Armani - Giorgio Armani's illustrious Italian flair is echoed in this grey knitted polo shirt. It's crafted in Italy from wool to a sumptuously soft fine-gauge knit with a ribbed collar and button-through quarter placket then finishes with ribbed edges for a comfortable fit. Runs true to size.

ProductName: Moncler - Logo-print Cotton-piqué Polo Shirt - Mens - Black
Description: Moncler - Moncler's black polo shirt encapsulates the label's relaxed sports appeal with ease. It's crafted from lightweight cotton piqué - favoured in athletics for its breathability - then fastens with a two-button placket and is trimmed with a ribbed collar and cuffs, while the new-season logo adorns the chest. Runs true to size.

ProductName: Odyssee - Foret Pointelle-knit Cotton Polo Shirt - Mens - Red
Description: Odyssee - Look to Odyssee for resort-ready staples with a vintage undertone, such as this red Foret polo shirt. It's crafted from pointelle-knit cotton with a ribbed collar and V-neck placket, then is finished with white stripes on the cuffs and hem. Runs true to size.

ProductName: Gucci - Logo-tape Stretch-cotton Piqué Polo Shirt - Mens - Beige Multi
Description: Gucci - Gucci's ivory polo shirt is crafted with camel appliqué tapes on the sleeves that feature interlocking GG monograms - a salient detail of the house's Resort 2020 collection. It's crafted in Italy from lightweight stretch-cotton piqué with a blue point collar and a stepped side-split hem. Fits true to size.

ProductName: Gucci - Cotton-piqué Polo Shirt - Mens - White
Description: Gucci - Gucci adds a pop of visual interest to the classic polo shirt with this white cotton-blend style. It's made in Italy for a slim fit with a point collar and short sleeves, and features aqua, cream and red grosgrain stripes down the shoulders - a reference to the house's signature Web stripes. Fits true to size.

ProductName: Frescobol Carioca - Trimmed Cotton-piqué Polo Shirt - Mens - Navy Multi
Description: Frescobol Carioca - The black trim on Frescobol Carioca's light blue polo shirt elevates the staple silhouette with the label's considered mood. It's made from cotton piqué - the waffled finish is ideal for regulating temperature and moisture-wicking - to a slim fit with a point collar and concealed buttoned quarter placket. Runs true to size.

ProductName: Moncler - Tipped-trim Logo-plaque Cotton-piqué Polo Shirt - Mens - Khaki

It's crafted from breathable cotton piqué that's hallmarked with a logo plaque on the chest and has a triple-buttoned placket and side-hem slits.

ProductName: Men's Shelton Patch-Pocket Silk Jacket
Description: TOM FORD \Shelton\ base cardigan jacket in solid weave. Notch lapel; hand-finished double-stitched silk button hole. Two-button front with hand-stitched buttons. Front patch pockets; hand-cut chest welt pocket. Signature Tom Ford details like hand-rolled three-fold hang cord. Tailored fit. Silk. Made in Italy.

ProductName: Gucci Reversible Multicolor Striped Cardigan
Description: Reversible long sleeve knit cotton cardigan striped in red, green, white, and tan. Rib knit spread collar, cuffs, and hem. Button closure at front. Welt pockets at waist. Silk lining. Reverse in off-white silk twill. Logo pattern printed in red and navy throughout. Rib knit spread collar, cuffs, and hem in green. Button closure at front. Welt pockets at waist. Supplier color: Camel

ProductName: rag and bone Navy Edmond Cardigan
Description: Long sleeve stretch reverse French terry cardigan in navy. Stripes in white at rib knit Y-neck collar, and cuffs. Horn button closure at front. Welt pockets at waist. Rib knit hem. Supplier color: Navy

ProductName: Noon Goons - The Droogs Striped Cardigan - Mens - Blue Multi
Description: Noon Goons - Named after the Los Angeles-formed band The Droogs, Noon Goons' blue cardigan captures the label's playful Californian sensibility. It's knitted with broad navy and ivory stripes and features logo embroidery by the front pockets.

ProductName: Iris Von Arnim - Jacumo Wool And Linen-blend Cardigan - Mens - Navy

ProductName: Inis Meáin - Brioche-knitted Organic Pima-cotton Cardigan - Mens - Khaki
Description: Inis Meáin - Inis Meáin's cardigan is rendered in a khaki-green hue that's inspired by the natural landscape of the rugged Irish island from which the label takes its name. It's brioche rib-knitted from soft and durable organic-pima cotton for a cushiony feel and has shawl lapels, relaxed drop-shoulder sleeves and front patch pockets.

ProductName: Gucci - GG Instarsia-knit Zip Cotton Cardigan - Mens - Navy Multi
Description: Gucci - The body of this navy Gucci cotton-knit cardigan is decorated with the interlocking GG logo, a symbol deriving from an original 1930s design. It's crafted in Italy and the style nods to the current 1970s ski sweater trend via the high neck, striped and red panels and front zip. Fits true to size.

ProductName: Raey - Loose-fit Cashmere Cardigan - Mens - Charcoal
Description: Raey - Launched in 2015, East London label Raey develops everyday staples with an effortless air including this charcoal-grey cardigan. It's crafted from soft cashmere to a relaxed silhouette, then shaped with a V-neckline and rib-knitted edges.

ProductName: Comme des Garcons Play Men's Dual Signature Logo Patch Wool Cardigan - Grey
Description: Ribbed woolen cardigan with embroidered logo patches V-neck Front button closure Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs Ribbed hem Wool Dry clean Imported. Men Adv Contemp - Advanced Contemp Collect \u003e Saks Fifth Avenue \u003e Barneys. Comme des Garcons Play. Color: Grey. Size: Medium.

ProductName: Gucci - Web Stripe Wool-knit Cardigan - Mens - Navy
Description: Gucci - Gucci's knitted navy cardigan features the label's iconic green and red Web stripe trims to the neckline and closure, inspired by preppy-college styles from North-East America. It's crafted in Italy from soft wool with ribbed cuffs and pearlescent buttons. Runs true to size.

ProductName: Men's Hanro Stretch Cotton Essentials Boxer Briefs

ProductName: Versace - Pack Of Three Jacquard Cotton-blend Briefs - Mens - White Multi
Description: Versace - Versace's pack of briefs arrives with three identical white pairs. Fit runs true to size.

ProductName: Schiesser - Karl Heinz Cotton Boxer Briefs - Mens - Dark Blue

ProductName: Men's Polo Ralph Lauren Logo Print Cotton Boxers

ProductName: Hamilton And Hare - Tubular Stretch-cotton Boxer Trunks - Mens - White

Their edit is comprised of classic silhouettes with modernized colors, lenses and geometric details that make each piece covetable and timeless. Rounded frames give off a vintage vibe-think of the 80s. These easy sunglasses have a simplistic design that teams well with any ensemble.

ProductName: Cartier Eyewear - Première De Cartier Square Acetate Sunglasses - Mens - Black

They're made in Italy with square frames set with black lenses that offer high UV protection and are finished with logo-engraved silver-tone metal tips.

ProductName: Bottega Veneta - Rectangular Tortoiseshell-acetate Glasses - Mens - Tortoiseshell

ProductName: Gucci - Aviator Acetate Sunglasses - Mens - Black

ProductName: Gucci - Web-striped Acetate And Metal Sunglasses - Mens - Black

ProductName: Thom Browne - Mirrored Aviator-frame Sunglasses - Mens - Black

ProductName: Cartier Eyewear - Première De Cartier Aviator Metal Sunglasses - Mens - Gold

ProductName: 3D cross iPhone XS max case

ProductName: bifold logo iPhone 8 case

ProductName: Cardholder and logo embellished iPhone 8 Case

ProductName: wings print iPhone X case

ProductName: Off-White - Tape Arrows Iphone® Xs Max Case - Mens - Black

ProductName: Christian Louboutin - Loubiphone Rubber Iphone® 7/8 Plus Case - Mens - Black Multi

ProductName: logo print iPhone X plus
Description: Get your iPhone protected in style for any undesirable falls with this logo print iPhone X plus from Palm Angels. Constructed with a durable material, this iPhone X plus case will keep your iPhone cooler than ever! Featuring a printed logo and a camera hole.

ProductName: Christian Louboutin - Loubiphone Rubber Iphone® 7/8 Case - Mens - White Multi

ProductName: Ophidia iPhone XR case
Description: Imagine being so co-ordinated that even your phone wears Gucci. Well, with this brown canvas Ophidia iPhone XR case from Gucci, dreams do come true. What are you waiting for? Featuring an all-over GG Supreme logo print and a Double G logo plaque to the front.

ProductName: round tortoise-shell sunglasses
Description: Tortoise shell brown acetate round tortoise-shell sunglasses from Prada Eyewear featuring a tortoiseshell effect, a rounded shape and solar filter slate grey lenses. This item comes with a protective case.

ProductName: penny loafers
Description: Classic style, a modern spirit and exceptional quality leatherwork have been hallmarks of Tod’s since its inception in the 1970’s, and all are very much at play in these timeless loafers. Elegant in its simplicity, the sleek round-toe silhouette has been expertly crafted in the label's Italian atelier from polished dark brown leather. Topped with a classic penny slot, exquisite tonal stitch detailing and side embossed logo stamp, this versatile pair also features a branded insole, a low heel and discreet zigzag trims. The result? A prestigious and traditionally smart shoe you’ll wear for years to come.

ProductName: Shark python-effect loafers
Description: Known for his perfectly crafted urban cool sneakers, Giuseppe Zanotti creates street-wear pieces that are the height of sports luxury. These loafers are crafted from python-effect leather and features a round toe, a slip-on style and a stacked heel.

ProductName: aviator sunglasses
Description: Prada is renowned for their expert Italian craftsmanship skills that date back to the 70s. For their SS18 eyewear collection, classic designs and colours are introduced to retro-inspired detailing. These aviator sunglasses from Prada feature straight arms with curved tips, 100% UVA and UVB protection, opaque black metal frames and green polarised lenses. This item comes with a protective case. This item is compatible with graduated lenses.

ProductName: bi-colour Medusa loafers
Description: Versace goes beyond utilising the actual brand name to represent their rich Italian heritage and contemporary design ethos through instantly-recognisable house codes. These black and white bi-colour Medusa loafers  are crafted from leather and feature a round toe, a ridged rubber sole, a low block heel, a two tone design and a Medusa head logo embellishment.

ProductName: Rubinacci Marphy Textured-Leather Tasselled Loafers
Description: Mr Luca Rubinacci and his friends came up with the 'Marphy' loafers over a decade ago as a more comfortable alternative to the styles they were wearing. This pair has been made in Italy from soft, flexible textured-leather and set on nubuck soles with rubber heel panels for traction. Shown here with Rubinacci polo shirt, Rubinacci trousers, Rubinacci coat. - - Black leather (deer) - Leather linings, nubuck and rubber soles - Made in Italy

ProductName: tassel embellished loafers
Description: Jimmy Choo are renowned for their luxury designs, infusing elegant silhouettes and timeless styles with an empowered sense of glamour. These black leather tassel embellished loafers from Jimmy Choo feature an almond toe, a pebbled leather texture, a brand embossed insole, a low block heel and a slip-on style.

ProductName: Valentino Garavani micro stud loafers

Crafted from luxury Italian black suede, these loafers from the AW18 collection feature a round toe, a branded insole, a slip-on style, a chunky low block heel for a versatile design that is accentuated by micro stud embellishments.

ProductName: logo plaque loafers
Description: For Prada’s menswear collections, the designer focuses on creating timeless yet innovative styles that will fit into any man’s wardrobe. These black leather loafers and sculpted in Italy and feature a silver tone logo, a slip-on style and are shaped with a square toe.

ProductName: Santoni Pebble-Grain Leather Monk-Strap Loafers
Description: Quality, passion for details and rigorous handmade workmanship are the key values of Italian label Santoni . Meticulously cobbled from pebble-grain leather, these monk-strap loafers are set on sturdy Goodyear®-welted soles meaning they're durable and can be easily resoled. Wear yours with relaxed tailoring. Shown here with MP Massimo Piombo suit, Massimo Alba shirt, Etro pocket square. This item is large to size. See Size \u0026 Fit notes. - - Dark-brown pebble-grain leather - Leather linings and Goodyear®-welted soles - Buckle fastenings - Come with dust bag - Made in Italy

ProductName: Bolly loafers
Description: Coveted by men and women the world over, Giuseppe Zanotti has been designing iconic footwear for almost a quarter of a century. The designer's glamorous shoes tread red carpets and runways, intricately crafted and sculpted, as seen with these grey leather Bolly loafers. Featuring a slip-on style, an embossed crocodile effect, a leather sole and a silver tone accessory to the upper.

ProductName: Rubinacci Marphy Suede-Trimmed Croc-Effect Leather Tasselled Loafers
Description: Don't tell him we told you, but one of Mr Luca Rubinacci 's secrets to looking as sharp as he always does is wearing apron-toe loafers, like this signature 'Marphy' pair. They've been crafted in Italy from sleek dark-brown leather with tonal suede trims. The neat bows are fixed, so you don't have to worry about them coming undone throughout the day. ProductName: Valentino Garavani Rockstud loafers
Description: Capture the essence of Italian luxury and glamour with the latest Valentino collection, as seen in these black leather Valentino Garavani Rockstud loafers. Featuring an almond toe, a slip-on style, a branded insole, a low block heel and Rockstud embellishments.

ProductName: Loro Piana Summer Walk Full-Grain Leather Loafers

ProductName: Foxley loafers
Description: Jimmy Choo is renowned for its luxurious leather shoes and accessories, infusing elegant silhouettes and timeless styles with an empowered sense of glamour. Crafted from black leather, these Foxley loafers feature a slip-on style, an embossed crocodile effect, a round toe, tassel detailing and a low block heel.

ProductName: formal penny loafers
Description: Upgrade your formal wardrobe. These immaculately crafted loafers from Prada will add an elegant sophistication to your look. Slip on some style. Featuring a branded insole, an almond toe, a slip-on style and a rubber sole.

ProductName: visvim Grizzly Leather-Trimmed Suede Boots
Description: visvim 's founder Mr Hiroki Nakamura watched Western films with his father and uncle as a child in Japan, which likely influenced his moccasin-inspired designs. One of the brand's most popular styles, these 'Grizzly' boots are made from panels of tactile suede and leather and hand-stitched together with fringing around the cuffs. They rest on Goodyear-welted soles so they're durable enough for any terrain and easy to repair down the line, too. Originally a couture house, the brand continues to introduce a concept of luxury and opulence into its creations. Made from leather, these black ankle boots have a pointed toe and a low block heel.

ProductName: Polo Ralph Lauren Slim-Fit Cotton-Piqué Polo Shirt

This piece is cut for a slim fit from breathable cotton-piqué and features a green embroidered emblem. Shown here with Polo Ralph Lauren shorts, A.P.C. jacket, Converse sneakers. Description: Tod's is a family-run company that has always striven for the utmost quality when delivering a complete range of future classics that should belong in every man’s wardrobe. These cocoa brown leather ankle boots from Tod's feature a round toe, a slip-on style, elasticated side panels, a leather lining and a rubber sole.

This dark blue logo embroidered cap is crafted from cotton and features a round top and a visor.
