Description: Long gone are the days when slides were reserved for wearing by the pool – slip on Versace 's pair with the brand's sweatpants and shirt and you're ready to take on the city streets, too. They've been made in Italy from leather and rest on moulded footbeds and rubber soles. Shown here with Versace shirt, Versace sweatpants. - - Black, yellow and white leather (calf) - Moulded footbeds, rubber soles - Made in Italy

ProductName: Slide sneakers
Description: Get that perfect distressed level with none of the wearing-in, with these Slide sneakers from Golden Goose. In an iconic design, and with a effortlessly cool feel, this pair will quickly become your go-to. Best foot forward...to the checkout. Featuring a signature star patch detail to the side, a gold-tone logo to the side, a logo patch at the tongue, an almond toe, a front lace up detail, a side zip fastening, an ankle length and a white rubber sole.

ProductName: Golden Goose White and Orange Slide High-Top Sneakers
Description: Handcrafted high-top buffed calfskin and suede sneakers in white and grey. Burnished edges and stitching in orange and smudging throughout. Round toe. Lace-up closure in grey. Textile logo patch at tongue. Padded collar. Signature graphic leather applique in black and logo stamp in gold-tone at outer sides. Zip closure at inner side. Leather trim in orange at heel. Tonal rubber midsole featuring smudging throughout. Treaded rubber outsole in black. Silver-tone hardware. Supplier color: White/Orange

ProductName: Valentino Garavani Rockstud Rubber Slides
Description: Valentino Garavani 's slides are detailed with the house's signature Rockstuds that complement the navy rubber nicely. The contoured footbeds feel comfy from the first wear, while the grooved soles provide grip even on slippery poolside surfaces. Shown here with Alexander McQueen shorts, Dries Van Noten T-shirt, Le Gramme bracelet. - - Navy rubber - Ruthenium Rockstuds, contoured footbeds - Come with dust bags - Made in Italy

ProductName: Slide high top sneakers
Description: Founded in 2000 by Francesca and Alessandro Gallo, Italian label Golden Goose focuses on creating laid back ready-to-wear with a fashion slant. These beige, silver and black leather Slide high top sneakers from Golden Goose featuring a round toe, a lace fastening, a padded ankle and contrasting panels.

ProductName: classic logo slides
Description: Adored design house Givenchy is renowned for creating lust-worthy accessories which signify the brand's expert Italian craftsmanship. Carried out on the Autumn Collection, Givenchy presents essential items for the season to come. This pair of white classic logo slides are a staple when it comes to a more casual to loungewear. Featuring a flat rubber sole, a round toe and a slip-on style.

ProductName: Slide high-top sneakers
Description: Defined by the rough and ready look, Golden Goose presents these blue leather Slide high-top sneakers which are purposely distressed and always include the signature star patch to the side. Slide these into your basket. Featuring a round toe, a lace-up front fastening, a logo patch at the tongue, a printed logo, a signature star patch to the side, a side zip fastening, a flat rubber sole and distressed effects.

ProductName: Brett Zip slides
Description: Giuseppe Zanotti is renowned for a contemporary take on masterful Italian leather craftsmanship that nods to a streetwear aesthetic. Adorned with a contrast zipper detail, these black and red leather Brett Zip slides from Giuseppe Zanotti feature an open toe, a front logo plaque, a slip-on style, a branded insole and a flat rubber sole.

ProductName: Slide hi-tops
Description: White and black cotton and leather Slide hi-tops from Golden Goose featuring a round toe, an ankle length, a lace fastening, a logo patch at the tongue, contrasting panels, a perforated detail, a side embossed logo stamp, a signature star patch detail, a white rubber sole and a distressed finish.

ProductName: striped slides
Description: Nobody unites fashion, form and function quite like adidas. Specialising in sneakers and streetwear, the mega-brand has become a symbol of sports luxury. Crafted from rubber, these slides feature a striped pattern, an open toe, a slip-on style and a flat rubber sole.  POSITIVELY CONSCIOUS: Adidas Group scores 4 out 5 by independent ethical brand rating agency Good On You. It uses eco-friendly materials in many products - 100% of its cotton is from sustainable sources and it's committed to use 100% recycled polyester by 2024. It traces and audits almost all of its supply chain to ensure good labour standards, and has committed to reduce carbon and water stress across its whole supplier base.

ProductName: flat slip-on sneakers
Description: Why not slip into something a little more comfortable? And these black flat slip-on sneakers from AGE are the perfect choice. Made for those lazy Spring/Summer days - these sneakers just slide-on and look great. What more can you ask for? Featuring a round toe, a branded insole, a slip-on style and a contrast white rubber sole.

ProductName: Golden Goose Navy Leather Slide Sneakers
Description: High-top grained leather and nubuck sneakers in navy. Smudging and distressing throughout. Round toe. Lace-up closure in red, blue, and grey. Textile logo patch in black and grey at tongue. Gold-tone logo stamp, stripe applique, and signature star applique at outer side. Zip closure at inner side. Buffed leather and terry cloth lining in off-white. Rubber midsole in off-white featuring text debossed at inner side. Treaded rubber outsole in black. Silver-tone hardware. Supplier color: Blue/White

ProductName: Icon slides
Description: The legendary Caten-twin designer’s behind luxury Italian fashion house DSQUARED2 continue to take inspiration from the youth and pop cultures for their AW18 footwear collection. Expect sharp lines and bold silhouettes remixed with signature edgy, rock-influenced detailing. These red rubber Icon slides from DSQUARED2 feature a round toe, a flat rubber sole, a slip-on style and a branded front strap.

ProductName: camouflage-print rubber slides
Description: Valentino's are covered in a camouflage-print but they're sure to turn heads when you wear them - how ironic. Crafted in Italy from durable rubber, they have a molded foot bed for the utmost comfort. Why blend in when you were born to stand out? Featuring a molded foot bed and open toe.

ProductName: Oddsy slides
Description: These 'Oddsy' slides from Off-White are as comfy and as they are stylish. Set on ridged rubber soles that ensure you won't slip on your way to and from the pool, they have molded footbeds to make them even more comfortable. Roll on summer. Featuring a ridged rubber sole and a molded footbed.

ProductName: Men's Ecco Corksphere Sandal
Description: A signature suspended cork footbed ensures adaptable comfort in a smart sandal with Fluidform Injection Technology for anatomical support. Style Name: Ecco Corksphere Sandal (Men). Style Number: 5743646. Available in stores.

ProductName: logo strap slides
Description: An evolution of the Fendi Vocabulary theme launched in 2017, the Fendi spring/summer 2018 collection sees new logo designs realised with a pop-art inspired, three-dimensional shadow effect. Splashed across bags, slides and sweatshirts, the Fendi logo is officially making a comeback.

ProductName: logo slides
Description: Givenchy’s menswear collection merges elements of the label’s sleek Parisian heritage with contemporary silhouettes inspired by the streets. These black and white cotton logo slides feature an open toe, a slip-on style, a side embossed logo stamp and a flat rubber sole.

ProductName: embossed logo slides
Description: Kenzo embodies Parisian-cool with sharp silhouettes and a punchy colour palette. These black embossed logo slides from Kenzo feature an open toe, a branded insole, a slip-on style and a flat rubber sole.

ProductName: Horsebit quilted slide sandals
Description: These Gucci lime green slide sandals channel the look of lavish house slippers, with a quilted finish and a slip-on style. They are topped with the House's iconic Interlocking G Horsebit detail in a mix of silver-tone and gold-tone. The pair come in a matching zipped travel case for travelling.

ProductName: FF logo slides
Description: The FF logo plays a starring role in Fendi’s most recent collection. Available in various colours and fabrics, the brand has created a line that results in retro, monogram covered streetwear. Crafted from white and black leather and rubber, these FF logo slides feature a slip-on style, crossover straps to the front, an open toe and a ridged rubber sole.

ProductName: Loro Piana Men's Suede Slides - Brown
Description: On-trend pool slides elevated with a luxe suede construction. Leather upper Open toe Slip-on style Molded footbed Rubber sole Made in Italy. Men's Shoes - Mens Classic Footwear \u003e Saks Fifth Avenue \u003e Barneys. Loro Piana. Color: Brown. Size: 41 (8).

ProductName: Dunhill Cross-Grain Leather Slides
Description: These Dunhill slides are too smart to think of as a pool shoe. In sleek black, they're made from soft cross-grain leather and have ergonomically moulded footbeds designed for comfort and support. The easy-on, easy-off nature makes them great for running quick errands, and will even help cut down on hassle while travelling. - - Black cross-grain leather (calf) - Designer emblem, moulded footbeds, rubber soles - Come with dust bags - Made in Italy

ProductName: Kingdom Print Slides
Description: Slides printed with logo lettering and ‘Kingdom’ – the name of Riccardo Tisci’s debut collection for Burberry.

ProductName: logo pool slides
Description: White and black PVC logo pool slides from BOSS.

ProductName: rubber GG slide sandal
Description: The slide sandal is enriched for Pre-Fall 2019 with a cut-out GG motif. The rubber strap portrays the distinctive pattern in a black tonal interpretation, with a raised texture and cut-out design that highlights the GG. The classic molded rubber sole is completed with the Gucci logo.

ProductName: GG Psychedelic print slides
Description: Do you have stars in your eyes? Take a trip to a world full of compliments, with these GG Psychedelic print slides. Gucci are here to be your guide. Featuring a monogram print, a multicolored pattern, an open toe, a slip-on style and a rubber sole.

ProductName: Trianon 18-Karat White Gold, Chalcedony And Lapis Cufflinks
Description: Trianon cufflinks are a wise investment - not only will you be able to wear them often, but they're the kind of quality pieces that become heirlooms. This pair is handcrafted with chalcedony and lapis bars held in 18-karat white gold settings and work just as well for board meetings as they do formal dinners. - - 18-karat white gold - Chalcedony, lapis - Stamped identification numbers - Come in a presentation box - MRPORTER.COM is a certified member of the Responsible Jewellery Council

ProductName: Paul Smith Zebra Silver-Tone And Enamel Cufflinks
Description: Cufflinks are a great way to take the stuffiness out of formalities. Paul Smith 's polished silver-tone pair is cast into the shape of zebras and enamelled with multicoloured stripes. Store them in the presentation box to keep them from getting lost or scuffed when you're not wearing them. - - Silver-tone metal - Multicoloured enamel - T-bar fastenings - Come in a presentation box - Imported

ProductName: Burberry Checked Silver-Tone Cufflinks
Description: It's no surprise that Burberry 's 'House Check' is prevalent in so many of the British brand's designs – it was originally created in the 1920s to line trench coats and has been popular ever since. These polished silver-tone brass cufflinks are engraved with the recognisable pattern and will complement almost every suit you own. - - Silver-tone brass - T-bar fastenings - Come in a presentation box - Imported

ProductName: Paul Smith Compass Silver-Tone Cufflinks
Description: Sir Paul Smith has eclectic taste and loves to travel – his brand's cufflinks feature everything from pencils and road signs to multicoloured zebras and, in this case, compasses. This silver-tone pair comes in a presentation box, so they would make a considerate gift for anyone heading off on an adventure. - - Silver-tone brass - T-bar fastenings - Come in a presentation box - Imported

ProductName: Pink-Gold Plated Gear Cuff Links
Description: Tateossian gear cuff links. Round mechanical movement. Pink golden-plated fronts. Whale back closure. Imported.

ProductName: Men's David Donahue Sterling Silver, Sodalite \u0026 Mother-Of-Pearl Cuff Links
Description: Inset design of mother-of-pearl and sodalite perfectly complements sterling silver cuff links. Style Name: David Donahue Sterling Silver, Sodalite \u0026 Mother-Of-Pearl Cuff Links. Style Number: 390973. Available in stores.

ProductName: Men's Dunhill Radial Gyro Mother-Of-Pearl Cuff Links
Description: Fine mother-of-pearl inlays elevate German-crafted cuff links which feature concentric gyroscopic rings for eye-catching appeal. Style Name: Dunhill Radial Gyro Mother-Of-Pearl Cuff Links. Style Number: 5989186. Available in stores.

ProductName: Versace Underwear Black and Blue Barocco Towel
Description: Rectangular cotton terrycloth towel featuring graphic printed in blue and black throughout. Logo woven in blue at face. Logo woven in black at back face. Fringed detailing at ends. Approx. 34 length x 68 height. Supplier color: Black/blue

ProductName: Brunello Cucinelli - Fringed-edge Cashmere-blend Twill Scarf - Mens - Beige
Description: Brunello Cucinelli - Brunello Cucinelli prides itself on artisanal craftsmanship and the use of luxe fabrics, as illustrated by this beige scarf. It's made in Italy from cashmere twill blended with elements of cotton and traces of silk to a plush handle and adorned with burgundy and grey stripes along the edge - note the fringed ends.

ProductName: Acne Studios - Toronty Wool-blend Scarf - Mens - Grey
Description: Acne Studios - Knitted in Italy from a light-grey wool blend that's brushed to a soft handle, Acne Studios' oversized Toronty scarf is a core staple in the label's accessories offering. The reversible design features the label's bold font moniker in a contrasting tonal shade of grey on both sides, and is finished with fringed edges.

ProductName: Acne Studios - Violett Paisley-print Cotton-blend Poplin Scarf - Mens - Black
Description: Acne Studios - Bandana-inspired scarfs brought a Western verve to Acne Studios' SS20 runway show and this dark navy Violett style is a subtle way to tap the Americana trend. Made in Italy from cotton-blend poplin thread with silk, it's printed in painterly grey and white paisley motifs then framed by a navy border.

ProductName: Loewe - Anagram-jacquard Wool-blend Scarf - Mens - Black White
Description: Loewe - Loewe's grey scarf features a tile-effect pattern that's hallmarked with the house's enduring Anagram motif - first designed in 1970 by renowned Spanish painter Vincente Vela. It's woven in Scotland from wool that's blended with a hint of sumptuous cashmere for softness and is accented with fringed edges.

ProductName: Dheygere Black Leather iPhone Case
Description: Buffed leather iPhone case in black. Adjustable chain link neck strap featuring logo disc at spring-ring fastening. Logo embossed at face. Card slot at back face. D-ring hardware, chain link trim, and lobster clasp fastenings at base. Silver-tone hardware. Approx. 4.75 length x 6.5 height; approx. 21 drop. Supplier color: Black

ProductName: Vetements - Logo-print Iphone® Xs Max Leather Phone Case - Mens - Black White
Description: Vetements - Parisian label Vetements uses its signature Gothic logo to lend an edgy slant to this black phone case. It's made in the UK from smooth moulded leather and will comfortably slot an iPhone® XS MAX.

ProductName: Norse Projects Ketel Mélange Fleece-Back Cotton-Jersey Sweatshirt
Description: Wardrobe staples are Norse Projects ' bread and butter – the brand focuses on comfortable cuts, timeless colours and practical fabrics. This 'Ketel' sweatshirt is cut from fleece-back cotton-jersey with retro triangle stitching at the neck. The ribbed trims and raglan shoulders keep it comfortable and prevent bunching when it's layered under a jacket, while the navy mélange shade looks especially good with blue and beige. Shown here with Pop Trading Company trousers, Cav Empt T-shirt, Noon Goons overshirt, Vans sneakers. - - Navy mélange fleece-back cotton-jersey - Crew neck, designer emblem, ribbed trims - 100% cotton - Machine wash - Imported

ProductName: Inis Meáin Linen Half-Zip Sweater
Description: Inis Meáin 's collections are crafted on the remote Irish island of the same name, but have found their way to specialist boutiques as far afield as New York and Tokyo, and our virtual shelves, of course. This sweater is knitted from warm but breathable mélange linen threads, and tipped with a leather-covered zip pull at the collar. Shown here with Barena overshirt, Officine Generale chinos, Officine Generale jacket, Mr P. shoes. - - Grey mélange linen - Ribbed trims - Zip fastening - 100% linen - Hand wash - Designer colour: Cliff - Made in Ireland

ProductName: adidas Originals Continental 80 Grosgrain-Trimmed Leather Sneakers
Description: Dropping as part of the 'Yung' series, adidas Originals has brought back these 'Continental 80' sneakers from its rich archives. A reissue of the original tennis style, this pair has been made from supple light-blue leather and dotted with perforations for breathability. They're decorated with designer emblems and two grosgrain stripes down the side. Shown here with Noon Goons overshirt, Stüssy sweatpants, Cav Empt T-shirt. - - Light-blue leather (cow), red and navy grosgrain - Designer emblems, perforated, French terry linings, rubber soles - Lace-up - Imported

ProductName: Schnayderman's Notch Check Overshirt
Description: Fabric: Mid-weight twill Houndstooth check Collared neck with notched lapels Long sleeves with button cuffs Button at front Patch chest pocket Shell: 52% polyester/48% wool Dry clean Made in Portugal Measurements Measurements from size M Length: 29.5in / 75cm Sleeve: 33.5in / 85cm Chest: 44in / 112cm

ProductName: Veja V-10 Rubber-Trimmed Leather Sneakers
Description: Veja describes itself as having two different feet - one stands firmly in the ecological world, while the other is in fashion. These 'V-10' leather sneakers are made from raw materials including rubber soles harvested from the Amazonian rainforest and organic cotton linings sourced from Ceará, Brazil. Shown here with AMI chinos, Sandro sweater, AMI overshirt. - - White and red leather - Padded collars, midnight-blue rubber trims, cotton linings, rubber soles - Lace-up - Imported

ProductName: ghost overshirt jacket
Description: Who said that being plain has to be boring? This minimal white cotton blend ghost overshirt jacket from Stone Island brings a whole new tailored style to your look that still feels comfortable with its relaxed construction. Keep it simply stylish. Featuring a classic collar, a front button fastening, two chest pockets, a relaxed fit, long sleeves and logo patch to the sleeve.

ProductName: Men's Frank And Oak Regular Fit Plaid Flannel Overshirt
Description: Soft, breathable wool keeps things comfortable in a flannel overshirt made in a bright plaid with multiple pockets for warming hands and stowing essentials. Style Name: Frank And Oak Regular Fit Plaid Flannel Overshirt. Style Number: 5958522. Available in stores.

ProductName: C.P. Company - Garment-dyed Cotton-blend Overshirt - Mens - Dark Green
Description: C.P. Company - C.P. Company's green overshirt is shaped to an oversized profile, allowing easy layering underneath even with thick knitwear. It's crafted from the label's unique 50 Fili cotton-nylon fabric, that's garment-dyed for softness and to achieve a rich shade, then finished with a signature lens accent on the left sleeve.

ProductName: Thom Sweeney - Single-breasted Poplin Raincoat - Mens - Navy
Description: Thom Sweeney - The understated mood of Thom Sweeney's navy raincoat ensures you'll turn to it year after year. It's crafted in Italy from water-repellent poplin to a relaxed silhouette with a sharp point collar and lined with soft taupe satin for a clean drape, then accented by horn buttons. Runs true to size.

ProductName: Malibu Colony Woven Faux Leather Sandals
Description: Malibu 's 'Colony' sandals are inspired by the huaraches Southern California surfers would bring back from Baja, Mexico. Coveted for their lightweight feel and durability, this modern version is made from cruelty-free faux leather and set on gripped rubber-crepe soles, so you can even wear them by the pool. Shown here with OrSlow jeans, KAPITAL T-dhirt, Chimala overshirt, Mr P. socks. - - Black faux leather - Moulded EVA footbeds, rubber-crepe soles - Imported

ProductName: Men's Topman Papertouch Snap-Up Overshirt
Description: A column of snaps climbs the front of a lightweight cotton overshirt styled in a pale neutral with a longer length that makes it easy to wear as a jacket. Style Name: Topman Papertouch Snap-Up Overshirt. Style Number: 6005694 1. Available in stores.

ProductName: Balmain - Logo-print Denim Overshirt - Mens - Black
Description: Balmain - A distressed white logo is emblazoned on the back of Balmain's black overshirt, lending it a streetwear vibe. It's crafted from lightweight denim with side zipped pockets and accented by silver-tone metal press studs embossed with signature crests for a military inflection.

ProductName: Off-White Slim-Fit Camouflage-Print Cotton-Twill Cargo Trousers
Description: Off-White 's Mr Virgil Abloh grew up skating in the '90s when cargo trousers were a park staple, and this pair is a throwback to those same styles. They've been made in Italy from durable cotton-twill and have diagonally placed pockets and signature camouflage lettering. Wear them with an outsized hoodie or overshirt. Shown here with Off-White sweatshirt, Off-White shirt, Off-White T-shirt, Off-White sneakers. - - Camouflage-print cotton-twill - Belt loops, two front slash pockets, three side cargo pockets, three back welt pockets, appliquéd designer emblem - Snap and zip fastening - 100% cotton - Machine wash - Made in Italy

ProductName: Lardini Pleated Stretch-Cotton Drawstring Trousers
Description: Lardini 's drawstring trousers have the comfort factor and look refined, too, so they'll work for many different occasions. They're tailored from cotton blended with stretch and have neat pleats at the front. On the back you'll spot the label's signature flower embroidery, which references lapel pins worn in the '70s. Shown here with Officine Generale T-shirt, Barena overshirt, Officine Creative sneakers. - - Olive stretch-cotton - Elasticated drawstring waistband, four pockets, front pleats, embroidered designer emblem, partially lined - Hook and zip fastening - 96% cotton, 4% elastane; lining: 55% polyester, 45% cotton - Dry clean - Made in Italy

ProductName: nonnative Dweller Slim-Fit Cotton-Corduroy Trousers
Description: nonnative 's rugged workwear-inspired pieces have garnered the Japanese label a cult following. These 'Dweller' trousers are cut from black cotton-corduroy in a relaxed, slim profile and already have that broken-in feel of pairs you've worn for years. Team them with an unbuttoned checked shirt and tee. Shown here with Neighborhood shirt, rag \u0026 bone T-shirt, Battenwear overshirt, Converse sneakers. - - Black cotton-corduroy - Belt loops, five pockets - 100% cotton - Dry clean - Made in Japan

ProductName: Craig Green - Shell-trimmed Checked Cotton-blend Jacket - Mens - Green
Description: Craig Green - Craig Green is lauded for transforming classic silhouettes with his distinctive aesthetic, as demonstrated by this green and black checked worker jacket. Fastened by concealed poppers, it's crafted from a cotton blend with a stitched shell front panel and white-trimmed pockets. Runs true to size.

ProductName: Off-White Tapered Shell Sweatpants
Description: Off-White 's sweatpants are modelled after the style that was popular in the '90s. Trimmed with white piping, they've been made in Italy from lightweight black shell and are elasticated at the waistband and cuffs to create a comfortable, tapered fit. Wear them with one of the brand's hoodies and a pair of sneakers. Shown here with Off-White T-shirt, Off-White overshirt, Off-White sneakers. - - Black shell - Elasticated drawstring waistband, front zipped pockets, back zipped pocket, white piping, designer emblem, elasticated cuffs - 100% nylon - Machine wash - Made in Italy

ProductName: Chimala Distressed Selvedge Denim Jeans
Description: There's a reason Chimala jeans are so coveted – each pair is meticulously made and purposefully distressed by artisans in the label's Japanese workshop for an authentic look. This pair has fading and whiskering for a perfectly love-worn finish, while the cuffs are turned up to show off the selvedge seam. Shown here with Officine Generale overshirt, Albam T-shirt, Converse sneakers. This item is large to size. See Size \u0026 Fit notes. - - Blue selvedge denim - Belt loops, five pockets, unfinished hems, distressed, whiskered, faded - Button fastenings - 100% cotton - Machine wash - Designer wash: Light Vintage - Made in Japan

ProductName: Off-White - Logo-print Denim Overshirt - Mens - Black
Description: Off-White - Off-White's black denim overshirt is an understated option for laid-back days, reflecting Virgil Abloh's interest in workwear tropes. It's crafted in Italy to a loose, boxy shape with a small white printed logo above the chest patch pockets.

ProductName: Lardini Tapered Pleated Pinstriped Linen Drawstring Trousers
Description: We always endorse wearing linen in balmy temperatures as the fabric is breathable, cooling and doesn't cling, which is why these Lardini drawstring trousers are ideal for sunny holidays or warm days back home. Tailored in Italy, this pinstriped pair is cut for a tapered fit and pleated and pressed through the front for a smart appearance. Shown here with Lardini polo shirt, Barena overshirt, Brunello Cucinelli sneakers. - - Blue and white mélange linen - Elasticated drawstring waistband, four pockets, pleated, unfinished hems - Button, hook and zip fastening - 100% linen - Dry clean - Made in Italy

ProductName: AMI Tapered Shell Sweatpants
Description: Escaping the city and heading to the country for the weekend is the concept behind AMI 's new collection, which includes pieces that seamlessly transition between both worlds. From the range, these sweatpants are made from lightweight shell and lined throughout with breathable mesh, so they're a solid option for travelling, relaxing and running errands in. They've got a comfy elasticated waistband and cuffs that enhance the tapered shape. Shown here with BILLY hoodie, A.P.C. overshirt, AMI sneakers. - - Black shell - Elasticated drawstring waistband, zipped fly, two front slash pockets, back patch pocket, elasticated cuffs, fully lined - 100% polyamide; lining: 100% polyester - Dry clean - Imported

ProductName: Bless - Woodhacker Corduroy Overshirt - Mens - Black
Description: Bless - This black Woodhacker overshirt reflects Bless's urban aesthetic. It's made in Germany from cotton corduroy and quilted on the inside for warmth, then fastened with neat buttons that extend to the flap pocket and cuffs. The fit is true to size with a relaxed silhouette.

ProductName: Loro Piana Slim-Fit Washed Cotton-Blend Trousers
Description: Loro Piana 's trousers are just the sort of thing you can wear to the office and take on sunny holidays. Made from a flexible cotton-blend that's washed for softness and comfort, they're cut in a tidy slim leg and finished with smart creases. Try yours with a linen shirt and unstructured blazer. Shown here with Brunello Cucinelli sweater, Loro Piana Overshirt, Brunello Cucinelli sneakers. - - White washed cotton-blend - Belt loops, notched waistband, four pockets, pressed creases - Button and zip fastening - 96% cotton, 4% elastane - Machine wash - Made in Italy

ProductName: Barena Venezia - Sheer Gingham-check Wool-blend Jacket - Mens - Navy
Description: Barena Venezia - Barena Venezia's navy jacket is crafted from impeccably finely woven virgin wool for a sheer quality that showcases the timeless gingham-checked jacquard. It's shaped in Italy to a boxy silhouette and has a classic spread collar and two-way zip.

ProductName: Hugo Boss Delaware Slim-Fit Stretch-Cotton Trousers
Description: The reason Hugo Boss ' 'Delaware' trousers are so popular comes down to the flattering, comfortable fit – they have a classic mid-rise and tidy slim profile. This pair is made from flexible stretch-cotton that provides plenty of room to move. Fold up the cuffs and wear them with low-top sneakers. Shown here with Tomas Maier overshirt, PS by Paul Smith T-shirt, Grenson sneakers. - - Navy stretch-cotton - Belt loops, five pockets - Button and zip fastening - 97% cotton, 3% elastane - Machine wash - Imported

ProductName: Barena Venezia - Cheno Piqué Overshirt - Mens - Navy
Description: Barena Venezia - Barena Venezia's navy Cheno overshirt typifies the Venice-based label's unstudied design ethos. It's crafted in Italy from a mid-weight piqué and is detailed with a point collar, patch pockets and a tidy buttoned French placket. Fits true to size.

ProductName: visvim Logo-Print Cotton-Jersey T-Shirt
Description: Made from soft cotton-jersey, visvim 's T-shirt has a comfortable regular fit and is printed with the brand's emblem at the chest. Team it with a rugged overshirt or bomber jacket. Shown here with visvim shirt, visvim trousers, visvim sneakers, Mr P. socks. - - White and tonal-grey cotton-jersey - Crew neck - 100% cotton - Hand wash - Made in Japan

ProductName: Fear Of God - Washed-cotton Overshirt - Mens - Grey
Description: Fear Of God - Fear of God's grey overshirt echoes the label's ethos of classic American workwear-inspired silhouettes reimagined for the modern wardrobe. The heavyweight cotton has a subtle washed effect and is shaped for a generous fit with velcro-adjustable cuffs, then finished with oversized flap pockets across the chest for a utilitarian finish.

ProductName: Off-White Bart Simpson Printed Cotton-Jersey T-Shirt
Description: Off-White 's SS19 collection features icons of rebellious youth, including the perennially 10-year-old Bart Simpson. This cotton-jersey T-shirt is printed with official artwork by Mr Matt Groening and signature pink arrows on the back. Follow the cartoon troublemaker's advice - Chill Man! - and wear yours with relaxed outfits. Shown here with Off-White jeans, Off-White overshirt, Off-White sneakers. - - Multicoloured cotton-jersey - Crew neck - 100% cotton - Machine wash - Imported

ProductName: Norse Projects Luther Shell Cargo Shorts
Description: Norse Projects ' 'Luther' shorts combine elements from sportswear and tailoring. Cut in a neat straight-leg profile, they're made from shell and kitted out with multiple pockets so you can keep your essentials close to hand.
