Description: Handcrafted ankle-high suede Chelsea boots in grey. Square toe. Integrated tonal pull-loop at heel collar. Tonal elasticized gusset at sides. Tonal suede lining. Stacked leather midsole. Leather outsole in tan. Supplier color: Oliver blackboard

ProductName: Montelliana - Tom Shearling-lined Lace-up Leather Boots - Mens - Black
Description: Montelliana - Montelliana's black Tom boots are lined in cosy shearling for an elevated alpine style. They're handmade from grained leather with silver-tone metal eyelets for a secure lace-up fit and set on a hardy Vibram sole that makes them ideal for walking on abrasive surfaces. They fit true to size.

ProductName: Dunhill - Duke Metallic-heel Leather Chelsea Boots - Mens - Black
Description: Dunhill - Dunhill's black Duke Chelsea boots capture the historical label's enduring blend of traditional elegance and discreetly modern accents. They're made in Italy from polished leather with classic elasticated panels on the side, then are set on a stacked sole with a gold-tone metal layer for a subtle metallic glint. Fit runs true to size.

ProductName: Paul Smith - Arno Lace-up Leather Boots - Mens - Black
Description: Paul Smith - Paul Smith's black Arno boots are crafted to a timeless silhouette that easily transitions from season to season. They're expertly made in Italy from smooth leather and feature sturdy gunmetal-eyelets, then affixed to a stacked rubber sole. The fit is true to size.

ProductName: Brunello Cucinelli - Suede Lace-up Boots - Mens - Brown
Description: Brunello Cucinelli - Brunello Cucinelli's timeless aesthetic defines these lace-up boots, with the clean lines and rich brown soft suede. Crafted in Italy, the topstitched upper is finished with brown laces and antiqued eyelets and they sit on a layered wooden stacked heel and lug tread. Fits true to size.

ProductName: Ezra Flat Ankle Boots
Description: The Ezra flat ankle boots showcase A.P.C.'s 30 years of experience. These boots are a must have with their sleek, elegant look and stitch detailing.

ProductName: Slide high-top sneakers
Description: Trying to set a new personal record in street style? These black and white leather Slide high-top sneakers from Golden Goose will get you a spot at the podium in no time. Ready? Set. Go! Featuring a side zip fastening, a round toe, a white rubber sole, a signature star patch detail to the side and a distressed finish.

ProductName: Burberry Men's Furley Vintage Check Pool Slides - Archive Beige
Description: Classic pool slides featuring the signature check pattern. Rubber upper Open toe Slip-on style Rubber lining Rubber sole Made in Italy. Men's Shoes - Designer Shoes \u003e Burberry \u003e Saks Fifth Avenue \u003e Barneys. Burberry. Color: Archive Beige. Size: 39 (6).

ProductName: Off-White - Arrow-print Rubber Slides - Mens - Black White
Description: Off-White - These black rubber slides are hallmarked with Off-White's latest iteration of its signature arrow motifs which are inspired by airport signage. They're made in Italy from rubber with a wide strap and moulded footbed.

ProductName: Slide high-top sneakers
Description: You know you're a star - it's time the rest of the world knows it too. These Slide high-top sneakers from Golden Goose will make it pretty clear. Put them on and twinkle away. Featuring a front lace-up detail, a signature star patch detail to the side, a round toe, a flat rubber sole, a distressed finish, a brand embossed tongue and a side zip fastening.

ProductName: Dunhill - Duke Backless Leather Loafers - Mens - Black
Description: Dunhill - Dunhill counterbalances formal and informal codes with these black Duke backless loafers, which debuted on the SS20 runway. They're shaped with a round toe and accented by a gold plaque that subtly echoes the label's equestrian heritage, then set on a beige padded leather insole, a black foam midsole and leather sole with an anti-slip heel.

ProductName: Grenson - Chadwick Two-strap Leather Slides - Mens - Black
Description: Grenson - Grenson's black leather Chadwick slides feel smart and comfortable in equal measure. They're simply crafted with two straps across the front and a logo-embossed, foot-cradling insole, then set on a zigzagged rubber sole for a firm grip.

ProductName: Jil Sander - Crossover Rubber Slides - Mens - Black
Description: Jil Sander - For SS20, Jil Sander elevates classic vacation staples with subtle touches of silver hardware, as seen by these black rubber slides. They're made in Italy with crossover straps that are adorned with a centre eyelet, alongside studded leather insoles and rubber soles.

ProductName: Slide high-top sneakers
Description: Golden Goose’s collections combine traditional Italian craftsmanship with a cool, contemporary sensibility in their cult distressed sneakers. Crafted from suede, these Slide high-top sneakers features a rubber sole, a round toe, a lace-up front fastening and a distressed finish.

ProductName: Adilette slides
Description: A poolside essential, these black and white Adilette slides are reinvented with Y-3's eye for sophisticated details. Crafted in Italy, the pair features an open toe, a slip-on style and a flat rubber sole. A moulded outsole completes the look.

ProductName: signature stripe slides
Description: A brand synonymous with classic British tailoring and style, Paul Smith successfully uses traditional craftsmanship with a modern twist. His signature rainbow-striped designs, initially inspired by pop culture, compliment his collections perfectly, bringing the vibrancy and playfulness that the brand embodies. These white calf leather signature stripe sliders from Paul Smith feature a slip-on style and a flat rubber sole.

ProductName: Brunello Cucinelli Men's Two-Tone Rubber Slides - Orange White
Description: Branded detail is printed on the band and footbed of this relaxed style with a two-tone band. Polyurethane upper Open toe Slip-on style Polyurethane sole Made in Italy. Men's Shoes - Mens Classic Footwear \u003e Brunello Cucinelli \u003e Saks Fifth Avenue \u003e Barneys. Brunello Cucinelli. Color: Orange White. Size: 45 (12).

ProductName: Benassi Solarsoft Slide SP pool slides
Description: NIKE 696116770 METALLIC GOLD/METALLIC GOLD-SL rubber/Polyester/Polyurethane

ProductName: Ancient Greek Sandals - Apteros Leather Slides - Mens - Brown
Description: Ancient Greek Sandals - Ancient Greek Sandals' brown leather slides will add a timeless and artisanal tone to your vacation edits. They're handmade in Greece from smooth leather on the wide arch strap cut out on either side - nodding to traditional Grecian silhouettes - and then set on a beige foam midsole for comfort.

ProductName: A.P.C. - Colas Crossover Leather Slides - Mens - Brown
Description: A.P.C. - Since launching in 1987, A.P.C. has have become synonymous with minimalist wardrobe staples such as these tan leather Colas slides. They're crafted with crossover straps and cork midsoles, then rest on rubber soles.

ProductName: Horsebit perforated slippers
Description: Gucci's creative director Alessandro Michele has redefined the aesthetic of the iconic fashion house with his anything goes, whimsical approach to romanticism. These white leather Horsebit perforated slippers from Gucci feature a round toe, a slip-on style, a brand embossed insole, a horsebit detail, decorative perforations and a flat sole.

ProductName: Diabolic Eyes motif sneakers
Description: Get ready for Fendi’s logomania this season. From trendy chunky sneakers to colour block sandals, the brand is all about making it functional and fashionable. These black Diabolic Eyes motif sneakers from Fendi are destined for icon status. Featuring an almond toe, a branded insole, a logo patch at the tongue, a concealed lace-up front fastening, contrast Diabolic Eyes motifs to the sidewall, tone-on-tone leather and a lettered logo and contrast stripe to the side.

ProductName: Track sandal
Description: These Speed LT Graffiti sneakers feature Balenciaga's graphic signature on their oversized soles. These masculine sneaker-socks complete an urban outfit with a designer touch.

ProductName: Gucci - Fria Gg-print Felted-wool Loafers - Mens - Beige
Description: Gucci - Inspired by traditional slipper silhouettes, Gucci's beige Fria loafers are hallmarked with the house's signature motifs. They're made in Italy from felted wool printed with a dark-brown GG-diamond pattern from the 1930s archives and accented with an antiqued gold-tone horsebit, then lined in soft faux-shearling for maximum comfort. They fit true to size.

ProductName: Marsèll - Sandalaccio Suede Lace-up Slides - Mens - Brown
Description: Marsèll - Marsèll fuses traditional silhouettes with a contemporary vision when designing these brown suede Sandallacio slides. They're made in Italy with a lace-up vamp that's reminiscent of Derby shoes, alongside an open toe and small textured heel.

ProductName: Marsèll - Strasacco Slipper Shoes - Mens - Brown
Description: Marsèll - These beige shoes are a slipper-inspired version of Marsèll's Strasacco last. They're expertly crafted in Italy from supple suede with a reinforced toecap, elasticated side panels and a matching pull tab, while the leather insole is cushioned for a comfortable fit.

ProductName: Valentino Men's Valentino Garavani Valentino x Birkenstock Double Strap Sandals - Rouge
Description: ONLY AT SAKS. From the Valentino x Birkenstock Collaboration. Designed to encourage the natural gripping motion of your feet, these sleek slides with signature double strap closure mold to the shape of your foot creating a custom footbed that supports and cradles you each and every step. Leather upper Open toe Double ankle buckle closure Rubber sole Made in Italy. Men's Shoes - Designer Shoes \u003e Valentino \u003e Saks Fifth Avenue \u003e Barneys. Valentino. Color: Rouge. Size: 45 (12).

ProductName: McQ Alexander McQueen Black and Green Tech Sandal 1.0 Sneakers
Description: Low-top sneakers panelled in green mesh and canvas and black buffed leather. Cut-out detailing throughout. Round toe. Velcro closure in black featuring logo printed in white. Canvas strap detailing in black at vamp. Canvas pull-loop in black at tongue. Canvas pull-loop in black and Velcro strap at heel collar. Rubber midsole in white featuring splatter detailing in black throughout. Treaded rubber outsole in black and white. Supplier color: Glade mix

ProductName: Saint Laurent - Fabrice Suede Sandals - Mens - Black
Description: Saint Laurent - Saint Laurent's black Fabrice sandals are stylish and practical in equal measure. They're made in Italy from supple suede and finished with silver-tone metal hardware across the asymmetric toe and instep straps, as well as the foot-cradling insole. The fit runs according to size.

ProductName: high-top sock-style sneakers
Description: Socks and sneakers trump socks and sandals every time. But what if they were one? These white and grey high-top sock-style sneakers from 1017 ALYX 9SM introduce a sock-inspired sneaker into the mix. Because as the Spice Girls would say - 'tonight is the night when two become one'. Featuring a round toe, an ankle length, ribbed cuffs, a sport sock style, metallic threading and a thick rubber sole.

ProductName: Gucci - GG-plaque Quilted Leather Slippers - Mens - Black
Description: Gucci - These black leather slippers are quilted for an elevated feel, in accordance with Gucci's storied heritage. They're crafted in Italy with a striking silver-tone and gold-tone metal logo plaque and sit on a tan leather sole with a practical rubber heel. Runs true to size.

ProductName: Balenciaga - Logo-embroidered Tartan Flannel Slippers - Mens - Red
Description: Balenciaga - Balenciaga strikes a balance between cosiness and elegance with these Italian-crafted red tartan slippers. They're shaped from soft flannel to a square toe and embroidered with the label's typeface logo, then lined with black leather and set on a rubber logo-debossed sole.

ProductName: Common Projects Original Achilles Suede Sneakers
Description: When Common Projects first debuted its 'Original Achilles' sneakers they were only available in white, grey and black colourways, which makes this orange version all the more covetable. They've been made in Italy from leather-backed suede, and are fitted with tonal laces for a clean, unfussy profile. Shown here with Acne Studios trousers, Noon Goons T-shirt, A.P.C. overshirt. - - Orange suede - Gold stamped serial numbers, leather linings, rubber soles - Lace-up - Come with dust bag and spare laces - Made in Italy

ProductName: Ballet Runner Trainers
Description: These light trainers from Loewe are very masculine. Taking inspiration from 70s styles, these trainers will look elegant on your feet and up your style. Choose these trainers for their go anywhere style and elegant colour. Wear these designer trainers with an oversize round neck jumper and straight cut jeans.

ProductName: Hereu - Arbello Cutout Leather Loafers - Mens - Orange
Description: Hereu - The vivid orange hue of Hereu's Arbello loafers makes them a statement addition to your everyday wardrobe. They're expertly crafted by local artisans in the label's native Spain, featuring a cutout vamp that's reminiscent of a traditional penny strap, alongside apron-stitched seams and a stacked heel.

ProductName: G print shower slides
Description: Known for it's iconic Gucci Supreme motif, the Italian fashion house switches up it's choice of print this season with a geometric-influenced print instead. These brown cotton and leather G print shower slides from Gucci featuring an open toe, a slip-on style and an all over logo print.

ProductName: Dr. Martens Black Myles HDW Sandals
Description: Buffed leather sandals in black. Open round toe. Adjustable pin-buckle straps and eyelet detailing at vamp. Logo embossed at molded foam rubber footbed. Tonal treaded foam rubber platform sole. Gunmetal-tone hardware. Approx. 2 platform. Supplier color: Black

ProductName: Men's Polo Ralph Lauren Cayson Slide
Description: Step up your poolside game in this well-cushioned slide made with a knit-lined vamp and unmistakable Ralph touches like heritage plaid and the pony logo. Style Name: Polo Ralph Lauren Cayson Slide (Men). Style Number: 5974360. Available in stores.

ProductName: Men's Teva Hurricane Xlt 2 Sandal
Description: Adjustable hook-and-loop straps mean a custom fit in a water-ready sandal featuring a shock pad and padded heel for additional cushioning. Style Name: Teva Hurricane Xlt 2 Sandal (Men). Style Number: 5551096 2. Available in stores.

ProductName: Giuseppe Zanotti Grey Python May Kriss High Top Sneakers
Description: High-top python-embossed leather sneakers in shades of grey. Round toe. Lace-up closure in black. Logo hardware at padded tongue. Padded collar. Tonal integrated pull-tab at heel collar. Gusset at sides with zip closure. Buffed leather lining in tan. Textured rubber midsole in white featuring logo debossed at heel. Treaded rubber outsole in white. Silver-tone hardware. Suppler color: Grey

ProductName: Vilebrequin - Coral-print Rubber Flip Flops - Mens - Navy Multi
Description: Vilebrequin - Vilebrequin's navy flip flops are printed with a whimsical underwater scene, nodding to the label's native scenery of Saint-Tropez. They're crafted with a pebbled-rubber toe strap - embossed with the label's logo in white - then set on the foam footbed and a textured rubber sole for added grip. Runs true to size.

ProductName: Maison Margiela - Tabi Split-toe Leather Flip Flops - Mens - Brown
Description: Maison Margiela - Maison Margiela's split-toe trope was introduced in the label's debut show back in 1989 and is extended to these tan flip flops. They're made in Italy with high-shine leather straps hallmarked with signature white stitches and set on a brown cut-out base featuring logo debossing at the insole and sole. Fit runs true to size.

ProductName: A.P.C. White Run Around Sneakers
Description: Low-top canvas and bonded jersey sneakers in white. Suede trim in off-white throughout. Tonal faux-leather trim at round toe. Lace-up closure in navy and white. Logo patch in white and navy at padded tongue. Padded collar. Tonal webbing pull-loop at heel collar. Elasticized knit trim featuring logo knit in blue at heel counter. Eyelet vents at inner side. Tonal textured rubber midsole. Treaded rubber outsole in navy. Supplier color: Blanc

ProductName: Gucci - Pursuit Chevron-logo Rubber Slides - Mens - Black
Description: Gucci - Gucci's black Pursuit slides are defined by the chevron stripes and GG motif on the wide-cut front strap, a nod to the design of the coveted GG Marmont line. They're made in Italy from rubber with a moulded footbed that's grained and grounded by a non-slip logo sole.

ProductName: Ancient Greek Sandals - Cross-over Backless Leather Sandals - Mens - Tan
Description: Ancient Greek Sandals - Ancient Greek Sandals' tan-brown leather sandals are handcrafted in Greece, looking to artisanal artistry to combine with its irreverent style. They're made from smooth tan leather backed in suede to keep the arch of the foot comfortable, then set with an anti-slip crepe accent on the leather sole.

ProductName: Ancient Greek Sandals - Socrates Leather Sandals - Mens - Brown
Description: Ancient Greek Sandals - Every pair of Ancient Greek Sandals is handmade in Greece using traditional techniques, and these brown Socrates sandals demonstrate that craftsmanship. They feature debossed stripes in the leather front straps and are finished with a signature wing-shaped buckle. Fit runs true to size.

ProductName: Track sandal
Description: These Balenciaga Cosy BB loafers are the perfect complement to an indoor outfit, and are also completely at home in a formal look, adding a hint of restrained relaxation.

ProductName: Converse White Pro Leather 1990 Pack OX Sneakers
Description: Low-top paneled buffed leather and canvas sneakers in white. Round toe. Perforated detailing at vamp. Cord-lock fastening at tonal lace-up closure. Padded tongue and collar. Tonal textile logo patch at heel collar. Perforated detailing and logo in black at sides. Tonal jersey lining. Textured rubber midsole in off-white. Treaded rubber outsole in green. Orange and green hardware. Supplier color: White/Jet stream/Black

ProductName: Cassetta sneakers
Description: Tod's has immersed itself in urban culture to customize its Cassetta sneakers. The classic sneaker shape is distinguished by a solid, well-designed sole.

ProductName: Men's Nike Air Max 95 Essential Sneaker
Description: Aerodynamic layering in a riot of stacked colors swoops and curves around a sneaker amped up on visible Max Air cushioning and a chunky, sculpted sole. Style Name: Nike Air Max 95 Essential Sneaker (Men). Style Number: 5920207. Available in stores.

ProductName: Ralph Lauren Purple Label - Harold Tasselled Leather Loafers - Mens - Brown
Description: Ralph Lauren Purple Label - Ralph Lauren Purple Label's brown Harold loafers fuse a driving and boat-shoe silhouette for a fresh addition to smart-casual edits. They're crafted in Italy from smooth leather with welt stitching, a tasselled front and rest on a rubber trek sole that nods to the traditional Italian moccasin style.

ProductName: Suicoke Navy and Yellow Kaw-CAB Sandals
Description: Padded nylon slip-on sandals in navy. Suede trim in blue throughout. Webbing trim and twin adjustable webbing straps in yellow at vamp. Logo patch at vamp. Logo embossed EVA molded tan rubber footbed. Treaded rubber sole in black. Supplier color: Navy/Tan

ProductName: Golden Goose Slide Sneaker in Black
Description: Golden Goose Slide Sneaker in Black Leather upper with rubber sole. Made in Italy. Terry clothed lined. Stained logo printed lace-up front. Side zip closure. Metallic leather detail. Heavily distressed, scuffed and marked sole. GGOO-MZ102. G36MS595.A92. About the designer: Founded in 2000 by Italian designers Francesca Rinaldo and Alessandro Gallo, Golden Goose offers collections for men and women rich modern shape and traditional leather craftsmanship. The line continually  tests the boundaries of fashion, often experimenting with new materials, production methods, and mixing traditional Italian techniques with classic British tailoring.

ProductName: Men's Teva 'Original Universal' Sandal
Description: Created almost 30 years ago by a Grand Canyon river guide, the Teva Original Universal Sandal has stood the test of time as a versatile outdoors essential with its lightweight construction and durable, traction-enhancing rubber sole. Style Name: Teva 'Original Universal' Sandal (Men). Style Number: 980809. Available in stores.

ProductName: Wing high top trainers
Description: Pounding the tarmac is a true pleasure with these high-top Wing trainers that Givenchy has created for men who love urban culture. One of the house's iconic piece, this shoe retains the best of the original version. Shaped to today's tastes, it has a new form that is designed to appeal to those who love comfort and style. A wardrobe must-have to wear every day.

ProductName: Valentino Garavani camouflage print slides
Description: A camouflage print keeps things interesting on these Valentino Garavani slides. In blue and black tones, the effect is modern and cool. Slip on some high-impact style. Featuring a camouflage pattern, a textured style, an open toe, a round toe, a slip-on style and a rubber sole.

ProductName: Goya - Shearling And Leather Slingback Sandals - Mens - Brown
Description: Goya - Goya's modern interpretation of the traditional Spanish menorquina shoes is evidenced in these brown and black sandals. They're made from smooth leather contrasted with tactile shearling and are discreetly accented with the label's distinctive green lacquered edges and stitching.

ProductName: Gucci Black Marmont Pursuit GG Pool Slides
Description: Quilted leather slip-on sandals in black. Open round toe. Antiqued gold-tone logo plaque at vamp. Molded footbed. Tonal treaded rubber sole featuring logo embossed at outer side. Supplier color: Black

ProductName: Crazy trainers
Description: Adidas takes another look at this legendary 90s trainer, modernising the design with new cutting edge materials to give it better cushioning.

ProductName: Air Max 270 trainers
Description: Nike's brought out a graphic grey version of their React Air Max 270 trainers. The American brand's famous logo and violet laces provide a stylish finish.

ProductName: CG Kontuur II sneakers
Description: Men who enjoy the adidas x Craig Green collaboration will be very pleased with the soft, foot-friendly texture of these CG Kontuur II sneakers.

ProductName: V print slides
Description: Paying tribute to her late brother, fashion legend and founder of the company, Gianni Versace, Donatella revives archival motifs and house codes. Versace’s rich heritage pays a visit to casual, sport-inspired styling. These multicoloured leather V print slides from Versace feature an open toe, a slip-on style and a flat sole.

ProductName: Men's Magnanni Elonso Low Top Sneaker
Description: Sleek and simple, this wardrobe-staple sneaker is styled with a low-top profile and an elongated lacing system for a casual, versatile look and a bumper cupsole for sporty appeal. Style Name: Magnanni Elonso Low Top Sneaker (Men). Style Number: 5497472. Available in stores.

ProductName: Nike Taupe Air Tailwind 79 Sneakers
Description: Low-top panelled suede and canvas sneakers in taupe. Round toe. White lace-up closure. Textile logo flag at padded tongue. Black buffed leather trim featuring logo printed in white at heel collar. Swoosh embroidered in white at sides. Rubber midsole in white. Treaded rubber outsole in black. Supplier color: Pumice/White/Black

ProductName: Men's Nike Air Max Camden Sport Slide
Description: Visible Max Air units under the heels bring a clear cushioning advantage to classic sliders molded with textured footbeds and embossed, texture-pop logos. Style Name: Nike Air Max Camden Sport Slide (Men). Style Number: 5849767. Available in stores.

ProductName: Rhude White and Grey Bball Hi Sneakers
Description: High-top panelled buffed leather sneakers in white. Distressing and suede trim in shades of grey throughout. Perforated detailing at round toe. Lace-up closure in off-white. Suede logo patch at padded tongue. Padded collar. Logo applique at heel counter. Rubber midsole in beige. Treaded rubber outsole in grey. Supplier color: White/Grey

ProductName: tri-stripe sock sneakers
Description: Blue suede tri-stripe sock sneakers from Tommy Hilfiger featuring an almond toe, an ankle length, ribbed trimming, a signature tri-colour striped trim, a front logo patch, a lace fastening, suede panels and a white rubber sole.

ProductName: FF trainers
Description: Fendi has brought out a truly singular, masculine design. We love the FF trainers by Fendi for their refined, modern graphics. Pair these trainers with a denim jacket, a fitted round neck jumper and straight jeans or trousers for an on-trend contemporary look.

ProductName: Ultrapace trainers
Description: The Ultrapace trainers from Gucci take up the colour block trend. Their stylish modern design and vibrant colours will brighten up any outfit. Wear these trainers with a slim fit round neck jumper and straight jeans with turn ups.

ProductName: I See You trainers
Description: Fendi's I See You trainers will show off all your outfits thanks to their slick design. Pop these Fendi trainers on and show off your style. Pair these brand classics with a denim jacket, a cotton T-shirt and straight jeans or trousers for a cool streetwear look.

ProductName: Bugs trainers
Description: Fendi's Bugs logo trainers stand out thanks to their modern graphics and elegant design. These trainers will perfectly round off your looks. Made from lamb's leather, these on-trend trainers will quickly become a wardrobe favourite. Pair them with a denim jacket, a fitted jumper, straight jeans or chinos.

ProductName: Maison Margiela Black Airbag Tabi Loafers
Description: Buffed leather loafers in black. Cleft square toe. Signature stitch in white at heel collar. Transparent and white treaded rubber heel featuring embossed logo. Tonal leather midsole. Leather sole in beige. Supplier color: Black

ProductName: O'keeffe - Samuel Tassel Suede Loafers - Mens - Brown
Description: O'Keeffe - O'Keeffe's brown Samuel loafers are Italian-crafted with a Blake construction for a quintessentially European air. Fashioned from plush suede, they're accented at the apron-stitched vamp with a tasseled penny bar and feature a comfortable soft heel and stacked leather soles.

ProductName: Men's Florsheim Heads-Up Penny Loafer
Description: Contrast stitching traces the contours of a casual, wardrobe-staple penny loafer styled with a classic moc toe and a generously cushioned insole. Style Name: Florsheim Heads-Up Penny Loafer (Men). Style Number: 5723931 1. Available in stores.

ProductName: Men's Trask Rowan Driving Penny Loafer
Description: Made of supple Italian leather, this moc-toe loafer is styled with a penny strap and a fully flexible, durable sole that extends to the heel for driving. Style Name: Trask Rowan Driving Penny Loafer (Men). Style Number: 6006271. Available in stores.

ProductName: Rivieras - Woven Denim Loafers - Mens - Blue
Description: Rivieras - Rivieras strikes a relaxed tone with these woven blue and white denim loafers. They're crafted from denim to a laid-back silhouette, feature an elasticated tongue for added comfort, then set on a beige leather insole and white rubber sole for a confident step.

ProductName: Givenchy Men's Logo Slider Sandals - Red White
Description: Givenchy men's pool-side slider sandals with logo detail at front. Rubber upper Open peep toe Slide-on Rubber lining Rubber sole Hand wash Made in Italy. Men's Shoes - Designer Shoes \u003e Givenchy \u003e Saks Fifth Avenue \u003e Barneys. Givenchy. Color: Red White. Size: 39 (6).

ProductName: Men's Hush Puppies Advice Loafer
Description: Fine full-grain leather elevates a smart loafer built with a WaveReflex sole for flexible comfort. A breathable mesh lining keeps you cool, and a molded, cushioned footbed supports you all day long. Style Name: Hush Puppies Advice Loafer (Men). Style Number: 5857136. Available in stores.

ProductName: Birkenstock 1774 - Arizona Leather Sandals - Mens - Black
Description: Birkenstock 1774 - Birkenstock 1774 - named after the label's founding year - fine tunes these black Arizona sandals to a sleek silhouette with premium details. They're handcrafted in Germany to two wide leather straps accented with matte-black buckles and rest on a leather sole which is embossed with a rubber tread to enhance traction.

ProductName: classic formal loafers
Description: When Miuccia Prada first introduced a line of bags to her family’s firm in 1984, the brand Prada became known for its black cutting-edge style and unique construction in the luxury industry. Black leather classic formal loafers from Prada featuring a low block heel, a square toe and a branded insole.

ProductName: slip-on loafers
Description: Need a pair of smart shoes that don't feel like a tight pain to walk in? Forget lace-ups and treat yourself to these black suede slip-on loafers from Santoni that are simply a dream to slide on and have an elegantly minimal design that transcends season and trend. Featuring a round toe, stitched panels, a branded insole, branded heel counter and a flat rubber sole.

ProductName: Moschino Men's Logo Slide Sandals - Black
Description: Bold goldtone logo elevates these smooth sandals to iconic status. Polyvinyl chloride and vinyl upper Open toe Slip-on style Elastane sole Made in Italy. Men's Shoes - Designer Shoes \u003e Saks Fifth Avenue \u003e Barneys. Moschino. Color: Black. Size: 43 (10).

ProductName: Slide canvas sneakers
Description: White Slide canvas sneakers from Golden Goose featuring a round toe, a leather trim, a logo patch at the tongue, a lace fastening, a flat rubber sole, a distressed finish and a contrasting curved side stripe.

ProductName: Air Max 90 trainers
Description: Air Max 90 technology has been used for these slides, ensuring remarkable results. An understated design with visible cushioning, these Nike slides are as comfy as they get.

ProductName: Men's Nike Air Max 90 Sneaker
Description: Layers of shapes and textures explode top to tread on a sporty '00s-reissue sneaker constructed from soft suede, ballistic mesh and ridged TPU architecture. A visible Max Air unit in the sole grounds the look in heritage style and durable comfort to make it a regular player in your sneaker rotation. Style Name: Nike Air Max 90 Sneaker (Men). Style Number: 5898967. Available in stores.

ProductName: Men's Hush Puppies Cooper Sneaker
Description: A BioDeWix Dry mesh lining means climate-controlled comfort in a sporty sneaker with a Bounce footbed for support. Smart Strobel construction and a grooved sole ensure all-day flexibility. Style Name: Hush Puppies Cooper Sneaker (Men). Style Number: 5930661. Available in stores.

ProductName: Slide leopard sneakers
Description: What better way to spice up your wardrobe than by purchasing a signature pair of Golden Goose sneakers. By combining a vintage feel, these white cotton and leather blend Slide leopard sneakers from Golden Goose feature a rubber sole, a customised GGDB foulard, a leopard print lace and leather star side embroidery.

ProductName: Versace - Crossover Eyelet Leather Slides - Mens - Black
Description: Versace - Versace toughens up classic black slides with silver eyelets and a chunky buckle, taking cues from rebellious biker attire. They're made in Italy with crossover leather straps that are hallmarked with the iconic Medusa plaque, then rest on a debossed insole and rubber heel.

ProductName: Brixton Horsebit Soft Leather Loaferss
Description: Horsebit with vintage effect. Back of shoe can be folded down to create mules. Unlined heel . Leather sole. Tubolare construction

ProductName: Bottega Veneta Black Intrecciato Open Back Loafers
Description: Handcrafted buffed calfskin slip-on loafers in black. Square toe. Intrecciato-woven detailing at vamp. Logo embossed at tonal leather footbed. Tonal buffed leather lining. Treaded rubber outsole in tan. Supplier color: Black

ProductName: Officine Creative Black Ivy 12 Loafers
Description: Handcrafted grained leather loafers in black. Round moc toe. Tonal strap at vamp. Pull-loop in shades of grey at heel collar. Tonal suede and buffed leather lining. Tonal stacked leather midsole. Tonal leather outsole. Supplier color: Black

ProductName: Men's Trask 'Sawyer' Loafer
Description: Touches of contrast trim touch up a handsome loafer fashioned in America from richly grained leather using tubular moccasin construction. Style Name: Trask 'sawyer' Loafer (Men). Style Number: 5234278. Available in stores.

ProductName: Suicoke - Kisee-veu3 Technical Sandals - Mens - Yellow
Description: Suicoke - Tokyo-based label, Suicoke, has become renowned for putting an innovative twist on utilitarian silhouettes, highlighted through these grey Kisee-VEU3 sandals. They're crafted from a reflective technical upper that's accented with yellow grosgrain straps and secures a Vibram sole, which uses Arctic Grip technology for durability.

ProductName: Valentino Garavani classic logo slides
Description: Now that you're out of office is turned on and the flights have been purchased it's finally time for you to go on your tropical getaway holiday. So make sure you don't forget to take these black rubber Valentino Garavani classic logo slides from Valentino that are perfect for sauntering from your hotel room to the beach. A welcome rest for the sole. Featuring an open toe and a flat rubber sole.

ProductName: Nike Golf Air Max 1g Coated Mesh Golf Shoes
Description: Nike Golf believes you can't go wrong with the classics. - Modelled on signature 'Air Max' sneakers, these golf shoes feature waterproof coated mesh uppers to keep you comfortable on the course - Considerable cushioning great for long days of play - Specially designed traction pattern for better grip - - White coated mesh - Rubber trims, mesh linings, rubber soles - Lace-up - Nike follows its own size conversion, therefore the size stated on the box will differ from the one provided in our conversion chart. To receive your correct fit, please refer to Size and Fit notes - Imported

ProductName: Nike Golf React Vapor 2 Coated-Mesh Golf Shoes
Description: Nike Golf 's kit strikes the balance between design and function so you can stay focused on your game. - These 'React Vapor 2' golf shoes combine Flywire technology and responsive cushioning for a smooth and supportive fit - TPU heel counters stabilise the feet as you swing - Removable spikes offer grip when needed - Foam sockliners ensure comfort on and off the course Shown here with Nike trousers, Nike Golf polo shirt, Anderson's belt, Nike socks. - - White coated-mesh - Split tongues, rubber trims, mesh linings, spiked rubber soles - Lace-up - Nike follows its own size conversion, therefore the size stated on the box will differ from the one provided in our conversion chart. To receive your correct fit, please refer to Size and Fit notes - Imported

ProductName: Nike Golf Vapor Pro Faux Leather Golf Shoes
Description: Nike Golf 's durable footwear is designed for long-lasting comfort, from tee-off to drinks in the clubhouse. - These 'Vapor Pro' shoes are made from waterproof faux leather for complete weather protection - Lunarlon midsoles and plush 'Fitsole' insoles provide cushioning, while padded collars reduce the risk of blistering - Hybrid outsoles feature removable spikes for exceptional traction on any terrain, whether on the green or in a bunker Shown here with RLX Ralph Lauren trousers, RLX Ralph Lauren polo Shirt. - - White faux leather - Padded collars, grey rubber and coated mesh trims, mesh linings, removable insoles, rubber soles with removable spikes - Lace-up - Nike follows its own size conversion, therefore the size stated on the box will differ from the one provided in our conversion chart. To receive your correct fit, please refer to Size and Fit notes - Imported

ProductName: tiger logo slides
Description: Best known for audacious motifs and street-wear inspired shapes, look to Kenzo for off-duty staples, including these black rubber tiger logo sliders from Kenzo featuring an open toe, a textured footbed with an embossed logo and a white tiger emblem across the toe strap.

ProductName: Athletic Propulsion Labs - Big Logo Techloom Slides - Mens - Navy Multi
Description: Athletic Propulsion Labs - Athletic Propulsion Labs' navy slides borrow the label's signature TechLoom fabric, developed for its trainer styles, resulting in optimal functionality and comfort. It features an embossed APL logo across the iridescent mesh foot strap and the EVA cushioned midsole and sole ensure comfortable wear underfoot.

ProductName: Goya - Slingback Suede Sandals - Mens - Black
Description: Goya - Inspired by the Mediterranean-born Menorquina shoe, Goya's black slingback sandals channel vacation style with ease. Designed for longevity as well as style, they're crafted in Spain from soft suede with a wide front strap and green welt topstitching, then set on a logo-embossed leather insole and a durable rubber tread sole.

ProductName: Suicoke ZAVO-vhl Slipper in Black
Description: Suicoke ZAVO-vhl Slipper in Black Real dyed sheep fur padded upper with Vibram\u0026reg; cushioned sole. Made in ChinaFur Origin: Australia. Adjustable nylon straps. Leather trim. Textured sole. SUIF-MZ35. OG-072VHL. About the designer:

ProductName: Gucci Logo-Embossed Rubber Slides
Description: If you're a regular on MR PORTER, you'll know that we don't advise reserving slides for the pool. Styles like this tomato-red rubber Gucci pair work just as well with tailoring. Don't go full suit though; slim trousers and a relaxed tee look best. Shown here with Gucci T-shirt, Gucci trousers, Gucci bracelet. - - Tomato-red rubber - Moulded footbeds - Come with dust bags - Made in Italy

ProductName: Benassi slides
Description: American sportswear giant Nike was originally founded in 1964 under the handle Blue Ribbon Sports by Bill Bowerman and Phil Knight, later taking on the Nike appellation in 1971. Named after the Greek goddess of victory, Nike’s signature swoosh logo is considered to be one of the most iconic, adorned across the label’s clothing, footwear and accessories. These black and white leather Benassi slides are a staple piece and feature an open toe, a slip-on style and a front logo patch.

ProductName: Suicoke - Moto-vs Two-strap Technical Slides - Mens - Grey
Description: Suicoke - The monochromatic tone of Suicoke's dove-grey Moto-VS slides is a nod to the label's performance-focused ethos. They're shaped from butter-soft suede with canvas straps, then set atop a logo-debossed moulded insole to ensure optimal comfort.

ProductName: Ancient Greek Sandals - Zinon Leather Sandals - Mens - Dark Brown
Description: Ancient Greek Sandals - Inspired by the talaria - the winged sandals said to make Greek messenger god Hermes swift as a bird - Ancient Greek Sandals creates each pair of its signature footwear using time-honoured techniques, including this brown leather Zion style. They're made from grained leather which form straps across the footarch and toe and set on a solid foam sole. Fits small to size.

ProductName: Toga Virilis - Western Buckle-strap Leather Slides - Mens - Black
Description: Toga Virilis - These black slides are an idiosyncratic example of Yasuko Furuta's directional aesthetic for Toga Virilis. They're crafted from smooth leather partnered with microfibre and woven nylon as well silver-tone metal hardware that nods to the designer's fascination with the North American Wild West. A foot-cradling insole and a shark-tooth foam sole complete the comfortable style.

ProductName: Valentino Garavani - Logo-embossed Rubber Pool Slides - Mens - Black
Description: Valentino Garavani - Valentino Garavani's black rubber slides are crafted from durable rubber that is both lightweight and water resistant, making them an ideal addition to your vacation wardrobe. They're made in Italy with the label's latest Go Logo embossed in white across the wide straps, then set on moulded insoles and textured soles.

ProductName: maple leaf slides
Description: DSQUARED2's slides feature prominently the label's signature maple leaf motif, a nod to the label's Canadian roots. Crafted from leather, this pair is designed with a flat sole, an open toe and a slip-on style.

ProductName: Dolce \u0026 Gabbana - Cross-strap Leather Sandals - Mens - Black
Description: Dolce \u0026 Gabbana - These black flat sandals are part of Dolce \u0026 Gabbana's SS20 collection that interprets a tropical mood through Sicilian eyes. They're made in Italy, from smooth leather with a criss-cross strap vamp and an ankle strap buckle fastening.

ProductName: logo slides
Description: The Caten twin designers behind luxury label DSQUARED2 are renowned for harnessing their strong Canadian heritage and using patriotic touches as inspiration for their garments. Crafted from smooth leather with a molded footbed, these slides feature a slip-on style and the brand’s signature logo to the toe strap.

ProductName: Classic low-top sneakers
Description: Supplied by a premier sneaker marketplace dealing with unworn, already sold out, in demand rarities. Each product is rigorously inspected by experienced experts guaranteeing authenticity. Forget the laces. These engineered red and brown leather Classic low-top sneakers from Vans are here to put you through your paces with a simple slip. Crafted from textured panels of leather, you won't want to let this pair slide. Featuring a round toe, a slip-on style, a flat rubber sole and a branded insole.

ProductName: Givenchy - Logo-embossed Rubber Slides - Mens - White
Description: Givenchy - Givenchy's white rubber slides are crafted with a wide textured rubber front strap embossed with a bold black logo - a nod to the rising trend of exaggerated branding. They're made in Italy, constructed with a moulded grained leather-effect insole, the set with a track sole as a practical finishing touch. Fits true to size.

ProductName: John Lobb - Beacon Leather Slides - Mens - Black
Description: John Lobb - John Lobb's black Beacon slides are the label's take on vacation-style footwear, uniting their 19th century craftsmanship with contemporary design codes. They're handcrafted in Italy with an oversized grained leather arch strap that is set with two buckle-fastening tabs and finished with black lacquered edges, then set on a small stacked heel.

ProductName: Men's Adidas Adilette Cloudfoam Mono Sport Slide
Description: Pillow-soft Cloudfoam construction brings lightweight comfort to these EVA-cushioned sliders molded to energize every step you take. Style Name: Adidas Adilette Cloudfoam Mono Sport Slide (Men). Style Number: 5518583 2. Available in stores.

ProductName: Men's The North Face Base Camp Ii Slide Sandal
Description: A well-cushioned slide offers comfort and versatility that works around town or around camp at the end of a long day of hiking. Style Name: The North Face Base Camp Ii Slide Sandal (Men). Style Number: 5676321. Available in stores.

ProductName: Tricker's - Calvert Scotch-grain Leather Derby Boots - Mens - Tan
Description: Tricker's - The tan Calvert boots are made on the 81 last - a traditional shoemakers mould - in Tricker's' Northampton workshop. Shaped in the profile of traditional derby shoes, they're crafted from robust scotch-grain leather for added textured appeal and set on grippy rubber soles, designed for slippery surfaces. Fit runs true to size.

ProductName: Raf Simons - X Dr. Martens 1461 Lace-up Leather Derby Boots - Mens - Black
Description: Raf Simons - The tonal nickel rings that adorn Raf Simons and Dr. Martens's collaborative black 1461 shoes reference the London punk scene and provide unique opportunities for customisation. They're crafted from leather to a classic derby shape with a lace-up front, then set atop a beige rubber tread sole.

ProductName: John Lobb Men's Alder Lace-Up Leather Derby Boots - Black
Description: An eight-eyelet Derby boot, inspired by a 1940's ski boot preserved in the John Lobb archives. A contemporary signature of the house, this Balmoral boot features a bellows tongue and cushioned collar alongside palladium ski hooks and a lightweight walking sole allowing for refinement, comfort and function in any terrain. Leather upper Stacked heel Lace-up vamp Almond toe Leather lining Leather sole Made in England. Men's Shoes - Mens Classic Footwear \u003e Saks Fifth Avenue \u003e Barneys. John Lobb. Color: Black. Size: 8.5.

ProductName: Church's - Dubai Leather Oxford Shoes - Mens - Black
Description: Church's - Church's black Dubai oxford shoes provide a polished foundation to suiting looks. They're hand-crafted in the label's workshop in Northampton, England from supple calf leather that's shaped to a classic almond-toe profile atop a small stacked heel.

ProductName: Burwood derby shoes
Description: The Burwood derby is a shoe by Church's. These are impeccably elegant men's shoes for business or special occasions.

ProductName: Men's The Wheel Tire Lug-Sole Derby Shoes
Description: Prada \The Wheel\ derby shoe featuring exaggerated lug sole, inspired by the tread of dirt bikes. Round toe with hand-set stud detail. Exaggerated rubber heel. Lace-up vamp. Spazzolato calf leather. Made in Italy.

ProductName: Ann Demeulemeester - Lace-up Suede Trainers - Mens - Khaki
Description: Ann Demeulemeester - Ann Demeulemeester's SS20 collection is inspired by a modern sailor's lifestyle and these dark green trainers juxtapose that aesthetic with the label's irreverent edge. They're crafted in Italy from gently distressed suede covered with black rubber panels and are set on chunky, treaded soles.

ProductName: Aviator Classic sunglasses
Description: Gold-tone Aviator Classic sunglasses from Ray-Ban featuring a thin top bar, tinted lenses, 100% UV protection, straight arms with angled tips, a curved nose bridge and acetate tips. This item comes with a protective case.

ProductName: Erice leopard print loafers
Description: Who said formal can't be fun? Not these Erice loafers from Dolce \u0026 Gabbana, that's for sure - in a leopard print design, this pair is made to cross boundaries and look good doing it. There's no where they can't go - the office, the bar, date night, a wedding - see? Invincible. Featuring an almond toe, a leopard print, a branded insole, a slip-on style and a flat leather sole.

ProductName: Horsebit Web loafers
Description: Need something new to trot away? Opt for these beige leather Horsebit Web loafers from Gucci. Go, strut. Featuring a slip-on style, a horsebit detail, a signature blue and red Web detail, a flat leather sole and a branded insole.

ProductName: contrasting sole penny loafers
Description: Grey leather contrasting sole penny loafers from Tod's featuring a front embossed logo stamp, a round toe, a slip-on style, a branded insole, a rubber sole with embossed rubber pebbles and a woven leather cord to the bottom.

ProductName: tassel loafers
Description: Black calf leather tassel loafers  from Officine Creative. This item fits large, please select half a size down.

ProductName: diagonal stripes espadrilles
Description: A little bit of summer is what the entire year is all about. Crafted from cotton, these black and white espadrilles from Off-White are decorated with the brand's signature diagonal stripes and they will get you ready for the hot season in great style. Bring on the sunny days! Featuring a round toe, a slip-on style, a branded insole and a braided raffia sole.

ProductName: tassel loafers
Description: Crafted from black leather, these loafers from Gucci sport a subtle design, enriched by a metal feline head to the back. A round toe, a hanging tassel, a branded insole and a flat heel complete the silhouette.

ProductName: Tod'S Laced Gommino Nubuck Driving Shoes
Description: Italian brand Tods is world-renowned for its handcraftsmanship and quality leathers and the Gommino Driving Shoe is its most iconic style, so called because of the 133 rubber pebbles or 'gommini embedded on each sole. An utterly sophisticated style in luxurious nubuck leather with laced sides, this versatile shoe will work equally well as part of an off-duty outfit as it will with more formal ensembles.

ProductName: Baudoin \u0026 Lange Suede Tassel Loafers
Description: Renowned for its impeccable style and quality, Baudoin \u0026 amp, Lange present these exquisitely crafted loafers to elevate your footwear repertoire. Crafted using the finest supple suede, the elegant style is anchored by classic tassel detailing alongside the brand's signature triple gold-tone dot motif to the heel. Wear with tailored separates for a sartorial approach to smart-casual styling.

ProductName: Gucci Horsebit Leather Loafers
Description: Over the years, Gucci 's horsebit loafers have been part of some iconic looks - Mr Francis Ford Coppola wore them when directing, Mr Brad Pitt stepped onto the set of Fight Club in his and A$AP Rocky donned a pair at Art Basel. This latest version has been expertly made in Italy from smooth black leather and detailed with the iconic hardware in burnished-gold. Shown here with Gucci trousers, Gucci sweater, Gucci shirt, Gucci jacket. - - Black leather - Burnished-gold horsebits, leather linings and soles - Come with dust bags - Made in Italy

ProductName: Santoni Nubuck Penny Loafers
Description: As soon as you put these Santoni penny loafers on, you'll feel the difference that nearly 50 years of craft experience makes. They've been made in Italy from smooth nubuck and set on Goodyear-welted soles that are so flexible, they'll feel broken-in from the very first wear. Shown here with Boglioli trousers, Giorgio Armani jacket, Thom Sweeney sweater. - - Storm-blue nubuck (calf) - Leather linings and Goodyear-welted soles - Come with dust bags - Made in Italy

ProductName: Gucci Loomis Leather Tasselled Loafers
Description: Gucci 's iconic loafers have been a hallmark of the storied label since the '50s, but leave it to current Creative Director Mr Alessandro Michele to put his unmistakable mark on the classics. This tasselled pair has been crafted in Italy from smooth leather and subtly punctuated by a gold-tone feline head at the heels - a member of the designer's eclectic animal kingdom. The soles are trimmed with rubber for traction and printed with a bee. Shown here with Gucci jeans, Gucci jacket, Gucci shirt, Gucci socks, Gucci ring. This item is small to size; see Size \u0026 Fit notes. - - Dark-brown leather - Gold-tone heel embellishments, leather linings and soles - Come with dust bags - Made in Italy

ProductName: logo-stamp loafers
Description: Dark blue leather and suede logo-stamp loafers from Emporio Armani featuring a round toe, stitching details, a front embossed logo stamp, a leather lining, a brand embossed insole, branded heel counter and a non-slip rubber sole.

ProductName: bow detail driving shoes
Description: Peddle to the metal. These driving shoes from Kiton, in their dark brown hue and slip-on style, have a need for speed. Just keep them within the speed limit. Featuring a square toe, a bow on the front, a branded insole, a slip-on style and a flat rubber sole.

ProductName: crocodile effect FF buckle loafers
Description: Time to put those acting skills into practice. Shed some crocodile tears until someone finally gives in and gets you these military green calf leather crocodile effect FF buckle loafers from Fendi. Ready for your close-up? Featuring a slip-on style, an embossed crocodile effect, a gold-tone buckle, a square toe and a wooden sole.

ProductName: chunky heel loafers
Description: Home to the edgy and mysteriously alluring, Alexander McQueen is an encounter of finesse and duskiness. Crafted in Italy from supple textured leather, these chunky heel loafers boast a timeless design. They feature a round toe, a ridged rubber sole and a logo engraved silver-tone metal detail at the heel.

ProductName: leather horsebit loafers
Description: A mainstay in Gucci history since the '50s, the classic Horsebit loafer bridges the past to the present. A homage to the House's heritage rooted in the equestrian world, the emblematic shape is reworked in a contemporary ankle boot shape on a rubber lug sole. Black leather. Bee detail at the back. Blue rosebuds print sole. Horsebit detail. Rubber lug sole. .5\ height. 4\ shaft height. Made in Italy.

ProductName: Gancini driving shoes
Description: Classics are classics for a reason. Take these off white calf leather and leather Gancini driving shoes from Salvatore Ferragamo. Pure perfection. Featuring an almond toe, a branded insole, a slip-on style, a silver-tone and tortoiseshell horsebit detail and a segmented rubber outsole.

ProductName: x Dickies 1922 trousers
Description: Black cotton x Dickies 1922 trousers from Opening Ceremony featuring a mid-rise, a waistband with belt loops, a concealed front fastening, side pockets, rear welt pockets, an all-over logo print, a straight leg, a regular length, a slightly cropped style and contrasting all-over printed logos. Please note this item is unisex and sold in men's sizing.

ProductName: monogram stripe print square scarf
Description: TB is all you need to know it's Burberry, and when your monogram is as iconic as theirs, it makes sense to make this monogram stripe print square scar your focal accessory. Featuring a monogram print and a striped pattern.

ProductName: Scarface T-shirt
Description: PHILIPP PLEIN MTK3500PJY002N 02 BLACK Cotton/Spandex/Elastane

ProductName: Dr. Martens Black Quynn Monk Derbys
Description: Polished leather derbys in black. Leather cap in black at rounded toe. Zip closure, eyelet detailing, and adjustable single monk strap with pin-buckle fastening at vamp. Signature yellow stitching at welt. Signature Air Cushion rubber sole in tan. Gunmetal-tone hardware. Supplier color: Black

ProductName: logo patch polo top
Description: Combining casual silhouettes with utilitarian-inspired influences and complex dying and treatment processes, Stone Island's focus remains on experimental research helping them lead the way in contemporary mens fashion. This light yellow logo patch polo top is crafted from a cotton blend and features a classic polo collar, short sleeves, a relaxed fit and a straight hem.

ProductName: Sunspel Short Sleeve Riviera Polo Shirt
Description: A lightweight polo shirt from Sunspel. Split hem. Patch front pocket. Fold-over collar and 2-button placket. Short sleeves. Fabric: Piqu\u0026eacute; knit. 100% cotton. Wash warm or dry clean. Imported, Turkey. Measurements Length: 29.25in / 74cm Chest: 43.25in / 110cm Measurements from size L

ProductName: striped polo shirt
Description: White and blue cotton striped polo shirt from KENT \u0026 CURWEN featuring a classic polo collar, a front button fastening, long sleeves, ribbed cuffs, a relaxed fit, a striped pattern and an embroidered brand patch at the chest.

ProductName: 4-Bar joggers
Description: As part of a streetwear outfit, the 4-Bar joggers are real classics, with the recognisable four lines of the Thom Browne fashion house adding an understated twist.

ProductName: Casablanca Green After Sports Lounge Pants
Description: Relaxed-fit cotton terrycloth lounge pants in green. Mid-rise. Drawstring in off-white at elasticized waistband. Three-pocket styling. Logo embroidered in white and pinched seams at front. Rib knit cuffs in white. Supplier color: Green

ProductName: Rochambeau Orange Yves Scherer Edition Jogger Lounge Pants
Description: Slim-fit heavyweight cotton jersey lounge pants in orange. Fading throughout. Mid-rise. Drawstring at rib knit waistband. Three-pocket styling. Rib knit cuffs. Silver-tone hardware. Part of the Rochambeau x Yves Scherer collaboration. Supplier color: Orange

ProductName: 1017 ALYX 9SM - Trousers
Description: The Moncler Genius brand is associated with the creative genius of designer Matthew M. Williams, whose fashion philosophy is directly inspired by streetwear trends. These trousers with a modern cut offer unprecedented comfort and optimal functionality, combining aesthetics and quality. A creation to wear with an associated outfit from the collection unveiled by ALYX and Moncler Genius.

ProductName: Bless Grey and Blue Overjogging Jean Lounge Pants
Description: Relaxed-fit reconstructed grey cotton fleece and blue non-stretch denim lounge pants. Panelled construction. Mid-rise. Fading throughout. Five-pocket styling. Belt loops and drawstring at semi-elasticized waistband. Leather logo patch in tan at back waistband. Logo embroidered in white at front. Semi-elasticized cuffs. Unlined. Tonal and silver-tone hardware. Contrast stitching in tan. Supplier color: Light grey

ProductName: Unravel Black Cotton and Nylon Sweatpants
Description: Slim-fit reversed lining cotton fleece sweatpants featuring technical satin shorts-style overlay in black. Drawstring at elasticized waistband. Three-pocket styling. Tonal webbing trim and logo-printed extensions at sides. Rib knit cuffs. Logo patch applique at back. Silver-tone hardware. Supplier color: Black

ProductName: Tod's - Leather, Mesh And Suede Trainers - Mens - Black
Description: Tod's - An elegant take on athletic tropes, these black leather Tod's trainers are mande in Italy and panelled from high-tech mesh, leather and suede for a tactile nuance. They're accented with logo stamps at the tonge and heel patches and set on pebble-embossed rubber soles for comfortable grip.
